what_it_is: A lightweight, soothing body lotion that enhances and extends your sunkissed glow while nourishing and hydrating skin.
review_description: Spray and go. This feels so silky and lux. Initially I bought this for myself but my husband loved this product a lot that I'm getting him his own. He works on high rise building (construction) and says it works on all day.

what_it_is: A lightweight, soothing body lotion that enhances and extends your sunkissed glow while nourishing and hydrating skin.
review_description: This sun milk is amazing!!! Helps not only soothe my skin but helps to keep that golden brown color and prevent peeling!!!!  Just bought a second bottle!

what_it_is: A lightweight, soothing body lotion that enhances and extends your sunkissed glow while nourishing and hydrating skin.
review_description: The lotion is nice in the spray bottle and goes on evenly. It leaves a nice tingly sensation. I’m not a huge fan of the smell and which it smelled more like the signature Moroccan Oil scent. Probably would not purchase again as it is also too expensive.

what_it_is: A lightweight, soothing body lotion that enhances and extends your sunkissed glow while nourishing and hydrating skin.
review_description: Good, light after-sun lotion. I used it on an armpit sunburn (ouch) and it was calm by the morning and healed by the next day. It's not overly moisturizing but equally it's not greasy. I appreciate the lightness, but my skin is thirsty and sometimes I layered on lotion afterwards.

what_it_is: A lightweight, soothing body lotion that enhances and extends your sunkissed glow while nourishing and hydrating skin.
review_description:
Waste of money...I love MO but this does nothing. It’s almost like an extremely watered down lotion. 
If you’re on the fence, just don’t.

what_it_is: A lightweight, soothing body lotion that enhances and extends your sunkissed glow while nourishing and hydrating skin.
review_description: This product is INCREDIBLE. If you’re in the Midwest, like me, you have to give this a try. After a day in the sun and your skin is way to warm from the humidity, this will sooth and cool you down quickly. It has this amazing cooling sensation (almost like menthol) that I have always craved from after sun lotion.

what_it_is: A lightweight, soothing body lotion that enhances and extends your sunkissed glow while nourishing and hydrating skin.
review_description: Silky plush and moisturizing. It smells amazing too. Like a soft chamomile powdery note on the original Moroccanoil scent. It isn’t sticky and doesn’t feel greasy or build up. My new favorite even without after-sun days. Don’t let the spray fool you, a little goes a long way. Moisture held up all night.

what_it_is: An ultra-moisturizing lotion that uses organic aloe vera and lavender oil to defend against environmental aggressors and calm sunburn.
review_description: I'm fair skinned and I went to the beach for about four hours not realizing until later that I had turned red and was rather burnt.  The kind of burnt that you know is going to hurt for the next few days.  I slathered this on before I went to bed and twice throughout the night and the next few days afterwards.  I didn't peel and my skin tanned nicely. The key is to keep using it.  I noticed that once I tanned and stopped, I should have kept at it for a few more days because I did have some light peeling, but that was my fault. I loved this product so much I bought two more just in case I stay in the sun too long. Highly recommend.

what_it_is: An ultra-moisturizing lotion that uses organic aloe vera and lavender oil to defend against environmental aggressors and calm sunburn.
review_description: I can put on 50 spf multiple times a day and still burn. I used this for 5 days after boating and it soothed my burn, prevented me from peeling, and helped me keep my tan. Works so much better than traditional aloe!

what_it_is: An ultra-moisturizing lotion that uses organic aloe vera and lavender oil to defend against environmental aggressors and calm sunburn.
review_description: I get sunburnt so easily, to the point that if I don't lather on goop before I go outside I'll be bright red in mere minutes. I've historically used drugstore Aloe (the bright green tubes) but was really not a fan of how sticky and heavy those felt. The ER+ Radical Recovery After-Sun Lotion is my new favorite - it goes on like a light moisturizer and immediately soothes my irritation. It even seems to speed up the transition from red to tan on my skin. Its really effective, lightweight, and enjoyable to apply. Plus the packaging is stellar - that box made me feel like I was opening a vintage bottle of champagne!

what_it_is: An ultra-moisturizing lotion that uses organic aloe vera and lavender oil to defend against environmental aggressors and calm sunburn.
review_description: Smells great and very soothing on sunburnt skin! I definitely think it helped speed up the recovery time of my sunburn as well. I will definitely buy it again and would recommend it to others.

what_it_is: An ultra-moisturizing lotion that uses organic aloe vera and lavender oil to defend against environmental aggressors and calm sunburn.
review_description: Been buying this product for a few years and it is seriously THE BEST. I am fair skinned and burn easily and this cream saves the day. When consistently applied to a burn it speeds up healing time. I’ve even used this on an oven burn one time and it tremendously helped to lessen the healing time. I recommends this over and over.

what_it_is: An ultra-moisturizing lotion that uses organic aloe vera and lavender oil to defend against environmental aggressors and calm sunburn.
review_description: This after sun lotion is great! I got sunburned over the weekend on my back, stomach and butt cheeks (ouch). I have been using this product diligently on my burns. It soothes the redness and itchiness immediately after I put it on. It has also helped fade the burn into a tan as well. I will repurchase!

what_it_is: An ultra-moisturizing lotion that uses organic aloe vera and lavender oil to defend against environmental aggressors and calm sunburn.
review_description: Not only helps after sun but also after peeling. And it is cruelty-free which is a plus.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

review_description:
this one is not bad, but I prefer the other one - the moisturising bomb, since I have dry skin. this one is better for oily skin since it has a gel consistency, and is light.

however, it does feel good on the skin and I love the smell. noticed the hydration too, although the moisturising bomb is more hydrating.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

review_description: great moisturizer- has a menthol scent to it. i would recommend this for dryer skin!!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

review_description: This cream is like having an IV put directly into your face! My skin is instantly completely hydrated with zero oily feeling or look. It smells like a fresh squeezed Meyer Lemon with a light crisp citrus scent. It does not make my skin shiny at all, and it totally soothes the dry areas!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that provides a burst of hydration for a healthy glow and acts as a cooling and refreshing "drink of water" for dull, dry skin.
review_description: This didn't really do much for my skin. It mostly just sat on top of my face. It felt like it didn't sink into my skin at all.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that provides a burst of hydration for a healthy glow and acts as a cooling and refreshing "drink of water" for dull, dry skin.
review_description: Love it, it is similar to the Pharmacy daily greens. Il hydrates really well through out the day, is light and refreshing when applied and does not leave any residue when you put makeup on top of it. I use it in the morning and at night and I really love it, my face is well hydrated! It smells like lemongrass which I LOVE but it seems that some people don't so keep that in mind when purchasing!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that provides a burst of hydration for a healthy glow and acts as a cooling and refreshing "drink of water" for dull, dry skin.
review_description: Lightweight like it says and moisture lasts all day. The texture of your skin maintains a cool smooth feel till bedtime. I've enjoyed it the whole time I've used it, but I'll admit it's a bit out of my price range. I bought it for myself on a splurge. I have normal skin with an oily nose. Not oily T zone, just my nose.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that provides a burst of hydration for a healthy glow and acts as a cooling and refreshing "drink of water" for dull, dry skin.
review_title: It’s okay but not that good
review_description: It is okay but not that good. i use this for almost a week now. I don’t see any big difference on my skin. Work okay on my skin, doesn’t feel greasy.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Loss of firmness and elasticity
what_it_is: A custom-designed, two-piece mask, infused with one ounce of the clinically validated That JLo Glow Serum, for visibly tighter, lifted, and hydrated skin.
review_description:
*I received this product for free testing from influester and jlo beauty* To start this mask was a very wet mess out of the bag. It took a bit to untangle and separate the parts.  While two parts sounds okay it actually made it a little harder to put on overall. As with all mask fit will change for everyone's face. But the bottom looping over both ears is difficult and somewhat uncomfortable, I ended up leaving it looped on one ear only. Over both it also did not cover the side of my nose and parts of my cheeks. It was just stretched to far. The mouth hole could also be longer.

The mask itself is extremely wet, which makes it stick to your face well. But being in a colder climate that wetness is a little uncomfortable and has that feeling of wet hands or hair going out in the cold, a slight sting.

I would recommend having tissues nearby for when you remove the mask. The directions say to massage the residue into your face, but there is a lot left on your face when you remove it. You can massage it all in eventually or it just dries. But you will also see residue or skin peeling, there is just too much left after removing the mask. The residue left also is a bit tacky feeling left on your face.

Overall I didn't notice anything with my face that made these mask stand out. It mainly seemed the same as me applying my normal moisturizer just with a lot more hassle. 

Pretty much I would not recommend these mask. The closest I can get is if you are someone who likes using mask try it and see if it is better for you, but if you rarely or are someone not big into mask I would recommend a good moisturizer over this. It is also extremely expensive for an less than to average mask at 50 dollars per mask.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Loss of firmness and elasticity
what_it_is: A custom-designed, two-piece mask, infused with one ounce of the clinically validated That JLo Glow Serum, for visibly tighter, lifted, and hydrated skin.
review_description: Agh I don’t like giving 3 stars but honestly I thought it was just okay :( yes it made my face hydrated alittle to much. I have oily skin so it was alittle much for it :( Do you like hang out it came into pieces so I had a chance to have more coverage! I Received this product for free for testing Purposes it was very smooth feeling as well all in all I just thought the product was OK I don’t know if I would personally pay $18 for a facemask so I would definitely talk about it to people but I don’t think I would recommend it just for the price point.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Loss of firmness and elasticity
what_it_is: A custom-designed, two-piece mask, infused with one ounce of the clinically validated That JLo Glow Serum, for visibly tighter, lifted, and hydrated skin.
review_description: I’m always happy to try out new face masks. This one felt nice on my skin, especially since my skin has been feeling dry lately. After I took it off my skin felt so soft & moisturized. Even the next morning when I woke up my skin looked and felt vibrant and soft. Would definitely use again!

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Loss of firmness and elasticity
what_it_is: A custom-designed, two-piece mask, infused with one ounce of the clinically validated That JLo Glow Serum, for visibly tighter, lifted, and hydrated skin.
review_description: I had received this for free from my favorite app of all times, Influenster! It is such a pretty product and it feels great on the skin! My skin feels so refreshing too!!!

what_it_is: A custom-designed, two-piece mask, infused with one ounce of the clinically validated That JLo Glow Serum, for visibly tighter, lifted, and hydrated skin.
review_description:
I received this product complimentary, from JLO Beauty and Influenster, in return for honest feedback.
This mask is VERY hydrating....I do like the idea of of hooking around my ear. I used this mask after steaming and using a clay mask that leaves me feeling dry. I put this on and holy moly talk about hydration! The serum is thick.... I did end up wiping some of it off. Overall really great mask!

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Loss of firmness and elasticity
what_it_is: A custom-designed, two-piece mask, infused with one ounce of the clinically validated That JLo Glow Serum, for visibly tighter, lifted, and hydrated skin.
review_description: I'm a influenster product reviewer and was given this product to try and give my honest review. I tried the JLo Limitless glow multitasking mask and I love it. First let me start with the mask itself it comes in two pieces to make sure that every part of your face is covered. The  First thing I noticed was the cooling than a few minutes later the warm effect the mask provides.  I wore it for about 25 min than I removed the mask. My skin felt refreshed and hydrated like a new woman!! I must have more of them

what_it_is: A custom-designed, two-piece mask, infused with one ounce of the clinically validated That JLo Glow Serum, for visibly tighter, lifted, and hydrated skin.
review_description: I received this mask complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I love how hydrating and calming this mask is. There is SO much serum in it that can be saved for a few uses afterwards. My skin feels refreshed and glowing afterwards. Definitely recommend if youre into luxury face masks!

what_it_is: A sheer lip balm that enhances your natural lip color while moisturizing and protecting lips.
review_title: Great product but could find better option
review_description: I wear this balm every day. It's lovely, goes on smooth and is hydrating.  I strongly dislike the tube it's in though... it's clunky and not aesthetically pleasing. But the product is nice.  I can most definitely find a similar product for a better price though, therefore only 4 stars.

what_it_is: A sheer lip balm that enhances your natural lip color while moisturizing and protecting lips.
review_description: Love this lipstick, it feels smooth and moisturizing on my lips. The shade of the lipstick is the exact same as it is in the photo. Aesthetically it is so chic, I feel so glamorous having it on my dresser.

what_it_is: A sheer lip balm that enhances your natural lip color while moisturizing and protecting lips.
review_description: Beautiful finish, it makes the lips look very natural and gives a fresh and youthful image, not saturated, ideal for traveling due to the versatility of color, it is a very fresh product to use especially in hot climates.

what_it_is: A sheer lip balm that enhances your natural lip color while moisturizing and protecting lips.
review_description: Love this product! It’s more like a very tinted balm than a lipstick to me. It feels very hydrating and the color is so nice and natural while still bringing some pop.

what_it_is: A sheer lip balm that enhances your natural lip color while moisturizing and protecting lips.
review_title: I feel put together with nowhere to go! lol
review_description: I love balms and was looking for something to give me a slight hint of color. I love the Rosewood and just a hint of pink to the lips. It goes on nicely and my lips feel smooth. Been using during the daytime for a few weeks now and just can’t give all 5 stars bc I don’t feel like it lasts incredibly long, my lips have been better hydrated by other balms and I have to use a mirror to apply otherwise any outside of my lip line will be tinted as well.

what_it_is: A sheer lip balm that enhances your natural lip color while moisturizing and protecting lips.
review_description: BEST LIP PRODUCT EVER, I have purchased this over and over again for the last 5 years. 001 Pink Glow is the original colour and I think it looks good on everyone! I wear it on top of lipsticks to give it that extra moisture and tint of pink. Wear on its own gives you a natural pink tint to your lips. Very moisturizing, the only down fall is how expensive it is but this is a must have for everyone.

what_it_is: A sheer lip balm that enhances your natural lip color while moisturizing and protecting lips.
review_description: Soft, smooth, smells good, perfect little amount of color, glowy. Definitely would recommend.

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing, non-greasy, water- and sweat-resistant, reef-safe, and broad-spectrum SPF 50 lotion for the face and body.
review_description:
One of the first sunscreen I tried of my sun safety kit, not a fan of the kind-of-lime scent, and def a bit oily on my face, but the most important thing for me is the PA and that it is water/sweat resistant. 

I used this a few weekends on the beach and loved it, ill buy the value size to use as body sunscreen as well.

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing, non-greasy, water- and sweat-resistant, reef-safe, and broad-spectrum SPF 50 lotion for the face and body.
review_description: Love this sunscreen! One of the only sunscreens that doesn’t leave a white cast on my face or make me look ashy and it doesn’t break me out. Definitely recommend for women of color.

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing, non-greasy, water- and sweat-resistant, reef-safe, and broad-spectrum SPF 50 lotion for the face and body.
review_description:
I have been on the hunt for a good facial sunscreen since Cerave changed their formula a year or so back. This has been one of the few that I have actually gone through the whole bottle. Most others I tried leave a white film or would pill when I added primer or makeup over. So because this didn’t do either, it was a major win for me. I like the thickness of the formula and how it feels when I’ve applied it. I know it might sound silly but I feel like I can tell I have a barrier of protection around my skin. This is super important to me, as is the 50 SPF, because I began using prescription retinol and sun protection is so important. 

My only complaint about this is that it tends to apply a bit oily. I have combo skin so sometimes I look dewy, other times just like a grease face after applying this. When I don’t have anything to do, I just let it sit and eventually it is mostly absorbed or goes away, but it’s also not uncommon for me to use a mattifying primer or translucent powder after applying this. 

I won’t be repurchasing this exact one, but will definitely try other facial sunscreens from Supergoop. Seems like they’re getting something right.

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing, non-greasy, water- and sweat-resistant, reef-safe, and broad-spectrum SPF 50 lotion for the face and body.
review_description: Has a pretty sticky, oily consistency that that never really goes away. I don't use it for every day use, or on my face, but I use it when I go to the beach.

However I didn't give it 5 stars because I really really hope they take out the fragrance in this moisturizer. For sensitive skin fragrance can irritate the skin rather than help it calm down and that ends up defeating the purpose of this moisturizer.

It feels a bit tacky when it’s first put on but dries really quickly and makes your skin feel super soft when it’s dry. It’s an odd smell but not horrible. It’s a cool sensation but doesn’t make you feel ice cold.

skincare_concerns: Dryness and Redness

It has an awesome cooling sensation and I avoided any redness developing. As recommended, I also put it in the fridge before applying (or the freezer when I forgot the fridge and needed to use it shortly). Totally worth the money.

review_description: This product was recommended by my dermatologist to help fight melasma spots and sun damage. I’ve been following her instructions, as well as being very careful with sunscreen, and haven’t noticed any changes in the first 2 weeks. I will keep using it and see how it goes though because it sounds like it works well for a lot of people! Reading the ingredients, I know it will be good for my all-around health, even if I don’t see major skin changes right away.

review_description: I got this in a trial size bottle with an order. I did not use it on my entire face, but used it around my eyes and mouth, where I was facing dryness. This helped to sooth the dryness in around 5-6 days, and healed painful cracks around my mouth.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling, hydrating vitamin C oil for all skin types that visibly brightens and firms, revealing your most radiant-looking skin—now in the rosy bottle you love.
review_description: I don’t usually write reviews, but I LOVE this oil. I have extremely sensitive, allergy and eczema-prone skin, and often have a hard time with natural products. I tolerate rose oil and was looking for an oil to enhance my daytime winter skincare routine / save my skin from dryness. While it takes a bit of time to absorb for daytime use (esp if applied under lotion), my skin is noticeably more hydrated and smoothed after a month of use, with less irritation. I love that it is an ethical, vegan, ‘Clean at Sephora’ product, and that the company is focused on science and sustainability. (Note: Sharks have traditionally been killed for squalene - which has been terrible for the health of our oceans - but this product derives squalane from sugarcane). It’s not cheap, but a little goes a long way, and the $$ is well spent considering its benefits.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling, hydrating vitamin C oil for all skin types that visibly brightens and firms, revealing your most radiant-looking skin—now in the rosy bottle you love.
review_description: This oil is the best I’ve used. I love trying new and different products. I always think there is something better to discover. I usually use a product either travel size or full and always switch to a different. That is till this one. I LOVE LOVE LOVE this oil!! It does everything you want a face oil to do. It is lightweight but ultra moisturizing. It gives your skin a dewy glow but leaves zero tackiness. Your skin drinks it up right away and your skin feels moisturizer all day or all night. I seriously think it is a holy grail product which I never say! I definitely think it helps with dark spots or acne scarring. My tone is amazing right now. I did at first try it with the whole biossance line which I think is great. My skin has been looking phenomenal. I also love using this on my chest and hands. Highly highly recommend!!!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling, hydrating vitamin C oil for all skin types that visibly brightens and firms, revealing your most radiant-looking skin—now in the rosy bottle you love.
review_description: This is such a great oil! I’ve been using it mainly at night. Sinks in well and doesn’t sit on the skin. I’ve used it under and over moisturizer, and I like it over best as long as you let your moisturizer sink in a minute or two first. After using a smaller size, I purchased the full size bottle!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling, hydrating vitamin C oil for all skin types that visibly brightens and firms, revealing your most radiant-looking skin—now in the rosy bottle you love.
review_title: I understand the hesitation, but it’s worth it !!
review_description: Make the investment! It’s so worth it. Every morning and evening I feel fresh and my skin glows after applying just a small bit.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling, hydrating vitamin C oil for all skin types that visibly brightens and firms, revealing your most radiant-looking skin—now in the rosy bottle you love.
review_description: I originally got a sample of this in the old green bottle, and this new version in the pink bottle is just not the same. The smell is more synthetic (less like a rose, for sure) and it’s much more oily than the sample I got. I hope I just got a bad batch, but I wish I could get the old version instead. Switching to Beuti  Sleep Elixir instead.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling, hydrating vitamin C oil for all skin types that visibly brightens and firms, revealing your most radiant-looking skin—now in the rosy bottle you love.
review_description: I was gifted this for Christmas and it’s been a wonderful wintertime moisturiser. I find oils harder to apply direct to the skin, so I mix it into my daily moisturiser. My skin feels happy and healthy and a little goes a long way. However, it’s not cheap. I also own the regular squalane oil which is much cheaper. I suspect that unless I can catch this during the VIB sale, I’ll probably be using the normal squalane + another vitamin C.

skincare_concerns: Dark Circles and Puffiness, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling eye sleeping mask formulated with avocado, encapsulated retinol, and coffeeberry to brighten, depuff, and treat the appearance of dark circles.
review_description: I started using this about 2 weeks ago. I had noticed the undereye darkness is slowly diminishing. What I did is, I stored it in the fridge and it's so relaxing every time I apply it around my eyes with a gentle massage. I like it.

skincare_concerns: Dark Circles and Puffiness, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling eye sleeping mask formulated with avocado, encapsulated retinol, and coffeeberry to brighten, depuff, and treat the appearance of dark circles.
review_description: I have used all kinds of eye creams from La Mer to The Ordinary and everything in between without the kind of results I have gotten from this product. I’m on my 3rd jar already and that’s because it works ladies! My fine lines and wrinkles have soften and even my eye lid lines have disappeared. I’m 52 years old and I love the art that goes into doing my eyes when I wear makeup, therefore it’s very important to me to keep the fine lines and wrinkles in that area as moisturized and wrinkle free as possible. I did Botox and I swear to you it didn’t work as well as this product does. You have to be consistent and use it everyday and I promise you will see results. Even my  aesthetician noticed and now she’s using it too.

skincare_concerns: Dark Circles and Puffiness, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling eye sleeping mask formulated with avocado, encapsulated retinol, and coffeeberry to brighten, depuff, and treat the appearance of dark circles.
review_description: This product felt nice and cooling at first but irritated the area under my eyes. I ended up returning it

skincare_concerns: Dark Circles and Puffiness, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling eye sleeping mask formulated with avocado, encapsulated retinol, and coffeeberry to brighten, depuff, and treat the appearance of dark circles.
review_description:
This is a great product if you suffer from wrinkly, puffy baggy eyes. I’ve been using it for a couple weeks and have noticed a difference. I have sensitive skin and it’s only bothered when I get it on my temple or upper cheek. 

The only other thing that would make this 5 stars if it came with a scoop or spoon. The top is narrow compared to the rest of the jar so you’re really poking around to scoop out and what I feel like contaminating the rest of the product . I have a spoon from a previous cream that I cleaned and it works great. So, Glow, could you please provide a spoon/scoop?

skincare_concerns: Dark Circles and Puffiness, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling eye sleeping mask formulated with avocado, encapsulated retinol, and coffeeberry to brighten, depuff, and treat the appearance of dark circles.
review_description: Amazing!! This product got rid of my dark under eyes after one use !! That’s insane ! Love love love this and will be using it forever !! It goes on so smooth and even comes with a little spoon to scoop the product out. I love that there’s no scent because the under eye is such a sensitive area.

skincare_concerns: Dark Circles and Puffiness, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling eye sleeping mask formulated with avocado, encapsulated retinol, and coffeeberry to brighten, depuff, and treat the appearance of dark circles.
review_description: I used this every night for over a month and it did not work well on my skin. The wrinkles around my eyes became more prominent and I got dry, flakey and irritated patches that went away almost immediately after I discontinued use and switched to an Algenist product. Also, this jar so soooo tiny for the price. Not worth it for me, very disappointing.

skincare_concerns: Dark Circles and Puffiness, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling eye sleeping mask formulated with avocado, encapsulated retinol, and coffeeberry to brighten, depuff, and treat the appearance of dark circles.
review_description: Here's the thing.  I just got this order in but I can tell you I wont buy it again. The jar is very, very tiny and the top of the jar is made weird, I'm not sure how to get the product out efficiently.  I dont care how well this may work, for $40 please design a better jar and give me more product. This looks like all trendy packaging is where they charge the money, not the actually product or how people would use it.

what_it_is: A stable serum emulsion of a next-generation retinoid active that achieves better reduction in visible signs of aging than retinol—without irritation.
review_description: Its so inexpensive I use it on the backs of my hands at night- can totally tell the difference.

what_it_is: A stable serum emulsion of a next-generation retinoid active that achieves better reduction in visible signs of aging than retinol—without irritation.
review_description: I have been using retinol products for the last 7-8 years (only stopped while I was pregnant and breastfeeding). I've always used the ones with a lower percentage of retinol because going high dries out my skin. This one gives me the amazing results of a high percentage of retinol without any downside. I'm on my second bottle and plan on purchasing it forever and ever :)

what_it_is: A stable serum emulsion of a next-generation retinoid active that achieves better reduction in visible signs of aging than retinol—without irritation.
review_description: I bought this product last week. How come my granactive retinoid 2% is full of bubbles?

what_it_is: A stable serum emulsion of a next-generation retinoid active that achieves better reduction in visible signs of aging than retinol—without irritation.
review_description: A low cost product that actually works! It’s hard for me to find a product that actually shows any kind of results. And this definitely helps my skin.

what_it_is: A stable serum emulsion of a next-generation retinoid active that achieves better reduction in visible signs of aging than retinol—without irritation.
review_description: A low cost product that actually works! It’s hard for me to find a product that actually shows any kind of results. And this definitely helps my skin.

what_it_is: A stable serum emulsion of a next-generation retinoid active that achieves better reduction in visible signs of aging than retinol—without irritation.
review_description: Started using this once a week, and now I use it once daily in my night time routine. It’s been great for fine lines and hyperpigmentation, but it also helped a lot with cystic acne. Haven’t had a single one since I started using it daily. It smells good and isn’t sticky

what_it_is: A stable serum emulsion of a next-generation retinoid active that achieves better reduction in visible signs of aging than retinol—without irritation.
review_description: I used to not take care of my skin, and then a few years ago I noticed the first wrinkle on my forehead and panicked. I started using this product and the buffet from ordinary as my only serums besides cleanser and moisturizer for years. I have no idea if this contributed to it but I haven’t had another wrinkle form. I used it 3 times a week for multiple years. I also never really had breakouts or reactions. Great product!

skincare_concerns: Redness, Dryness, Dullness and uneven texture
what_it_is: A green-to-beige color-correcting treatment that corrects redness and protects skin from UV damage and environmental aggressors.
review_description: Awesome product!!! Really does get rid of redness and looks like natural skin!

skincare_concerns: Redness, Dryness, Dullness and uneven texture
what_it_is: A green-to-beige color-correcting treatment that corrects redness and protects skin from UV damage and environmental aggressors.
review_description: There are very few products I buy repeatedly, this is one I have probably bought 5 times. I have redness in my face particularly cheeks and nose. I put this on my face in the morning (after washing and moisturizing) and let it sit for a couple mins. It lessens/covers the redness enough that I feel comfortable being in public with just this, or if I want some more coverage I will put foundation over it. I also think you get a lot of product for the price. It lasts me ~10 months.

skincare_concerns: Redness, Dryness, Dullness and uneven texture
what_it_is: A green-to-beige color-correcting treatment that corrects redness and protects skin from UV damage and environmental aggressors.
review_title: I will never wear foundation again
review_description: This stuff is a life changer for me. I’m early 40’s with light skin tone and freckles. I have blotchy redness around the nose and dark eye circles. I applied this after my daily moisturizing routine and I’m speechless. I’m not a heavy makeup wearer to begin so I will be buying the bigger size and ditching all my concealer. 10/10 recommend for a NATURAL look... don’t buy this thinking you’ll come out looking airbrushed.

skincare_concerns: Redness, Dryness, Dullness and uneven texture
what_it_is: A green-to-beige color-correcting treatment that corrects redness and protects skin from UV damage and environmental aggressors.
review_title: No Secret Why This is a Cult Fave
review_description: HOLY COW this cream yall. 10/10. I have a lot of redness in my face around my nose and this covers it right up. That said - it doesn't "fix" the redness - but it does to great at covering it without being greasy. I love it!

skincare_concerns: Redness, Dryness, Dullness and uneven texture
what_it_is: A green-to-beige color-correcting treatment that corrects redness and protects skin from UV damage and environmental aggressors.
review_description: A little bit goes a long way! If you use too much it can make you appear kind of washed out. I like that it has spf and it kind of blurs some of my discoloration. I’ve noticed that it helps keep my oil at bay too

skincare_concerns: Redness, Dryness, Dullness and uneven texture
what_it_is: A green-to-beige color-correcting treatment that corrects redness and protects skin from UV damage and environmental aggressors.
review_description: I really love this product! I am on accutane right now and a lot of things bother my skin. It’s dry and I have redness but this stuff works great! It helps reduce the redness a lot and it makes me feel a lot more confident wearing no makeup! I wear it under my foundation too and had no issues with it. I have a tan complexion and it will look light at first but it evens out. I love it!

skincare_concerns: Redness, Dryness, Dullness and uneven texture
what_it_is: A green-to-beige color-correcting treatment that corrects redness and protects skin from UV damage and environmental aggressors.
review_title: a little really goes a long way!!
review_description: I had just received this product and I used it just now. I was very skeptical to try this as many people with my skin tone strongly suggested that it left a bad white cast on skin with more melanin. I would say, being Filipino, I’m pretty melinated. I have tan skin, but this product has no issues matching to my skin tone. I believe the matter of it not working on some people is because of incorrect application. A little really does go a long way. I started off with a small amount and slowly added more until I got a desired coverage. Think of it more as a serum then a moisturizer, you only put a small amount and not slather a lot on your face. Additionally, I warmed it up in my hands before application them patted it into my face. I do believe that this product with not work on someone who is extremely melinated and has a very deep tone to their skin.  The reason why I say this is that for people with darker skin, redness and irritation don’t appear as red, they appear as a dark purple or almost bluish color. Green will not be able to color correct that redness correctly therefore a different CC cream is needed. If you have tan skin and are hesitant to try this, I would recommend trying it, you can always return it anyways. Start small, then add more.

what_it_is: A standard queen-size pillowcase made of the highest grade mulberry silk for the ultimate beauty sleep.
review_description: I LOVED this pillowcase and always washed it on gentle in the wash bag and hung to dry.   It is now frayed and damaged and since it’s ‘outside of Sephora’s return policy’ there is nothing I can do but eat the crazy $$$ this cost me.   Super unimpressed!

what_it_is: A standard queen-size pillowcase made of the highest grade mulberry silk for the ultimate beauty sleep.
review_description: I’ve had this product for a little over a year and it’s already fraying and coming apart. The issue is that the Slip branding embroidery is too heavy for the silk so the fraying starts there around the logo. I wish the company had thought of a better place to put the brand info.

what_it_is: A standard queen-size pillowcase made of the highest grade mulberry silk for the ultimate beauty sleep.
review_description: So happy I splurged and purchased this pillowcase. The silk feels so nice on my face and stays cooler than a normal cotton pillowcase, which is an added bonus. Since I only have 1 and the rest of my bedding is pure white, I put a regular white pillowcase over top when I am not sleeping which also provides protection! The only potential downsides are that it is expensive for 1 pillowcase, and it gets wrinkly.. bit it is silk and nobody sees it, so that doesn't really matter for me. Got mine with my VIB sale before the holidays to save a bit of money!

what_it_is: A multifunctional brightening formula.
review_description: Quality products for eczema flare. I pair with Niacinamide drops daily and my face looks radiant.

what_it_is: A multifunctional brightening formula.
review_description: I tried this out on a whim, and I’m so surprised how it benefitted my skin! I never noticed how much redness I had in my cheeks until I used this.. it makes my skin look more “translucent” and brightened. It does pill sometimes, depending on what other products I use with it, so be careful. But at the price, it’s totally worth the purchase. My new staple to my skincare routine.

what_it_is: A multifunctional brightening formula.
review_description: Guys...this stuff is amazing. I use it at night prior to my moisturizer. It has improved skin texture and overall hyperpigmentation (which was a major issue for me). My previous hyperpigmented acne areas are almost gone, my skin tone is more even, and my acne flare ups are drastically shorter in redness and irritation when this is added. It isn’t drying, doesn’t cause flaking, and I apply it on all aspects of my combo skin. Also know that I have THE MOST sensitive skin on the planet and did really well with this.

what_it_is: A multifunctional brightening formula.
review_description: I really like this product! I feel like it leaves my skin looking very bright and even. I like the thickness of the cream, but I sometimes feel like it pills and can be drying. Overall I like it! I would purchase it again.

what_it_is: A multifunctional brightening formula.
review_description: This felt so good on my sensitive acne prone skin. I almost immediately could tell how it was going to work. I apply it simply after cleansing because I’m not trying to mess with my skin routine too much after introducing a new product. For the price point I’d say try it. It really is a good size and will last awhile.

what_it_is: A multifunctional brightening formula.
review_title: Rosacea sufferers need to buy this!!!
review_description: I have been suffering from rosacea for about 20 years now and I have used every prescription medications there is available for it and nothing has worked until I started using this product. My flares have diminished and the rosacea acne has almost banished. It feels almost soothing and calming. I use it after my serum and before my moisturizer morning and night and is just wonderful.

what_it_is: A multifunctional brightening formula.
review_title: This has help me so much with acne!!!
review_description: ive been using this since Oct 26 2020 and its now jan 12 2021 and I can clearly see a difference in my skin and its help with my acne a lot!☺ I would recommend this over the the ordinary AHA and BHA peelling solution since that left my face red and irritated. I use this after washing my face and putting on serums. I put about a pea-sized amount on my finger and then dab it all over my face and then rub it in and then after I put on some moisturizer and it works great!

what_it_is: A standard queen-size pillowcase made of the highest grade mulberry silk for the ultimate beauty sleep.
review_description: This item completely ripped after using it from April - December. Would not recommend to anyone, I can't believe it didn't even last a year.

what_it_is: A standard queen-size pillowcase made of the highest grade mulberry silk for the ultimate beauty sleep.
review_description: Maybe just me. Or the pillow case is too luxury and smooth, I CANNOT SLEEP WHEN I USE IT. too slippery made my pillow keep moving from my head. And my skincare suck into the sheet made my face dry out in the morning.

what_it_is: A standard queen-size pillowcase made of the highest grade mulberry silk for the ultimate beauty sleep.
review_description:
Truly the best!  I have them in a variety of colors and at first I was very gentle to wash them.  Then one day I accidentally put it in the dryer and no harm done.  Of course I still wash them in laundry bags but I don’t purposely use gentle cycle.   I’m surprised by some of the photos here.  None of mine has any signs of usage /worn.  All look brand new! They’re the
Most durable silk materials I’ve ever seen for pillow cases.  I’ve tried ones advertised on social media and none of them came close.  Many of those don’t even feel like silk.

what_it_is: A standard queen-size pillowcase made of the highest grade mulberry silk for the ultimate beauty sleep.
review_description: I got this as a gift, and it’s nice but when I looked at the cost I freaked. There is absolutely no reason this should cost this much money. Too many other similar options out there.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and uneven skintone, Pores, Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with five acids to visibly reduce dullness and uneven texture, pores, and dark spots.
review_description: SO worth the money! Bought these (along with the Dr Dennis Gross face wash) after having serious flare ups with my skin, and my old products stopped working. I’ve only been using these for 5 days, and already see an extremely noticeable difference. Helping with my acne breakouts, pore size, and to even out skin texture. Worth the investment!

skincare_concerns: Dullness and uneven skintone, Pores, Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with five acids to visibly reduce dullness and uneven texture, pores, and dark spots.
review_description: I LOVE this product. I have always struggled with my big pores, black heads and uneven skin tone (but mainly big pores). I bought a 5-pack and within 2 uses I noticed a difference in my skin tones and blackheads. Obviously nothing can actually make my pores smaller, but this definitely cleaned them out and made them smoother. I definitely recommend this product, and just bought a bigger box.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and uneven skintone, Pores, Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with five acids to visibly reduce dullness and uneven texture, pores, and dark spots.
review_title: Too Strong, Returned not for sensitive skin
review_description: I bought these to try to help with post acne marks, pigmentation. The second ingredient is alcohol and these dried my face out t too much. Used for about 2 or three weeks but gave up. Didn’t see a difference and my face being dry wasn’t worth it. Ended up returning.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and uneven skintone, Pores, Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with five acids to visibly reduce dullness and uneven texture, pores, and dark spots.
review_title: No difference than a normal skincare wipe
review_description: Honestly it did nothing substantial compared to any other skincare wipe. I used the 30 days + 5 days and saw no results. I also used it in conjunction with their pore minimizing moisturizer $90 and saw no results. Very disappointed with the results for the price.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and uneven skintone, Pores, Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with five acids to visibly reduce dullness and uneven texture, pores, and dark spots.
review_description: This product is okay. Noticed some difference but there are better products that cost less.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and uneven skintone, Pores, Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with five acids to visibly reduce dullness and uneven texture, pores, and dark spots.
review_description:
Deep clean feeling. I love this product. After a stressful first week at a new job, my face was speaking to me. So over the weekend I took the last two remaining treatments and took care of me. I see a noticeable difference in those two days. I love that I can feel the product working, especially within my cheekbone area. When I’m stressed I breakout along my side jawbone below my ear. And this product has helped me restore some balance. 

Say all that to say... I started with the trial 5 pack and now plan to get the 30 treatment pack.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and uneven skintone, Pores, Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with five acids to visibly reduce dullness and uneven texture, pores, and dark spots.
review_description: I had really stubborn hormonal acne under my chin. Nothing huge or noticeable but would not go away with my normal benzoyl peroxide. This literally obliterated it. Also my pores are smaller, my skin is "glowier." It is a bit expensive so I'm going to try every other day and see if I can get the same results as daily.

what_it_is: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula with 10 percent pure niacinamide and one percent zinc PCA.
review_description: I struggle with acne and usually the treatments I use tend to dry my skin and makes it look dull. But I’ve been using this for only two weeks and I see a major difference. My skin is glowing but not oily. Also helped a lot to clear my skin from scars and acne.

what_it_is: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula with 10 percent pure niacinamide and one percent zinc PCA.
review_description: I’ve been using this for only a couple of weeks but I love it!! It’s a great edition to my very basic skin care routine. My skin is very sensitive to scents and this product doesn’t have any!! It’s a very calming product, it also works really well with a jade roller. I will definitely be purchasing more products from the ordinary.

what_it_is: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula with 10 percent pure niacinamide and one percent zinc PCA.
review_title: Good for controlling oily skin/excess sebum
review_description: I bought this serum a few months ago and will definitely be repurchasing it! It totally helps with reducing my sebum production/reducing oils on my face, but I removed one star since there wasn’t any noticeable reduction in the appearance of my skin blemishes/congestion. My main concern was controlling my oily skin though, so this is a personal favourite!

what_it_is: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula with 10 percent pure niacinamide and one percent zinc PCA.
review_description: I mix this with the alpha arbutin serum and it has been keeping my face clear. I ran out a few months ago and I started breaking out again.  It was finally in stock again and I finally bought the pair. My face cleared up within a few weeks!

what_it_is: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula with 10 percent pure niacinamide and one percent zinc PCA.
review_description: i’m someone who struggled with hormonal acne due to an ED and i had soooo many acne scars left over. decided to try this out and within two weeks there was a hugeeee difference. my scars are so much lighter and some even completely disappeared. definitely worth it. i recommend using a moisturizer after putting this on, obviously, and a sunscreen.

what_it_is: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula with 10 percent pure niacinamide and one percent zinc PCA.
review_description: Very noticeable results for cystic acne. Works wonders for the price point. Will definitely buy again.

what_it_is: A high-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula with 10 percent pure niacinamide and one percent zinc PCA.
review_description: Within the last 4 years I have got cyctic/ hormonal acne around my chin. I've been using this along with the hylaronic acid and I swear its worked miracles.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Dryness
what_it_is: A clean, cutting-edge formula with one percent vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.
review_description: Strong retinol cream I’ve been looking for! Highly recommend.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Dryness
what_it_is: A clean, cutting-edge formula with one percent vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.
review_description: Accidentally used too much and my skin started peeling.. lesson learned! It helped fade my sun spot a little but the formula turned a dark yellow so quickly.. it’s not for the money for me if it’s not going to stay stable for very long

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Dryness
what_it_is: A clean, cutting-edge formula with one percent vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.
review_description: I adore this product. I have a very oily skin and some blemish at times. This clears everything out. My skin is not very sensitive and I have used retinol for a long time, but I follow the directions and only use it every other day. I also let my skin rest on week ends and use regular moisturizer and SPF but no retinol at all during the weekend. This product really made a difference on my skin texture and evened out the coloration of the skin tone. I am very please. It’s very expensive but lasts a long time as you use very little of this product anyway.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Dryness
what_it_is: A clean, cutting-edge formula with one percent vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.
review_description: I really wanted to love this. I actually really wanted to love all of the products, but this one KILLED my skin. My skin wasn't really that bad when I bought this, I was thinking more preventative. But now I'm trying to find products to repair the damage.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Dryness
what_it_is: A clean, cutting-edge formula with one percent vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.
review_description: This is a great retinol to use a few times a week.  I usually just mix a small amount in with a normal night cream, so that it's not too drying, and wear it overnight.  I haven't noticed any negative effects, and my skin feels firmer in the morning when I wake up.  I'm looking forward to seeing how my skin looks when I finish the tube!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Dryness
what_it_is: A clean, cutting-edge formula with one percent vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.
review_title: Love the product not the packaging
review_description:
I am only about 8 weeks into this product but I am noticing great changes in the texture and clarity of my face. I am a new retinol user, so I’ve just been using this once a week. Recently upped it to twice, but I used a bit too much and my skin was pretty angry. I like to layer on LRP cicaplast b5 baume after this and it has saved my skin from peeling and feeling dry. 

As far as packaging, it could use some work. I read in another review to only open the seal halfway to stop the product from spilling out. This has really helped me control how much I use. But the foil tube is starting to split a little bit at the sides and a tiny amount of product comes out. 

Overall I’m really liking this retinol, albeit the packaging!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Dryness
what_it_is: A clean, cutting-edge formula with one percent vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage.
review_description: This is was too powerful for my face. This is my third time giving it a try, the first time I didn’t know about skin purging and got small white pimples all over my face. My skin cleared up and it look beautiful, I used it once a week for two weeks as instructed. Then I started breaking out again, I tried giving it one more time and have been using it once a week for two months and my skin is still not used to the product. I still break out even tho it’s been two months and I didn’t even it a chance to add it more than once per week. I’d say find another retinol product that doesn’t cause so much breakouts. I feel like this should be prescription only.

what_it_is: An exfoliating toning solution with seven percent glycolic acid, amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng, and tasmanian pepperberry.
review_description: I was skeptical when deciding if I should buy this toner or not but I kept seeing it on Instagram so I decided to try it out. I was pretty impressed from the first use - my skin felt so nice (it was similar feeling to when I used the Sunday Riley Good Genes). My skin texture has improved in two weeks of using this product (I use it about 3 times a week).

what_it_is: An exfoliating toning solution with seven percent glycolic acid, amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng, and tasmanian pepperberry.
review_description: I find all of The Ordinary's exfoliating products to be good and this isn't an exception. It gets the job done to remove dead skin. There's no wow factor really, just a very utilitarian product that everyone should have.

what_it_is: An exfoliating toning solution with seven percent glycolic acid, amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng, and tasmanian pepperberry.
review_description: Product leaves skin feeling fresh and rejuvenated. Great price!!

what_it_is: An exfoliating toning solution with seven percent glycolic acid, amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng, and tasmanian pepperberry.
review_title: Smooths skin. Does not lift dark spots.
review_description: Does a great job at keeping my skin exfoliated and smooth, but my hyperpigmentation spots that I’ve had before I started using it have not remotely gotten lighter after using this every day for 10 months which doesn’t make any sense to me, and obviously has done nothing for newer ones I’ve gotten from the occasional blemish throughout the course. Idk if this is just how my skin is or if there’s a point where dark spots actually become permanent, but I’m just so frustratingly disappointed. But given the price for the amount of product you get, I will continue to purchase this for my exfoliating treatment. As I mentioned before, it does the most important part.

what_it_is: An exfoliating toning solution with seven percent glycolic acid, amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng, and tasmanian pepperberry.
review_description: I absolutely love The Ordinary, but this product didn’t do much for me. It left my skin red and tingly immediately after using so I had to be careful to only use it at night and I never seemed to notice a difference in the mornings. Overall, I wouldn’t recommend this product. The AHA peel is a much better product for exfoliating.

what_it_is: An exfoliating toning solution with seven percent glycolic acid, amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng, and tasmanian pepperberry.
review_description: It’s my favourite! I’ve been using this for quite a while now. My skin looks and feels more clear, more vibrant and gets rid of any redness!

what_it_is: An exfoliating toning solution with seven percent glycolic acid, amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng, and tasmanian pepperberry.
review_description: Love love this product. Helps clear up my skin and breakouts. Stings a tiny bit sometimes when applied but doesn’t last long at all. I’ve bought this item several times.

what_it_is: A leave-on lip mask that soothes and moisturizes for smoother, more supple lips overnight.
review_description: This is the best lip mask ever! You really can tell the difference in one use.

what_it_is: A leave-on lip mask that soothes and moisturizes for smoother, more supple lips overnight.
review_description: This works. I moved to a place higher up altitude wise (you’d never believe how much your hair, skin and nails react to a change in altitude after a month, none of my old products worked as well for me I had to find new things). The air and water where I live now is a bit harsh on my skin. So my lips got dryer than usual. This fixed that problem. I put it on every night. The tatcha one didn’t work for me at all. After 2 weeks my lips got worse with tat ha. After a few days of this my lips weren’t dry anymore. Honestly my only complaint is actually the size. There’s so much product and the shelf life is long. Which you think would be great right? But I have already left this in 2 places where I couldn’t go back to retrieve it. And I’m not going to have someone mail me back my used lip balm lol. I like this so much that I’ve repurchased. But it would be nice if it was half its size and cost less since I’m one to misplace and lose small items like this. Still 5 stars though. Me being ditzy and misplacing things has nothing to do with the fact that this feels nice on the lips and is very hydrating. And when I put it on at night it’s still there in the am. It really lasts a long time.

what_it_is: A leave-on lip mask that soothes and moisturizes for smoother, more supple lips overnight.
review_description: Love it! I noticed the benefits right away and loved the scent.

what_it_is: A leave-on lip mask that soothes and moisturizes for smoother, more supple lips overnight.
review_title: Best product for soft moist lips overnight
review_description: It has been a fact of my life that I have to leave lip balms all over the house for my dry lips.  I also have a few bedside for late night/early morning bathroom breaks.  Since I've been using this product, no more reapplying to dry lips.  My lips stay moist right through the night and are even still soft in the morning.

what_it_is: A leave-on lip mask that soothes and moisturizes for smoother, more supple lips overnight.
review_description: This product is absolutely fantastic. After applying for 2 nights consequently, my lips got softer and pink. Definitely recommending the product to people who have chapped/ dry lips.

what_it_is: A leave-on lip mask that soothes and moisturizes for smoother, more supple lips overnight.
review_description: I personally have pretty dry lips so I was quite excited to try this product as i’ve seen such good reviews. However, I dont feel as though it lives up to the hype. It gets the job done but I feel like vaseline could perform just as good as well. Just not worth the money in my opinion.

what_it_is: A leave-on lip mask that soothes and moisturizes for smoother, more supple lips overnight.
review_description: Had never tried a lip mask before. Love that it comes with an applicator so you can easily swipe on before bed without making a mess. It has a light fruity smell - not obtrusive if you’re scent-sensitive - that reminds me of lip smackers! More importantly, it leaves my lips feeling hydrated all day. I don’t even use lip chap during the day anymore. Highly recommend if you’re looking for something to soothe your lips as part of your bedtime routine. Looking forward to trying a new flavour (if this ever runs out - it’s quite large, considering how little you use in one go!).

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: An overnight mask that thoroughly hydrates, plumps, and brightens with THD ascorbate (vitamin C), antioxidant-rich superberries, squalane, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I love this face mask!!! After using my face looks brighter, healthier, and hydrated. I love that its not too greasy. Yes, its a bit pricey but its worth every penny. This jar will last sometime too.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: An overnight mask that thoroughly hydrates, plumps, and brightens with THD ascorbate (vitamin C), antioxidant-rich superberries, squalane, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I really enjoy this. I use it on the nights that I use the YTTP toner and really enjoy it.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: An overnight mask that thoroughly hydrates, plumps, and brightens with THD ascorbate (vitamin C), antioxidant-rich superberries, squalane, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: This is my all-time favorite night mask. I actually use it first thing in the morning while I do my morning routine and wash it off after my workout. It can also be used over top of your normal nightly skin care routine and is especially hydrating during dry winter months. Gives my skin the perfect glow!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: An overnight mask that thoroughly hydrates, plumps, and brightens with THD ascorbate (vitamin C), antioxidant-rich superberries, squalane, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: Ok so I dont do well with most moisturizers because my skin started to be so sensitive with breaking out...but I got this as a sample and I love it honestly yes I still get the hormonal break outs but have noticed a difference with just a small amount in the texture and color of my skin...I will be buying and adding this to my routine. It's really good I would recomend giving it a shot.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: An overnight mask that thoroughly hydrates, plumps, and brightens with THD ascorbate (vitamin C), antioxidant-rich superberries, squalane, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I love this mask can see results in just one use .

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: An overnight mask that thoroughly hydrates, plumps, and brightens with THD ascorbate (vitamin C), antioxidant-rich superberries, squalane, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: Whenever I feel like my lipid barrier/acid mantle is compromised, this mask is my go-to. It heals irritation, redness, flakes, and tightness overnight. I also love it for wintertime dryness from running the heater at night and when traveling to difference climates. It smells so good too! I’ve been using this as needed for about a year and a half and I have no complaints. I wouldn’t use it after exfoliating because it’s pretty thick and oily and might cause breakouts but I don’t have any breakouts from it if I don’t exfoliate right before. I think this mask is worth the price and highly recommend it.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Fine lines and wrinkles
what_it_is: An overnight mask that thoroughly hydrates, plumps, and brightens with THD ascorbate (vitamin C), antioxidant-rich superberries, squalane, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description:
Pros: Moisturizing, doesn’t break me out, smells damn good.

Cons: Just another good smelling moisturizer out there. Not HG status, not sure why it’s best of beauty for Allure. No noticible effects of the Vitamin C. I will use it, but will not repurchase.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A cult-favorite retinol and lactic acid serum that improves the look of lines and wrinkles, dark spots, and blemishes for visibly glowing, youthful-looking skin.
review_description:
This is my first time using retinol. I have combination skin I tend to lean more dry in the winter months and oily in the summer months. I use it every 2 - 3 days. It is very drying so I recommend sandwiching the product with a serum. I use it only at night so so my steps are 

1. cleanser 
2. Toner 
3. eye cream 
4. Serum:  Super Bounce by glossier its Hyaluronic acid w/ vitamin B5 
5. Shani Darden Retinol Reform 
6. Youth to the people super berry hydrate and glow sleep mask.

If your'e not a sleep mask person you can follow up with your serum again, then a couple dabs of your moisturizer. Then Night Night :)

This product is a marathon not a race. You'll start seeing changes over time. Buy the smaller size to give it a try!

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A cult-favorite retinol and lactic acid serum that improves the look of lines and wrinkles, dark spots, and blemishes for visibly glowing, youthful-looking skin.
review_description: Unfortunately, whatever potential effects this product provides is null and void due to the fact that it pilled off my face immediately when attempting to incorporate into my nighttime routine. Absolutely unacceptable, especially given the price point. Thank goodness it was just a sample.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A cult-favorite retinol and lactic acid serum that improves the look of lines and wrinkles, dark spots, and blemishes for visibly glowing, youthful-looking skin.
review_description: This is the most money I've shelved out on a beauty product and I'm quite disappointed. Most of us aren't fortunate enough to get free samples, maybe with this type of price point you could sale a smaller version. It didn't cause any breakouts, no bad smell but there's no miraculous difference in a month's time.  I will continue to use after all I've paid for it. If something changes I will certainly write another review notating that! I really wanted to love this!

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A cult-favorite retinol and lactic acid serum that improves the look of lines and wrinkles, dark spots, and blemishes for visibly glowing, youthful-looking skin.
review_description: I've never rated a product on sephora before but felt like I had to. This retinol is amazing! I saw results after just 1 time using it. I have very dry skin in the winter, am battling mask-ne during COVID, and my skin can be super sensitive to new products. The first time I used this was at night. Washed my face and did 2-3 pumps on my face/neck. Followed up 20 mins later with moisturizer and went to bed. Woke up and my skin looked amazing! it also helped with some of the acne/blemishes. I am so excited to have finally found a retinol that works!

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A cult-favorite retinol and lactic acid serum that improves the look of lines and wrinkles, dark spots, and blemishes for visibly glowing, youthful-looking skin.
review_description: Had huge hopes & was super excited to try. So glad I only purchased the small size. Aside from drying my skin out, literally made no difference at all.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A cult-favorite retinol and lactic acid serum that improves the look of lines and wrinkles, dark spots, and blemishes for visibly glowing, youthful-looking skin.
review_description: I heard such great things about this but the day after I used this my skin was so dry, flaky, and irritated. My cheeks were so red and my skin honestly hurt. I just couldn’t put it on again. I don’t even have sensitive skin either and I’m not sensitive to retinol. Not sure what happened here but it definitely wasn’t for me. A lot of people swear by this though.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A cult-favorite retinol and lactic acid serum that improves the look of lines and wrinkles, dark spots, and blemishes for visibly glowing, youthful-looking skin.
review_description: I love this product but the delivery system on the mini size is complete garbage.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_description: If I could only have one product on a deserted island this would be it. I have read there is no science to support the claims of this product, but for me, the proof is on my face. I have sensitive, dry skin and this essence balances my skin after cleansing, is very soothing, and has improved the texture and luminosity of my skin. It also works great to heal sunburns. I even noticed the difference on my palms from patting this onto my face. Amazing!

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_title: Doesn’t seem to do much after a year of using it
review_description: I’ve been using this product for about a year now and while it doesn’t cause redness or irritation, I’m just not sure if it’s doing anything else. It hasn’t minimized any fine lines and it doesn’t seem to tone my skin. I use it every night, so I expected more obvious results especially when paired with the moisturizer, which I use once or twice a week. I think you’re paying for the brand on this one more than anything.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_description: I really did not want to like this product because of the price. So I tried Rihanna‘s Fenty skin care Fat Water and it does not compare to this. Period

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_description: My husband noticed that my skin looked nice after the first day of using it - however I did start using a few other products too and used a facial steamer right before. Trying to only use this in the morning instead of AM and PM to make it last longer. It's expensive but worth it so far.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_title: tatcha is better, smells pretty foul
review_description: Better than not using an essence I guess? The scent is definitely like an old sharpie marker and I don’t think it works as good as the Tatcha one, in my opinion. I definitely have into the hype. I’d try something else before this one.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_description: I was hesitant to buy it since it was quite pricey, but I'm glad I did. It really does brighten up my skin and I can't stress how good this product is! The only thing I hate is the pungent smell. It'll take some time getting used to, but it's worth it!

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_description: pricey...purchase during a VIB sale for the best deal. this has worked well for my sensitive, oily, acne prone skin. over time it has become clearer so I purchased the sheet mask as well.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A lightweight night cream powered by antioxidant-rich super lotus that helps skin recover overnight for a more youthful look by morning.
review_description: This moisturizer smells wonderful and leaves my skin so soft and glow-y!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A lightweight night cream powered by antioxidant-rich super lotus that helps skin recover overnight for a more youthful look by morning.
review_description: I really love this product!! I didn’t want to like it because it’s a little pricey, but it definitely exceeded expectations! I am buying for the second time because I’ve tried so many other night creams that just don’t compare. Even when my skin was burning from another product, I put this on and instant relief. It smells amazing but not too heavy on the fragrance. My face feels so smooth and hydrated when I wake up!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A lightweight night cream powered by antioxidant-rich super lotus that helps skin recover overnight for a more youthful look by morning.
review_description: I bought this with high hopes after reading reviews. However this product did nothing for me. The smell and rich texture did not leave my skin feeling soft or hydrated. It truly made no difference and for a product this expensive, i dont want to wakeup each morning with a dry face. I returned it, sadly. If your skin is dry this will not give a dewy effect/feeling you expect from a luxury product.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A lightweight night cream powered by antioxidant-rich super lotus that helps skin recover overnight for a more youthful look by morning.
review_description: First off, let me start off by saying I NEVERR repurchase the same moisturizer because I like trying new things and I’m also pretty picky with moisturizer. When I first used this I LOVED it right away. I would wake up with hydrated and glowy skin. Not only are the ingredients great but it didn’t leave my skin feeling oily or greasy. After I finished my first jar, I thought I’d try a different night cream. Although that night cream was okay, nothing made my skin feel the way it did with this moisturizer! I had to repurchase. I have combination dry skin so it really worked wonders on me!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A lightweight night cream powered by antioxidant-rich super lotus that helps skin recover overnight for a more youthful look by morning.
review_title: Came back today to buy the full size
review_description:
Never thought I would recommend a night cream - have stuck with the Ordinary products for so long that spending more seems almost dumb, but I got this mini as a sample and used it for 3 weeks (because it lasted that long). I sleep with a fan on so my face definitely gets chapped in the deep winter (but my place has hot water rads so it's too hot to sleep without even in February.) 
This is light, smells lovely, and I woke up the first morning, and have been waking up each successive morning, with baby-soft skin that has not had any issues at all.
I have some light eczema around my eyes as well and this did not hurt or burn the skin at all. Came back today to buy the full size. Very happy.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A lightweight night cream powered by antioxidant-rich super lotus that helps skin recover overnight for a more youthful look by morning.
review_description: Great night cream. It is thick enough for night, but not greasy or oily.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A lightweight night cream powered by antioxidant-rich super lotus that helps skin recover overnight for a more youthful look by morning.
