review_description: I love this cream and how my skin feels in the morning. My skin is dry/sensitive, and I’m glad I copped this in time for the frigid weather.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A concentrated serum balm that addresses tired skin by minimizing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and texture for smoother-looking eyes.
review_description: It’s not what I was expecting, but it is hydrating. For the price it’s not what I was hoping for, and it goes quickly.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A concentrated serum balm that addresses tired skin by minimizing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and texture for smoother-looking eyes.
review_description: Ive waited 2 weeks to write a honest review,,, it definitely tones down dark circles all over eye area i was surprised it worked! As car as the fine lines and wrinkles i see some improvement in the lines that are smaller already but for sure a forever staple,, because it works!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A concentrated serum balm that addresses tired skin by minimizing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and texture for smoother-looking eyes.
review_description: I didn’t expect it to really work!! But it did. I work a lot ,and have long nights, usually wake up with circles,and puffy eyes. Since i started using it, I don’t have all this anymore, my eyed look relaxed. So happy with this purchase

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A concentrated serum balm that addresses tired skin by minimizing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and texture for smoother-looking eyes.
review_title: perfect for under eye dryness from masks
review_description: This product is absolutely amazing. I have recently started using retinol that is safe for the under eye area and was super excited to try this. Price point is great compared to some of the medical grade skin products and results are amazing. With having to wear masks at work constantly for 12 hours my eyes have suffered the most and this along with some aquafor has saved them.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A concentrated serum balm that addresses tired skin by minimizing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and texture for smoother-looking eyes.
review_description: Great item.  It looks beautiful on my vanity, and it works well.  I use it overnight - since retinol is light sensitive, that's what typically recommended.  When I wake up in the morning, my undereye skin area feels firm and less wrinkly.  We just have to be careful of not pulling on the skin too much when applying!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A concentrated serum balm that addresses tired skin by minimizing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and texture for smoother-looking eyes.
review_description: I bought this product because it’s clean and inexpensive. It really surprised me how powerful it is. I have been using for about a week and the skin around my eyes is peeling after applying it every other day. I’m very disappointed in the delivery of the product though. It’s convenient  but drags around the eye area. I’m 57 and I don’t have wrinkles and I don’t want to get them fro all the pulling. I am going to keep it and use it as a spot treatment for hyperpigmentation but not around my eyes. Also, I have seen several people say that it tugs their eyelids. I would never recommend using a retinol product on the lids and I don’t see where it instructs you to do so.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A concentrated serum balm that addresses tired skin by minimizing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and texture for smoother-looking eyes.
review_description: Love that this gives retinol in and easy apply form and you can throw it in your travel bag!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling three-in-one face wash that gently melts away makeup and mascara (without the sting!), removes impurities, and tones for clean, balanced skin.
review_description: This face cleanser is AMAZING. Very moisturizing and my skin is glowing and so smooth after I use it. I was given two samples of this inside sephora and I went online and purchased it after the first use. Two tiny sample packets lasted me several uses -at least 3 each so this product goes a LONG way.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling three-in-one face wash that gently melts away makeup and mascara (without the sting!), removes impurities, and tones for clean, balanced skin.
review_description: I really like this cleanser for everyday use. It’s got good cleansing power and leaves my skin feeling refreshed but not dry. The only thing I don’t like is it has a very liquid consistency, so I always end up squeezing out more than I need and therefore go through it fast.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling three-in-one face wash that gently melts away makeup and mascara (without the sting!), removes impurities, and tones for clean, balanced skin.
review_description: Super gentle cleanser with no harsh smells. I wouldn’t use this as my nightly cleanse though.. I feel like it’s not strong enough to get off my makeup, spf, and just daily grime. It’s nice as a second cleanser or to use in the morning. Leaves my skin feeling hydrated and nourished afterwards.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling three-in-one face wash that gently melts away makeup and mascara (without the sting!), removes impurities, and tones for clean, balanced skin.
review_description: Finally a face wash that is gentle and doesn’t dry out the skin. I have tried countless face washes and this one is the best one yet. It also removes makeup leaving your skin feel fresh and clean.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling three-in-one face wash that gently melts away makeup and mascara (without the sting!), removes impurities, and tones for clean, balanced skin.
review_description: I wish this wasn’t so fragranced as it made my sensitive skin burn.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling three-in-one face wash that gently melts away makeup and mascara (without the sting!), removes impurities, and tones for clean, balanced skin.
review_description: Overall great cleanser!  One of my favourite! Leaves skin feeling super clean!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A bestselling three-in-one face wash that gently melts away makeup and mascara (without the sting!), removes impurities, and tones for clean, balanced skin.
review_description: didn't work well on me. It made my skin uncomfortable when apply. The worst thing is that the product could not remove mascara as it claimed.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Pores, Dark spots
what_it_is: An all-in-one AHA treatment, powered by lactic acid, that clarifies, smooths, and retexturizes the appearance of skin.
review_description: This stuff works like non other to exfoliate dead surface skin and clean out pores. It's expensive so I don't buy it often, but I wish I could. It makes my skin so smooth, and shrinks my pores like crazy.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Pores, Dark spots
what_it_is: An all-in-one AHA treatment, powered by lactic acid, that clarifies, smooths, and retexturizes the appearance of skin.
review_title: TWO WHOLE DAYS and I am IN LOVE!!!
review_description:
My sensitive, combination 45 year old skin loves this. I was slightly worried about how I would react but I really need to know why I am just finding out about this. I don't have bad skin but this east coast winter is rough on a sista. Correction, I didn't think I had bad skin but one night after applying this makes me think otherwise because I woke up with baby smooth, plump and amazing toned skin. I don't really feel like typing everything else wonderful that happened. Just get it!

Routine - EV-ER-Y TIME I wash my face followed by The Inkey List Hyaluronic Acid Serum, Fenty Skin Fat Water, and Sephora HYA All Day Hydrator. 

Pros -  BOMB SKIN HONEY BABIES...BOMB!

Cons - My bank account because I will be re-ordering as long as they make it. Period.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Pores, Dark spots
what_it_is: An all-in-one AHA treatment, powered by lactic acid, that clarifies, smooths, and retexturizes the appearance of skin.
review_description: LOVE! I get eczema, redness, and irritation frequently (& break outs here and there) and this usually does the trick! I’m especially impressed since the only other product that calms my eczema is steroid creams so I feel a lot more comfortable using this than steroid creams! I like the smell and texture too. Occasionally it stings but that goes away after a minute or too. My face almost instantly clears up after using this, but real results are shown the next morning (I use this before bed). Overall I love this product. Only downside is the high price.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Pores, Dark spots
what_it_is: An all-in-one AHA treatment, powered by lactic acid, that clarifies, smooths, and retexturizes the appearance of skin.
review_description:
This stuff if the holy grail! I rarely write reviews but often find myself reading them before I purchase.
I also rarely rebuy a skincare product unless I’ve seen a difference. I’m 43 and I don’t have a ton of aging but have some sun spots and fine lines and this stuff is like Botox in a bottle. I absolutely love it. I use it morning and night and I noticed a difference right away.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Pores, Dark spots
what_it_is: An all-in-one AHA treatment, powered by lactic acid, that clarifies, smooths, and retexturizes the appearance of skin.
review_description: I felt my cystic acne coming up and put on the sample on and the next day it was COMPLELETY gone. I will be purchasing, even though the price hurts. Worth it. I feel like my face is so clean, exfoliated, but it doesnt take any moisture away. I'm hooked and obsessed.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Pores, Dark spots
what_it_is: An all-in-one AHA treatment, powered by lactic acid, that clarifies, smooths, and retexturizes the appearance of skin.
review_description:
Okay I will say that at first I balked at the price, because YIKES that’s a lot for a serum, but after getting the smaller size in a kit with the cleanser, I’m sold. 

This is hands down the best exfoliating serum I’ve used. It’s gentle enough for daily use, doesn’t irritate my dry sensitive skin, and I’ve started noticing visible results within a few weeks, especially on my neck

For anyone who uses retinol nightly I definitely recommend this to use the next day! (Side note from your friendly neighborhood esthetician: don’t use this or any exfoliants at the same time that you use your retinol! It lessens the efficacy of both products if you combine them at the same time)

Love a lactic acid treatment that works for any skin type! Cannot recommend this enough

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An AHA/BHA night serum that resurfaces congested skin by lifting away dead skin cells to visibly improve skin tone, texture, fine lines, wrinkles, and pores.
review_description: if you’re thinking about buying this... please do for your own sake. i have had stubborn acne since i was 11, i’m 20 now and using this consistently has CLEARED MY SKIN. i know it’s pricy, but it has lasted me more than a few months. a MUST HAVE!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An AHA/BHA night serum that resurfaces congested skin by lifting away dead skin cells to visibly improve skin tone, texture, fine lines, wrinkles, and pores.
review_description: As a 22 year old college student, I have tirelessly struggled for years with hormonal and terrible cystic acne. I have been on medication for years for it. NOTHING has made such a drastic impact as this product. After one use my skin was literally glowing. After 2 weeks of use, my acne scars have started to go away, my mask-ne has diminished, my face is overall SUPER smooth and soft, and my acne is contained all together. I am very pleased with this product and will continue to purchase! Truly a miracle.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Pores, Dark spots
what_it_is: An all-in-one AHA treatment, powered by lactic acid, that clarifies, smooths, and retexturizes the appearance of skin.
review_title: I can’t live without this stuff!
review_description: I’ve been using this for a few months now and OMG is this stuff good. I have acne, dark spots and pores. This has cleared my skin so much. I get compliments all the time and get asked how’s my skins so smooth? I definitely recommend this product along with U.F.O oil. Together they work so well.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An AHA/BHA night serum that resurfaces congested skin by lifting away dead skin cells to visibly improve skin tone, texture, fine lines, wrinkles, and pores.
review_description: The first time I used this it broke me out something wicked. I was using way too much every..single..night. It’s a great product, but ease into it if you have sensitive skin. Every other night or even every third night. Also cutting it with something, like the marula oil. You really can stray outside of the line too. There was a time when I was just using the DE exclusively, and there are many who swear by the brand. I find myself looking elsewhere for certain skincare needs, but this will always be a mainstay in my night routine

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An AHA/BHA night serum that resurfaces congested skin by lifting away dead skin cells to visibly improve skin tone, texture, fine lines, wrinkles, and pores.
review_description: I was looking for a night serum that would smoothen out my textured skin so after seeing many YouTube videos/great reviews about this I decided to try it out. Unfortunately, I didn’t notice a difference in my skin after using it for a couple of weeks. I changed cleansers to see if maybe it was working against them and took a couple things out of my routine but it truthfully was just not working for me. I really really wanted to love this product but it’s not worth the $90 in my opinion.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An AHA/BHA night serum that resurfaces congested skin by lifting away dead skin cells to visibly improve skin tone, texture, fine lines, wrinkles, and pores.
review_description: Got this in a kit and was so excited to try it, but it was so sticky on my face that I got up and wiped it off like 10 minutes later. No thx.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An AHA/BHA night serum that resurfaces congested skin by lifting away dead skin cells to visibly improve skin tone, texture, fine lines, wrinkles, and pores.
review_description: 2 stars for the ingredients contained and getting people used to and unafriad of acids but this is not miraculous. It came in the  hydrating duo with their mask. It’s a decent combo but I have used serums and hydrating masks with much better results. This is better than nothing though...

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Pores, Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An AHA/BHA night serum that resurfaces congested skin by lifting away dead skin cells to visibly improve skin tone, texture, fine lines, wrinkles, and pores.
review_description: 2 stars for the ingredients contained and getting people used to and unafriad of acids but this is not miraculous. It came in the  hydrating duo with their mask. It’s a decent combo but I have used serums and hydrating masks with much better results. This is better than nothing though...

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles, and Pores
what_it_is: A pro-quality AHA/BHA "facial" that resurfaces skin to visibly reveal greater clarity, improved skin texture and tone, and a more youthful-looking appearance.
review_description: I don't often give a one star review but I had two issues w/this product: 1)the tube that delivers product to the pump broke after just a few uses and 2)it stings horribly. I'd have returned it but I don't want to go to stores right now during the pandemic. That being said, I can say I highly recommend the Protini cream.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles, and Pores
what_it_is: A pro-quality AHA/BHA "facial" that resurfaces skin to visibly reveal greater clarity, improved skin texture and tone, and a more youthful-looking appearance.
review_description: I use this mask every Sunday. It’s become an absolute staple in my skin care routine. Helps keep breakouts at bay and my skin is the softest/smoothest it’s ever been. Absolutely recommend 10/10

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles, and Pores
what_it_is: A pro-quality AHA/BHA "facial" that resurfaces skin to visibly reveal greater clarity, improved skin texture and tone, and a more youthful-looking appearance.
review_description: Love this mask! I have been using this mask for about a year now, just once a week rarely twice...my advice is DO NOt leave it on longer than 20 minutes, I did once and it made my face super red. This size is a great size for me with my 1x a week use- leaves my face super soft and smooth.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles, and Pores
what_it_is: A pro-quality AHA/BHA "facial" that resurfaces skin to visibly reveal greater clarity, improved skin texture and tone, and a more youthful-looking appearance.
review_description: This is a great product. It really does help keep your skin clear. It does burn at first but it gets less intense the more you use it. Now this is no fault of the product and solely on me but PLEASE ensure you do not use this past the 12M expiration date. I made that mistake last night not really thinking how long I’ve had it. It burnt me so badly that I had to soak my face with cold water. This morning, I woke up to a beet red face and it itches terribly (I never have bad reactions to anything!) Definitely keep track of when you purchase so this doesn’t happen to you.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles, and Pores
what_it_is: A pro-quality AHA/BHA "facial" that resurfaces skin to visibly reveal greater clarity, improved skin texture and tone, and a more youthful-looking appearance.
review_description:
24 Hours After you do a 20 minute mask with Babyfacial all your pimples and bumps are dry and are ready to be remedied. I literally don’t know what I’d do without this...I do it about every 10 days and haven’t had any problems for over a year now. It’s expensive but so worth it + it last forever! 

For reference:
I have *had* small non white head breakout bumps all around my chin and occasional acne breakouts

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles, and Pores
what_it_is: A pro-quality AHA/BHA "facial" that resurfaces skin to visibly reveal greater clarity, improved skin texture and tone, and a more youthful-looking appearance.
review_title: This mask is 100 and WORTH THE MONEY
review_description: My top favorite weekly mask. It burns a little but really works. I would recommend over anything if you’re looking to buy one not so cheap mask where you see a difference, this is it. The smoothness and softness you feel after using is 100 and worth the money. I am also a huge fan or Erno Laslzo. <3

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles, and Pores
what_it_is: A pro-quality AHA/BHA "facial" that resurfaces skin to visibly reveal greater clarity, improved skin texture and tone, and a more youthful-looking appearance.
review_title: Good but not as effective as the night serum
review_description: It’s good, but not great. I feel like it does help make your skin look slightly brighter and more even, but for the price, you’re better off getting the TLC Framboos glycolic night serum, which I feel is much more effective, especially with hyperpigmentation and evening skin tone. However, this isn’t a bad product and I know a lot of people who love it. It does tingle slightly when you first put it on, and does leave my skin slightly red after removal, but that seems to go away by morning, even with my sensitive skin.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dullness and uneven texture, Acne and blemishes
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with seven acids to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles, acne scars, pores, and shine.
review_title: Good, but not great given the cost
review_description: This is an excellent exfoliant! I used this every day without irritation or breakouts. I definitely noticed that my skin was smoother and more even toned after using this; however, the effects don’t last and as soon as I stopped using the product my skin ultimately returned to normal. If you can afford to buy this consistently then I would recommend this for daily exfoliation, but otherwise I have achieved similar if not equal results from using the Ordinary’s AHA peel twice a week.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dullness and uneven texture, Acne and blemishes
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with seven acids to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles, acne scars, pores, and shine.
review_description: Ugh I’m so thankful for this product. I’ve always struggled with acne and this is the one product I can confidently say has helped manage it. I’ve been using for a few months now and have been gifted with noticeable results (less acne, smoother skin, brighter complexion) I can’t wait to see how my skin looks after a year.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dullness and uneven texture, Acne and blemishes
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with seven acids to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles, acne scars, pores, and shine.
review_description: I was nervous to use these at first because my skin can be sensitive. However, I’m SO glad I did! My face broke out around my nose and chin for almost a month, and left some scarring. Now that my zits are gone I used this treatment and immediately saw the discoloring go down and my skin feels SO soft. I’m excited to see what happens on the next use. I did follow up with a serum and intense hydrating lotion to prevent dry skin and another breakout.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dullness and uneven texture, Acne and blemishes
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with seven acids to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles, acne scars, pores, and shine.
review_title: it’s certainly worth it too me.
review_description: I never write reviews. But.... I think the photos speak for themselves. My skin was instantly less inflamed. My scars are really healing. I am going to get a laser treatment eventually but this is my skin half way through a box. Honestly I’ve never had acne so I can’t speak too how it difficult it can be to cure long term, I had a bad allergic reaction that turned into cystic acne and I was absolutely horrified. But thanks to these pads my skin feels so much better. And it’s really healing. I’m sure when the red eventually fades for good I’ll be left with something fixable.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dullness and uneven texture, Acne and blemishes
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with seven acids to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles, acne scars, pores, and shine.
review_description: My skin is very recalcitrant and I have thrown so many products at it over the years just to see no results or improvements whatsoever—usually I just break out. For the first time a product actually had a noticeable positive effect after one week (5 days) of use. I’m pretty impressed to be honest. Got it in the sample, have since bought a box. Really great product.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dullness and uneven texture, Acne and blemishes
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with seven acids to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles, acne scars, pores, and shine.
review_description: These are life changing! I love them! My skin has never looked better - smooth and glowy!

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dullness and uneven texture, Acne and blemishes
what_it_is: A patented two-step anti-aging AHA/BHA peel pad pre-dosed with seven acids to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles, acne scars, pores, and shine.
review_description: It’s no surprise this product has almost 5 stars from thousands of reviews.  It is a miracle worker and I have turned so many onto using them.  I use these pads twice weekly, before bed and they leave my skin looking porcelain by morning.  Pores are extremely minimized, texture disappears and when I’m getting a pimple under the skin, two of these treatments get rid of it all together.  It sounds dramatic, but I can’t and won’t live without these pads lol.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A potent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve signs of photoaging.
review_description: Love this, on my second bottle right now. My hyperpigmentation has been improved, protects my skin from pollution because in the days that I didn’t use it my skin would look like “dull” and I really like this. But I recommend buying the serum from the Drunk Elephant website, it’s fresh and last a lot longer. Meanwhile with Sephora the first one that I bought was really brown already. Buy the c-firma from their website if you want it fresh.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A potent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve signs of photoaging.
review_description: Unas de mis favoritas la recomiendo 100%. Huele medio raro pero :) es la mejor

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A potent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve signs of photoaging.
review_description: Like others have said, this product is amazing. You have to get over the stickiness and the smell, but once you do, the results are incredible. Dark spots started to appear on my hands and face after I turned 30. I thought that was just the progression of aging. I apply this serum with my right hand and the spots on my right hand are almost completely gone, and the spots on my face are lightening up. I started to put it on the spots on my left hand and they’re beginning to fade. I bought this product in the littles package and will definitely be buying the full size once I’m out. Amazing!!!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A potent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve signs of photoaging.
review_description: Soooooo not here to slam DE but I have noticed a change in the effectiveness of their products over time. As of now I've been using the C-firma serum every day for 2.5 years and I'm feeling that it no longer plumps or tightens my skin like it used to. I had no issues with DE before I had to wear a mask every day, but I feel like now it's not strong enough to handle the buildup of bacteria under the masks. Highly recommend Good Genes by Sunday Riley mixed with the CEO glow to achieve a similar, better result. Again, used to love DE and had ALL of their skincare line so that's why I gave it 4 stars. This product was effective for me at one point, just not sure it holds up under prolonged use.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A potent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve signs of photoaging.
review_title: #1 Vitamic C Serum! Keep in fridge!
review_description: I absolutely love this serum, I’ve found that keeping it in my skincare fridge as lengthened the life of the product and keeps that nice goldy color. When i used my very first time a few years back I wouldn’t use it every day and it would get super dark. But once learning about ingredients and how keeping it in the fridge has helped keep it stable i am obsessed for longer. Do i love the $80 price tag? No. BUT Drunk Elephant makes amazing products & I rust their ingredients and you get what you pay for. QUALITY

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A potent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve signs of photoaging.
review_description: I was excited to finally give this a try to help with my hyper pigmentation and acne scarring, however after almost three months of use I see no results. Instead I get lots of little breakouts on the areas I apply it to :( I already have oily skin and this leaves it feeling worse and more greasy than it already is. I use the night time serum and I have no issues with it, but this one is pretty bad, and not worth the money.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A potent vitamin C day serum packed with antioxidants, nutrients, and fruit enzymes to visibly firm, brighten, and improve signs of photoaging.
review_description: Haven’t found a vitamin c serum I like more.. despite the price tag. It’s potent enough for my skin type/concerns, and I do feel like it tightens up my skin as well. It smells a little bit like pumpkin, but the smell isn’t strong and doesn’t linger. I love that it comes in a pump too. It can be a little tacky feeling after applied to the skin, but I just put moisturizer/spf over it and it layers just fine.

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An exfoliating solution to help fight visible blemishes and improve the look of skin texture and radiance.
review_title: The BEST exfoliant, but DON'T BE LIKE ME
review_description:
I love this product, which is why I'm giving it the 5 stars it deserves. I'm on my second bottle, but I just wanted to write on here to remind people to use this carefully, as 30% AHA is pretty potent and you could get chemical burns like I did last night bc I did not use it properly.

After waxing my upper/lower lip, I reached for this because it had been a while since I had last used it, and I wanted to shrink my blackheads/pores across my nose/cheeks. However, I should have avoided the areas on my face I had just waxed, bc I got mild chemical burns on the areas of fresh, new skin at the corners of my lips... Nothing that can't be fixed using Aquaphor, Cetaphil cream, and sunscreen, but still, I should have been smarter to avoid the damage. The blackheads/pores on my nose/cheeks are much smaller though, so at least that's a win. 

Just remember that this should be used alone to stay on the safe side. I would also avoid using this in combination with any other active ingredients (Vitamin C, Vitamin A (retinol/retinoids), etc.). I learned my lesson last night, and will remember to avoid using it after exfoliating/facial waxing, too. Hope this helps!

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An exfoliating solution to help fight visible blemishes and improve the look of skin texture and radiance.
review_description:
I have been using this product twice weekly for 2 years and haven’t had a single breakout. This is a new formulation - I think they added much more pink/red dye to make the color pop for instagramming and the efficacy seems to have significantly fallen off. After opening up and using this new bottle I recently had my first breakout. 
I am the biggest proponent of The Ordinary. I have converted SO many people and am disappointed. Hopefully switching to the mandeleic acid will yield results as it is much less gimmicky...

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An exfoliating solution to help fight visible blemishes and improve the look of skin texture and radiance.
review_description: Really amazing product but really hard to apply without getting it all over the place. i got it in my eye and it hurt so bad but at least my skin is soft!

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An exfoliating solution to help fight visible blemishes and improve the look of skin texture and radiance.
review_description: I bought this after a dermatologist I follow suggested using it to lighten dark armpits. I decided to use it on my face as well, since I have some hyperpigmentation and dry patches. I left on for exactly 10 mins (underarms and face) and I followed with a facial massage w/ moisturizer and luxe oil. My skin feels clean and I plan on waiting a week before I use it again, just to see how my skin reacts. So far, worth the price and I hope to see results soon.

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An exfoliating solution to help fight visible blemishes and improve the look of skin texture and radiance.
review_description: Amazing product. Makes my skin look brighter and even, while smoothening out the texture of my skin. I absolutely love this product! And so affordable. I’ve been using it for a few years and will never look for anything else.

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An exfoliating solution to help fight visible blemishes and improve the look of skin texture and radiance.
review_description: Can I just say that I love this product? Great at exfoliation and my skin is softer and just looks cleaner. I use this 1-2x a week for 10mins each time. This product got me obsessed with this line of products.

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An exfoliating solution to help fight visible blemishes and improve the look of skin texture and radiance.
review_description: I’m new to this product and was so excited to try it. It left my face feeling fresh and energized. Looking forward to seeing the long term effects. And yes, I love the purple color…

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A cool drink of water for thirsty skin, this hydrating serum visibly replenishes the complexion and improves the look of skin texture and tone.
review_description: I will say that this product isn’t bad but....it definitely is not worth the price. I paired it with the ultra repair moisturizer so maybe that was my mistake but my extremely dry skin was generally the same while using this product.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A cool drink of water for thirsty skin, this hydrating serum visibly replenishes the complexion and improves the look of skin texture and tone.
review_description: I really don’t notice a difference using this product. Couple that with the high price point, I won’t be purchasing again

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A cool drink of water for thirsty skin, this hydrating serum visibly replenishes the complexion and improves the look of skin texture and tone.
review_description: Sinks in quickly and doesn’t have much of a scent at all. I’m not sure if I can justify the price tag yet.. but I also have yet to finish this product and it’s been maybe a year.. so maybe it is worth it?!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A cool drink of water for thirsty skin, this hydrating serum visibly replenishes the complexion and improves the look of skin texture and tone.
review_description: Consistency is sticky and I can FEEL it on my face for a while. I have other serums who don't have that feel and honestly I'd rather find something that doesn't feel so invasive on my face. For the price point the consistency could be more pleasing.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A cool drink of water for thirsty skin, this hydrating serum visibly replenishes the complexion and improves the look of skin texture and tone.
review_description: I love the DE line, but I don't see this making much of a difference in my skin! Save yourself the money and invest in the other products instead.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A cool drink of water for thirsty skin, this hydrating serum visibly replenishes the complexion and improves the look of skin texture and tone.
review_description: I loved this product and it helped clean my acne. I’m a teen was combination skin who was getting acne in my dry places and this has changed my skin so much. I haven’t had any acne since. I’m no longer dry and flaky. I totally recommend.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A cool drink of water for thirsty skin, this hydrating serum visibly replenishes the complexion and improves the look of skin texture and tone.
review_description: There is nothing spectacular about this serum. If anything, I feel like it breaks me out when I use it daily and leaves my skin feeling tacky when I use this. I’ve repurchased it many times out if the laziness of finding a new one. This is nice to have but does not feel essential for me. There has to be better hydrating serums out there. I’m breaking up with it.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A face oil rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 that moisturizes, nourishes, and visibly balances while restoring a youthful-looking glow.
review_description: Wonderful facial oil. I use it as my “serum” for a deep moisture before putting on an actual moisturizer cream. I four star it because of the price. I found some that work just as well, for 20-30$ cheaper.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A face oil rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 that moisturizes, nourishes, and visibly balances while restoring a youthful-looking glow.
review_description: This stuff amazing for face and hands. I had such dry hands/cuticles (felt like sand paper) from moving and I put this on for a couple days and my hands are back to normal. I also even put it on my brows for that extra shine factor. It also lasts a long time, so don’t be scared by the price. I’ve had my bottle for a year.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A face oil rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 that moisturizes, nourishes, and visibly balances while restoring a youthful-looking glow.
review_description: i have acne prone skin. have been on and off accutane, tried different creams to get rid of it, ect. the creams and accutane really dry your skin but wow this brightens it right back up and hydrates very quickly. my skin feels soft. high price tag, but if you are really struggling with hydrating your skin i would say it is worth it.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A face oil rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 that moisturizes, nourishes, and visibly balances while restoring a youthful-looking glow.
review_description: I’ve had this for a little under 2 years (with inconsistent use) and am finally starting to get to the end. I feel like there are similar oils out there for a cheaper price, but this is very nice and makes my skin feel plump and soft when I use it. I can see myself repurchasing in the future, but not in any rush to have a back-up on hand.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A face oil rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 that moisturizes, nourishes, and visibly balances while restoring a youthful-looking glow.
review_description: Great facial oil, and a little goes a really long way

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A face oil rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 that moisturizes, nourishes, and visibly balances while restoring a youthful-looking glow.
review_description: This is my moisturizer for life! It makes my skin so plump and glow. Unlike many moisturizers this does not make me break out! Every other drunk elephant product has made me break out but not this one. I use the Ordinary Buffet serum then apply this to my face and neck in the morning and evening. I can say my face isn’t dull anymore!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A face oil rich in critical antioxidants and omegas 6 and 9 that moisturizes, nourishes, and visibly balances while restoring a youthful-looking glow.
review_title: Will definitely need the bigger bottle soon!
review_description: Really loving this in my routine. Quite possibly my favorite serum for a moisturizer. It’s very effective, doesn’t feel oily or leave behind a residue, and just leaves skin feeling so comfortable. I’ll definitely be needing the bigger bottle when I run out.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, Oiliness
what_it_is: A refreshing, oil-free gel cream that provides a moisture boost and locks in hydration for up to 72 skin-quenching hours.
review_title: More for normal or combination skin than dry?
review_description: Really nice and lightweight, but it doesn’t feel intensely moisturising. I think if I didn’t have dry skin (and then extra dry skin in the Canadian winter), I would like it more than I did. That said, it’s not bad, and the consistency is smooth and lovely.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, Oiliness
what_it_is: A refreshing, oil-free gel cream that provides a moisture boost and locks in hydration for up to 72 skin-quenching hours.
review_description: I have oily skin and this moisturizer works great for me. It is super light, and keeps my skin hydrated and smooth throughout the day. It doesn't make my skin look oily either. Love it!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, Oiliness
what_it_is: A refreshing, oil-free gel cream that provides a moisture boost and locks in hydration for up to 72 skin-quenching hours.
review_description: Received in Sephora Skin Care Sample set. Very moisturizing and sinks right in. If I didn’t just buy LaLa from DE I would consider a full size purchase of this product.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, Oiliness
what_it_is: A refreshing, oil-free gel cream that provides a moisture boost and locks in hydration for up to 72 skin-quenching hours.
review_description: I love this moisturizer! I use it at night because it's not sticky and feels great on the skin.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, Oiliness
what_it_is: A refreshing, oil-free gel cream that provides a moisture boost and locks in hydration for up to 72 skin-quenching hours.
review_description: This does not work.  It smells great and goes on nice, but that’s all it does.  It is sticky on my face and does not work.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, Oiliness
what_it_is: A refreshing, oil-free gel cream that provides a moisture boost and locks in hydration for up to 72 skin-quenching hours.
review_description: This moisturizer smells beautiful and looks beautiful! It disappears into the skin, and really hydrates my dry/flakey skin. It has been the only moisturizer that I have tried this winter that has given me such great results. Got it as a sample and had to buy the full size!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, Oiliness
what_it_is: A refreshing, oil-free gel cream that provides a moisture boost and locks in hydration for up to 72 skin-quenching hours.
review_description: I bought the mini size because Rowena Tsai raved about it on Youtube, and I'm in love! It restores moisture so quickly and doesn't clog my pores. I'll be buying a standard size for sure!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling face moisturizer that’s free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and carbamide, and delivers up to 24 hours of hydration.
review_description: I have struggled with finding the right moisturizer and this one did not peel off, did not make me too greasy it was just right. However for winter time I was a little more dry and I had to reapply. I don't don't think it did anything in terms of improving my skin or acne but it was the most comfortable to have on and I felt like it made me a little brighter

skincare_concerns: Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling face moisturizer that’s free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and carbamide, and delivers up to 24 hours of hydration.
review_description: Been trying to perfect my skincare routine & I received this in a gift set. I have very sensitive, acne-prone skin & this moisturizer made me break out within a few days. I really wanted to like it because it feels soo creamy/smooth & moisturizing, but I won’t be purchasing again.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling face moisturizer that’s free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and carbamide, and delivers up to 24 hours of hydration.
review_description: This will take care of both your, and anyone else you love skin in one convenient tub. This has been around for awhile for a very good reason for everyone who love soft beautiful skin.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling face moisturizer that’s free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and carbamide, and delivers up to 24 hours of hydration.
review_description:
I have eczema and super dry skin. Putting on make up during winter is hard when you see dry patches. 

This cream delivers! Super moisturizing! 

First application, I find the cream very matte and was disappointed that I didn’t get the instant glow or refreshing feeling. But after a few days of application, I noticed a huge difference. My make up glides smoothly. 

This will be a staple cream for me going forward.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling face moisturizer that’s free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and carbamide, and delivers up to 24 hours of hydration.
review_description: If you have regular skin with little to no skin concerns or problems, it's a pretty good product. Would not recommend for anyone with dry skin because this is as effective as slapping on some regular drugstore cream. I personally haven't broken out using this cream, but I know many people with oily skin have this problem.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling face moisturizer that’s free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and carbamide, and delivers up to 24 hours of hydration.
review_description: Love, love this product. Drastically improved my skin. I use it for everyday day moisturizer.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling face moisturizer that’s free of parabens, phthalates, sulfates, and carbamide, and delivers up to 24 hours of hydration.
review_description: The moisturizer is good, but it starts pilling after a while. Can’t wear it under makeup due to this reason, so I only ever use it when my face is dry and I don’t plan on leaving the house.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rescue cream infused with six African oils and a plant ceramide complex for intense moisture and replenishing barrier support.
review_description: I love this moisturizer for my dry skin! I suffered from dry dark peeling skin this moisturizer helped to revive my skin. It took two weeks for me to really see the difference in the moisture level in my skin but since then I have noticed a difference my skin is definitely not as dry.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rescue cream infused with six African oils and a plant ceramide complex for intense moisture and replenishing barrier support.
review_description: It’s sad for me to even write this but I’m giving up on this moisturizer. I’ve been using this as my only moisturizer for the past 4 months and this is my forth time purchasing, third time buying full size. For $60 a jar i shouldn’t wake up with dry patches on my skin. I have dry skin and I feel like when I wake up my skin is dryer than it was the night before. Also, it runs out so quickly, the one pump isn’t enough to cover my whole face. It’s nice and all but not worth the money for the lack of moisturizer it provides. My CeraVe Lotion is 100 times more hydrating than LaLa retro. Realizing that DE projects are just hype, after a while TLC, CFirma and Lala retro stop being effective.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rescue cream infused with six African oils and a plant ceramide complex for intense moisture and replenishing barrier support.
review_description: I use this moisturizer at night because my skin is a little too oily in the morning to use throughout the day. You don't need too much. It actually doesn't feel super heavy on the skin although it is a thicker cream. I think it is a great moisturizer for when you use retinol or BHA/AHA's. If you don't have super oily skin I think you will really like this if you want a thicker moisturizer.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rescue cream infused with six African oils and a plant ceramide complex for intense moisture and replenishing barrier support.
review_title: New formula does nothing for me
review_description: New formula does nothing for my skin. I used to love the old formula, I’d see results even the next day!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rescue cream infused with six African oils and a plant ceramide complex for intense moisture and replenishing barrier support.
review_description: This stuff-love it!!!  I got it in the Christmas collection.  My skin feels so soft and smooth.  I have a couple of wrinkles mainly the middle of my forehead, since I started using this line it has gone down in depth and started to smooth out.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rescue cream infused with six African oils and a plant ceramide complex for intense moisture and replenishing barrier support.
review_description: I love Drunk Elephant products and have used the protini moisturizer before trying out this one, however this one is a close second in my book. I do have dry skin and I like my skin feeling moisturized throughout the day and this does the trick! I love that I don’t need a lot of the product and I prefer the thicker consistency. Its even a great night time moisturizer too to lock in everything. I do have to let this moisturizer sit a minute before putting on any makeup but it makes it look seamless! Love this, will keep coming back.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rescue cream infused with six African oils and a plant ceramide complex for intense moisture and replenishing barrier support.
review_description: By far one of my favorite moisturizers for winter PM use. I have combo oily/ extremely dry skin and Lala locks in the moisture, hydrates, and absorbs very well. It does not leave me feeling greasy AND I use and argon oil with it. You also don’t have to waste product as it dispenses pump style: one pump is all you need for your face and neck. Only downside is that you cannot tell when you’re running low, however, I would not take a point off  because the product is superior to the packaging.

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with amino acids, dermal lipids, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: My skin feels more supple. Stays hydrated all day. Doesn’t cause break outs.

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with amino acids, dermal lipids, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I accidentally ruined my moisture barrier by trying out new exfoliators. I ended up breaking out with huge acne and had red patches on my face for over 3 months. Used just a cleanser and tried this moisturizer and my face was back to normal within a week. I love the consistency. It's the perfect thickness that my skin feels hydrated but not too much so that it feels sticky. Definitely would recommend it, especially for a nighttime moisturizer.

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with amino acids, dermal lipids, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I like this product a lot. I am obsessed with hydration and use this after toning and my hyaluronic serum. Great value for an everyday moisturizer.

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with amino acids, dermal lipids, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: This is my 4th or 5th tube of moisturizer - I just love it. I keep one bottle in the fridge for the morning because the cold helps to wake me up. I love how this feels after I rub it in and the lack of scent is great. Layers on top of my serums and under my oils well. Even got my boyfriend hooked on it!

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with amino acids, dermal lipids, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I gave this a christmas gifts for family and friend and they loved it.

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with amino acids, dermal lipids, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I love this! I have combination/oily skin and this product DOES NOT give me any excessive oils on my face. I'm already on my second bottle and I love how moisturizing it is!

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with amino acids, dermal lipids, and hyaluronic acid.
review_description:
Please tell me I’m not the only one who instantly starts face sweating right after putting this on. This has never happened with any other product or moisturizer. It’s not irritating my skin it just makes my face literally wet after I use it. 
I wish that didn’t happen because other that than it is a nice moisturizer I just can’t have a wet sweaty face every day on my way to work lol

what_it_is: A multi-peptide serum with syn-ake, matrixyl synthe-6, matrixyl 3000, argirelox, hyaluronic acid, amino acids and bio-derivatives to target multiple signs of aging.
review_description: I love this product. I recently started using retinol and have been experiencing flaking. I am big on skin care and tried everything to try to help my skin but I would still wake up to flakiness no matter what.  Even my high-end creams/serums/masks wouldn’t help. I bought this and after one night my skin was so soft and glowing! For reference I have combo skin. I really like how it absorbs into the skin, there’s no residue or greasiness . I will definitely repurchase! My skin looks and feels great.

what_it_is: A multi-peptide serum with syn-ake, matrixyl synthe-6, matrixyl 3000, argirelox, hyaluronic acid, amino acids and bio-derivatives to target multiple signs of aging.
review_description: Love this serum! A little goes a long way. This bottle lasted me forever!

what_it_is: A multi-peptide serum with syn-ake, matrixyl synthe-6, matrixyl 3000, argirelox, hyaluronic acid, amino acids and bio-derivatives to target multiple signs of aging.
review_description: I tried multiple The Ordinary products and this one, hands down, is my favorite. It's magic for your skin. I had tiny bumps on my forehead that disappeared in ONE night of use, and I woke up to soft, hydrated, "glass skin". This product is literally the best in my opinion and suits to a wide variety of skin concerns and also doesn't interfere with other serums. Highly recommend.

what_it_is: A multi-peptide serum with syn-ake, matrixyl synthe-6, matrixyl 3000, argirelox, hyaluronic acid, amino acids and bio-derivatives to target multiple signs of aging.
review_description: Love this! Have already noticed a difference since using, my skin feels much more hydrated and calmer.

what_it_is: A multi-peptide serum with syn-ake, matrixyl synthe-6, matrixyl 3000, argirelox, hyaluronic acid, amino acids and bio-derivatives to target multiple signs of aging.
review_description: I like this product, but I don’t feel like it adds that much to my skincare routine. It’s nice for a little additional boost of hydration in the winter, but it doesn’t do much else. I feel like this product is somewhat overhyped. But for the price, it’s worth a try!

what_it_is: A multi-peptide serum with syn-ake, matrixyl synthe-6, matrixyl 3000, argirelox, hyaluronic acid, amino acids and bio-derivatives to target multiple signs of aging.
review_description: Super hydrating! I'm on my second bottle and have noticed my frown lines become way less prominent over time, likely in-part due to the peptides in this. Love it!

what_it_is: A multi-peptide serum with syn-ake, matrixyl synthe-6, matrixyl 3000, argirelox, hyaluronic acid, amino acids and bio-derivatives to target multiple signs of aging.
review_description: i bought this for my mom and she LOVES this. she knocked it over accidentally and she was so sad so i got her another one haha

what_it_is: An oil-free, anti-aging water cream that releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals, and optimal hydration for poreless-looking skin.
review_description: I love this moisturizer! Are there more affordable options that are just as good? Perhaps! But I do really enjoy this and the scent of it. I use it as my daytime moisturizer and thoroughly enjoy how nice it feels on my skin!

what_it_is: An oil-free, anti-aging water cream that releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals, and optimal hydration for poreless-looking skin.
review_description: MY SKIN FEELS AMAZING!! 100% would recommend. This gives me the best moisture ever without any residue left behind. My skin is glowing and hydrated.

what_it_is: An oil-free, anti-aging water cream that releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals, and optimal hydration for poreless-looking skin.
review_description: Will continue to experiment with new products but this moisturizer is perfect for me. Little to no smell, leaves skin soft and supple. I know it’s a little pricey but it’s worth it. Some months I have to skimp on other products but never this!

what_it_is: An oil-free, anti-aging water cream that releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals, and optimal hydration for poreless-looking skin.
review_description:
Ladies,
I can’t get enough of this cream. It makes my face smooth like a baby. I wish I would have know about this sooner.

what_it_is: An oil-free, anti-aging water cream that releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals, and optimal hydration for poreless-looking skin.
review_title: Tatcha Products are a Must Have!
review_description: I have been using Tatcha for a few years. Honestly, this is the ONLY brand I will EVER use for moisturizing my skin. I have pretty much bought and used every Tatcha product there is. They are all top notch. While the products can be pricy, you get what you pay for. You won’t regret buying any Tatcha product. Your skin deserves it!

what_it_is: An oil-free, anti-aging water cream that releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals, and optimal hydration for poreless-looking skin.
review_description: I am in love with this moisturiser. It just melts onto your skin without leaving a heavy greasy feeling. If you have oily or combination skin this is the moisturiser for you. Absolutely worth the money!

what_it_is: An oil-free, anti-aging water cream that releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals, and optimal hydration for poreless-looking skin.
review_description: I have used this product for just over 6 months and at first i  loved it. I have acne prone skin and it didn't break me out. however as i continued to use it, my skin looked dull and lifeless. If i'm spending $100 on a moisturizer i want it to do more than not break me out so i'm on the lookout for a new moisturizer.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rich cream that feeds skin with plumping hydration and antioxidant-packed Japanese purple rice for a dewy, healthy glow.
review_description: Okay this moisturizer definitely hydrates and plumps my skin perfectly before I do my makeup! I enjoy the lightweight consistency of this product! The only issue I had with this product is that it is strongly fragranced which sometimes irritates my sensitive skin! Overall great hydrating product !

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rich cream that feeds skin with plumping hydration and antioxidant-packed Japanese purple rice for a dewy, healthy glow.
review_description: I used my points to try the mini and later ended up buying the full size jar. I love a product that gives both immediate and long term results— this is one of them. It is different from other moisturizers in that it is very light but still gives a very dewy finish. I find with other products that offer a “dewy” look, my makeup starts to crease over top of it regardless of using primer— not with this one! I don’t care for the scent but it is very light and fades quickly so I just live with it. After a few weeks I noticed my skin was clearer and maintains a nice plump texture. More recently I have started using the Tatcha Essence & Dewy Serum as well. The whole line is luxurious and great.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rich cream that feeds skin with plumping hydration and antioxidant-packed Japanese purple rice for a dewy, healthy glow.
review_description: Love it for the winter made my skin feel so nice and smooth. I have dry combination skin and this is the perfect moisturizer for me.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rich cream that feeds skin with plumping hydration and antioxidant-packed Japanese purple rice for a dewy, healthy glow.
review_description: This product has a very light scent and adds tons of hydration to my skin. I use as a night time moisturizer as it is quite thick.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rich cream that feeds skin with plumping hydration and antioxidant-packed Japanese purple rice for a dewy, healthy glow.
review_description: While the product itself was just ok, I absolutely couldn't handle the smell of it - like charcoal or something. Gross! I had to toss it.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rich cream that feeds skin with plumping hydration and antioxidant-packed Japanese purple rice for a dewy, healthy glow.
review_description: I bought this for my mom’s birthday and she loved it. Gave a very nice glow and smells amazing. For me the best part is actually the packaging and I haven’t seen anyone mention this so maybe I am just late but - the top of the lid has this pretty gold bow. But if you look closely, the bow stick pulls out because it’s actually a beauty spatula that you use like a little spoon to take your product out so you don’t need to touch with fingers. Very clever. My mom kept the spatula to use with other skincare too.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rich cream that feeds skin with plumping hydration and antioxidant-packed Japanese purple rice for a dewy, healthy glow.
review_description: Does the job really well and feels great on my dry skin!! I would say it’s one of the best moisturizers I’ve tried and I’ve tried many!

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid.
review_description: An absolute staple in my skin care routine, I use it twice a day everyday. Cannot beat a great product that is extremely affordable!

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I love this stuff. Nothing bad to say about it. I use 2-3 drops AM and PM and I will probably have to repurchase this every 2 months or so but it's so affordable that I don't have an issue with that at all.

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I am about to finish the first bottle and I have to say, this product works. I have seen a visible change in my skin. It looks supple and hydrated now. I use it morning and evening after cleansing and toning. The days I use this product, it gives a natural glow to my skin without making it look oily. It has a sticky texture but the serum absorbs quickly and leaves the skin looking healthy. Only con for me is that it feels soapy when I am massaging it into the skin. Other than that, it’s a great product. I have already purchased my second bottle!

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid.
review_description: Low price, good quality. I recommend everyone this tiny bottle

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I absolutely love this product!!!! It doesn’t have any smell to it but better than having a bad one. I have a dry skin so it helps with my daily skin care routine.

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid.
review_description: Who doesn't love soft supple skin? This stuff left my face feeling so soft. Really helps lock in moisture.

what_it_is: A hydrating formula with ultra-pure, vegan hyaluronic acid.
review_description: I really like it. This is my 2nd bottle now. It keeps my skin tight and plump specially when it's used as a primer before make up. I personally use it 10 minutes before moisturizer and keeps my glowing all day long. It doesnt cause any breakouts and pimples. The only downside for this product is the silicon smell but it's not too strong and it doesnt last on the skin so I can bear it

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A protein moisturizer that combines signal peptides, growth factors, amino acids, and pygmy waterlily to visibly improve skin‘s tone, texture, and firmness.
review_description: I really wanted to love this but it is not hydrating enough for me. I have severe dry patches on my chin and this did nothing to help. I liked the packaging a lot. If I didn't have these dry skin problems I would have liked it more

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A protein moisturizer that combines signal peptides, growth factors, amino acids, and pygmy waterlily to visibly improve skin‘s tone, texture, and firmness.
review_description: I purchased this product after a lot of research and I have to say, I loved using it. It glides over the skin, leaving it soft and hydrated. It is more like a gel based cream which is very light and absorbs easily. I liked the packaging a lot as well. It keeps the product from contamination. The only con is the price point. I eventually moved to a more affordable moisturiser.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A protein moisturizer that combines signal peptides, growth factors, amino acids, and pygmy waterlily to visibly improve skin‘s tone, texture, and firmness.
review_description: Originally I didn’t see a big difference while using it. However, once I stopped and started using another product I noticed the texture of my skin wasn’t as nice and my face felt much more dry. I opted to using this again and really like it! Although no drastic difference my face stays hydrated without feeling oily. Only downside is the container is heavy and makes you feel like there’s much more product than there really is. I feel surprised every time it runs out (which is quickly).

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A protein moisturizer that combines signal peptides, growth factors, amino acids, and pygmy waterlily to visibly improve skin‘s tone, texture, and firmness.
review_description: I’ve used this moisturizer + the DE cleanser for more than 2 years now and I absolutely love it. A little goes a long way and it’s not too thick. It absorbs into my skin very well and hydrates me throughout the night. It has never made me appear oily throughout the day either. LOVE the fact that they got an even bigger size and purchased as soon as I saw! Definitely maintains my skins moisture and softness.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A protein moisturizer that combines signal peptides, growth factors, amino acids, and pygmy waterlily to visibly improve skin‘s tone, texture, and firmness.
review_description: This product actually made me breakout! So weird because I love all the other drunk elephant products but this clogged my pores

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A protein moisturizer that combines signal peptides, growth factors, amino acids, and pygmy waterlily to visibly improve skin‘s tone, texture, and firmness.
review_description:
I really wanted to love this moisturizer, but it was just ok. It sat on top of my skin without sinking in, and it made my face feel tacky/sticky and didn’t seem to actually moisturize. My skin is combination, leaning oilier in the summer and dryer in the winter. I was hoping this would help with my daytime dry skin woes, but the search continues.

Pros: texture out of the container, no irritation 

Cons: poor absorption, texture on skin (tacky), did not sit well under minimal makeup

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A protein moisturizer that combines signal peptides, growth factors, amino acids, and pygmy waterlily to visibly improve skin‘s tone, texture, and firmness.
review_description: I have combination skin that very dry in the winter months. I purchased a mini-size of this moisturizer based on the reviews. This product did nothing but made my skin matte looking (which I hate) and feels drier. I had to add jojoba oil on top of it. I think a product should be able to stand on its own without having to add anything. Glad I purchased the small size.
