review_title: MAKEUP STAYS WHILE OIL GOES AWAY
review_description: I love these! They don’t disrupt your makeup when you are trying to remove excess oil. I love how it keeps the hydration of your skin while removing greasiness. I want like a million of these!

skincare_concerns: Oiliness
what_it_is: A packet of soft leaflets made from natural abaca leaf and gold flakes that lets you absorb excess oil without disturbing makeup—for petal-fresh skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: Literally my favorite oil blotting papers. They don’t smear makeup and really catch all the oil! Love them

skincare_concerns: Oiliness
what_it_is: A packet of soft leaflets made from natural abaca leaf and gold flakes that lets you absorb excess oil without disturbing makeup—for petal-fresh skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: These are the best blotting paper I’ve ever used. Now I can’t even use anything else. I just wish they would sell them in larger quantity because I go through this pack so quick I have to buy them once a month.

skincare_concerns: Oiliness
what_it_is: A packet of soft leaflets made from natural abaca leaf and gold flakes that lets you absorb excess oil without disturbing makeup—for petal-fresh skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: These are legit the best blotting papers I have found on the market. They are the absolute best at absorbing oil without distributing my makeup-I can’t live without these. Perfect for all seasons and anytime of day. I also really appreciate how slim the packaging is.

skincare_concerns: Oiliness
what_it_is: A packet of soft leaflets made from natural abaca leaf and gold flakes that lets you absorb excess oil without disturbing makeup—for petal-fresh skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: When I first received these, I was initially shocked by how thin the little booklet is. I was kind of like “Uhhhh...why did I pay $12 for these blotting papers, when I could’ve just paid $10 for 100 sheets of the Boscia blotting papers?”. However, I gave them a try and I’m so glad that I did. First off, one sheet goes a pretty long way. Don’t get me wrong - I do have a place in my heart for the Boscia blotting linens, but I usually have to use maybe two or three of the Boscia sheets (both sides, and I don’t even have full on oily skin, just combo/sensitive) and I only need one of these Tatcha sheets to absorb all of my oily bits. Secondly, they’re gentle on my sensitive skin and not perfumed. I love them. Like most Tatcha products, these are more expensive than other comparative products, but as is also the case (most of the time); this product is worth it, for sure!
Great concept needs to be updated. It's flimsy and very difficult to remove the paper.  I had high hopes but when you retool the item I will try again.

I’m not a big fan of sticky, heavy cream-based or oily serum-based primers. I hate the way they feel and the band usually not worth the extra bucks. This is different. It’s a stick, so it swipes on quickly and easily. It mattifies and preps your skin for makeup and feels like you’re wearing nothing. Makes your makeup go on smoothly and helps it last all day. And you can use it for touch ups all day long to keep shine at bay. I haven’t used the blotting paper, but summer is coming so I am sure I will!

I love this primer wish we got more product in it and that it was sold in stores. this is my new fave primer it evens out everything and it's so easy to use plus it has blotting papers already for me to use.
This made the pores on my nose much less apparent, and I liked the feel of it on my face better than many other products. Will be using this for quite a while!
It’s does keep my make up nice and matte but I doesn’t work well with my foundation it creates a very obvious difference and makes it look caking and not like my skin

I love everything about this product. I was originally attracted by the blotting sheet cartridge (which is refillable) because I have oily skin and I'm constantly using blotting sheets and this packaging makes using them convenient. I didn't know what to expect from the mattifying balm as I've never used any similar product, but I was pleasantly surprised. It works great as a primer underneath makeup, or on top of makeup like a powder. It eliminates shine on the go and I love the cream to matte consistency. Even the magnetic closure is satisfying to open and close and keeps the product secure in your bag. Amazing product!

review_title: this crayon lives in my purse!!
review_description: I keep this little stick in my purse to use throughout the day when j start to feel shiny. I occasionally use it around my nose and t-zone as a primer too, but I prefer to have it in my bag to use throughout the day. I have mostly dry skin, but some spots do get pretty shiny during the day. I'll swipe this on and tap it in with my fingers and voi-la! Shine is gone.  The little blotting sheet cartridge is a wonderful little bonus as well, I love it in the summer to blot off excess sweat and shine. it is also refillable (refills are sold through trèStiQue).

what_it_is: A powder-coated blotting paper that absorbs oil to freshen the skin and eliminate shine.
review_description: I have been using these for years! I have very oily skin and tried many different blotting papers out there. These are by far the best oil sheets you can get it!!!! Love these!!!

what_it_is: A powder-coated blotting paper that absorbs oil to freshen the skin and eliminate shine.
review_description: These are my go to blotting papers. Removes excess oil, keeps your make up in place and not clogging your pores. I stopped using my powder since I bought these, really no need for that. Love using it on the no make up days as well.

what_it_is: A powder-coated blotting paper that absorbs oil to freshen the skin and eliminate shine.
review_description: I’ve tested a few, and this one has always been my favourite. Never discontinue!

what_it_is: A powder-coated blotting paper that absorbs oil to freshen the skin and eliminate shine.
review_description: love this product - good it is available again.  best blotting paper ever made

what_it_is: A powder-coated blotting paper that absorbs oil to freshen the skin and eliminate shine.
review_description: I'm 45 and my t zone is perpetually shiny. Both the powder and the papers work really well to keep shine at bay for me. However,  I won't be reordering because they come housed in plastic. Wouldn't paper due?

what_it_is: A powder-coated blotting paper that absorbs oil to freshen the skin and eliminate shine.
review_description: Works great. Better than cheaper alternatives. My go-to.

what_it_is: A powder-coated blotting paper that absorbs oil to freshen the skin and eliminate shine.
review_description: From what I can tell, these literally do NOTHING. No oil absorbing, no trace of powder (if that is what you are looking for). I feel like using a piece of bathroom tissue does a better job. I will not be buying these again. Tatcha are the best by far.

what_it_is: A set of ultra-portable blotting papers in a super-chic, refillable mirrored compact that looks like a lipstick case.
review_description: This is great for a night out or any type of day if you have to get rid of that oil I love that it takes very little space in your bag just feel it’s not worth the price for the amount you get

what_it_is: A set of ultra-portable blotting papers in a super-chic, refillable mirrored compact that looks like a lipstick case.
review_description: This product is amazing!  I love that it looks like a lipstick case and has a small mirror on it!  Buy this and you won’t be disappointed!  Highly recommend.

what_it_is: A set of ultra-portable blotting papers in a super-chic, refillable mirrored compact that looks like a lipstick case.
review_description: keep it in my purse absolutely love it! I have combination skin and this has been a. game changer for me.Its so easy to use only removes the oil and not the makeup! anytime I go out its a must

what_it_is: A set of ultra-portable blotting papers in a super-chic, refillable mirrored compact that looks like a lipstick case.
review_description: Packages seems cool but is actually annoying. Much easier just to have traditional pre cut papers. Also, they don’t work well. The paper is similar to wax paper. Not very absorbent. Waste of money.

what_it_is: A set of ultra-portable blotting papers in a super-chic, refillable mirrored compact that looks like a lipstick case.
review_description: These blotting papers are nothing special; I will just get ones that are much cheaper because they all do the same thing.

what_it_is: A set of ultra-portable blotting papers in a super-chic, refillable mirrored compact that looks like a lipstick case.
review_description: Cute packaging and has a very small mirror that can come in hand. It fell apart and once fixed it falls apart again soon after. Also this blotting paper is truly not the best. Very thin and flimsy and need a lot to blot one area

what_it_is: A blotting paper refill featuring natural botanical fibers to be used with Invisimatte Blotting Paper compact.
review_description: Love this refill!  The case is perfect for it too and looks like a cute lipstick case.  I love the small mirror on it as well.  Highly recommend!

what_it_is: A blotting paper refill featuring natural botanical fibers to be used with Invisimatte Blotting Paper compact.
review_description: My favorite blotting paper ever!  Brilliant design and it  works!

what_it_is: A blotting paper refill featuring natural botanical fibers to be used with Invisimatte Blotting Paper compact.
review_description: This blotting paper works very well! I have very oily skin and blotting paper is always a must!

what_it_is: A blotting paper refill featuring natural botanical fibers to be used with Invisimatte Blotting Paper compact.
review_description: Love this blotting paper. It works Wonderfully for cleaning up shine in middle of the day with make up on your face. The best part about fenty blotting paper Is its very small piece which is very easy to carry in your purse without taking so much space

what_it_is: A blotting paper refill featuring natural botanical fibers to be used with Invisimatte Blotting Paper compact.
A blotting paper refill featuring natural botanical fibers to be used with Invisimatte Blotting Paper compact.
review_description: love love this but not worth to have to buy the dispenser and the paper

what_it_is: A blotting paper refill featuring natural botanical fibers to be used with Invisimatte Blotting Paper compact.
review_description:
This gets 5 stars just because it does what it supposed to - blot oil = minimize shine. 

A lot of ppl just apply powder when they get oily, thinking that it will do the trick in mattifying the shine...BIG NO NO! By adding more product to your face you only make the problem worse and start to look cakey. 

Blot oil first and then assess!!!...you might not need that extra powder.

**I also like that you're able to cut the paper to the size you need.

what_it_is: A set of ultra-portable blotting papers in a super-chic, refillable mirrored compact that looks like a lipstick case.
review_title: Replace the blotting papers with rolling papers
review_description: Um I thought these were rolling papers for a sec? I mean that's genius. Once you run out of expensive papers, you can replace it with rolling papers l.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A gentle exfoliant for sensitive skin that helps remove dead skin cells for a smoother, brighter complexion.
review_description: My dry skin has become extremely sensitive as I turned 30 and suffered hormonal acne and reactive to so many products. I bought PHA toner in hopes of gentle exfoliation to glycolic acid or other AHAs that are too aggressive for my very dry and sensitive skin. The first application did sting my skin a bit, but it quickly went away in few minutes. I didnt get any reaction from it and it cleared up some of my blemishes and redness which was surprising as I didnt expect that to happen. It could have been combination of other inkey list products (im using retinol and peptide moisturizer as well) but overall this has been done wonders for my skin. I do skip on the day my skin gets extremely dry but use it at almost every night to clear up any residue buildups. Just wish it came in bigger bottle, this is the smallest bottle of toner ive ever encountered and it definitely needs to come in 2x or 3x the size. Better stock up next time

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A gentle exfoliant for sensitive skin that helps remove dead skin cells for a smoother, brighter complexion.
review_description: The best toner for dry sensitive acne prone skin..

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A gentle exfoliant for sensitive skin that helps remove dead skin cells for a smoother, brighter complexion.
review_description: Really enjoyed this toner. It’s mild with little irritation. The only place a noticed irritation was my upper lip. A minor chemical burn look but just avoid your lips especially if they are cracked.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A gentle exfoliant for sensitive skin that helps remove dead skin cells for a smoother, brighter complexion.
review_description:
My skin absolutely LOVES this toner. I didn’t really expect much if I’m honest, but about a week after using it I started to notice a glow to my skin. It’s baby soft now and it’s not irritating which is most important for me! 

Only reason for the 4 stars is because of packaging. Being a product that I can only seem to get online lately; a leak proof seal of some sort would be nice. For all of the products, not just the toner.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A gentle exfoliant for sensitive skin that helps remove dead skin cells for a smoother, brighter complexion.
review_description: Great toner! Works really well!! Works better than a lot of high end and more expensive toners that I’ve tried! I will be repurchasing.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A gentle exfoliant for sensitive skin that helps remove dead skin cells for a smoother, brighter complexion.
review_description:
I was looking for a new toner since my skin was becoming sensitive due to pregnancy and the colder weather. I didn’t expect much but this toner has changed my skin. It has literally evened out my skin, got rid of my acne scars, and brightened up my skin. I thought it was just the “ pregnancy glow” but I’m 3 months postpartum and my skill still looks great. 

The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the smell ( smelled like smoke ) and it can be tacky. I’m used the the smell now and found if I put on moisturizer right after it helps.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A gentle exfoliant for sensitive skin that helps remove dead skin cells for a smoother, brighter complexion.
review_description: I bought two bottles of this and used it for months; I noticed immediate results. My face was clear of any breakouts (which I got often) and was literally glowing. Until I ran out, and Sephora was sold out of this item for a good number of weeks. I saw my face going back to the way it was before and realized how much of a difference this toner actually made. I FINALLY got my hands on another bottle tonight, just applied it, and I can literally feel my face breathing and its so soft now!! 200/10 recommend this product for your daily skincare routine. Only downside is how often this little bottle goes out of stock, and its extremely hard to find it in stores- if you see it, be sure to stock up!

what_it_is: A pack of travel-friendly brightening wipes, with vitamin c and jojoba seed oil, to deeply cleanse, hydrate, and deliver a radiant glow.
review_description: These work well enough to remove makeup. You have to really work at your mascara though. It smells kind of citrusy, similar to other olehenriksen products I've tried, which I don't love -- feels less clean somehow, but that's definitely a matter of personal preference.

what_it_is: A pack of travel-friendly brightening wipes, with vitamin c and jojoba seed oil, to deeply cleanse, hydrate, and deliver a radiant glow.
review_description: I love these and I've been using them for about 2 years. I switched to another brand once and hated the results: my skin looked tired and dull. But not with these! My skin always looks bright. Plus they're really great at removing make up, even eye make up. The towel is plenty large enough to clean your entire face and neck without running out of room to remove dirt and make up. My skin is sensitive, so sometimes these make my face burn a little if I've used a mask or scrubbed in the shower a little too hard earlier in the day, but that doesn't last long and these wipes are worth it.

what_it_is: A pack of travel-friendly brightening wipes, with vitamin c and jojoba seed oil, to deeply cleanse, hydrate, and deliver a radiant glow.
review_description: I love these cleansing cloths! Super moisturizing and the scent is amazing.

what_it_is: A pack of travel-friendly brightening wipes, with vitamin c and jojoba seed oil, to deeply cleanse, hydrate, and deliver a radiant glow.
review_description: Too strong of smell for my liking, it smells like orange sherbet. It does do the job though, will keep but not repurchase

what_it_is: A pack of travel-friendly brightening wipes, with vitamin c and jojoba seed oil, to deeply cleanse, hydrate, and deliver a radiant glow.
review_description: best cleansing clothes EVER. i would actually consider this to be one of my “holy grail” products, not only does it wipe Away makeup & dirt but it also is BRIGHTENING, it makes me skin look so clean & smooth after just removing my makeup. they come with 30 wipes which is nice, i haven’t used makeup wipes since i switched to the original makeup remover (cloth, more earth friendly) but i HAVE TO HAVE these in

what_it_is: A pack of travel-friendly brightening wipes, with vitamin c and jojoba seed oil, to deeply cleanse, hydrate, and deliver a radiant glow.
review_description: I’ve tried several make up wipes and this is my favorite. My sensitive skin doesn’t burn or get irritated after using these, especially on my eyes. I bought once to try them out and now they are the only make up wipes I use. Sunday Riley is a trusted and go to brand for me

what_it_is: A pack of travel-friendly brightening wipes, with vitamin c and jojoba seed oil, to deeply cleanse, hydrate, and deliver a radiant glow.
review_description: I love this wipes, they remove makeup so well. I use them while traveling, after the gym, to remove makeup before cleansing. The exfoliating side is gentle and effective. Great for sensitive skin.

review_title: Combination Skin in a Tropical Island
review_description: As a person who lives in a tropical island with a combination skin, the T-Zone area can get pretty oily. These blotting linens are perfect and they absorb the oil from my skin, leaving a next texture. Highly recommend this product! Plus the price is great!

review_description: Works well & the scent is kind of refreshing too.  I just didn’t get any free samples like the website offered.  If they’re out of samples, don’t allow the customer to choose which ones they want, like there are options.

skincare_concerns: Lightweight Liquid
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, oatmeal-powered toner that hydrates, relieves, and soothes skin while supporting overall skin health for a balanced complexion.
review_description: i LOVE this toner. super hydrating + calming for my dry and sensitive skin. the texture + hydration is just like the Laneige Cream Skin but about $10 cheaper. i love this toner and will use this everyday until it’s discontinued!!

skincare_concerns: Lightweight Liquid
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, oatmeal-powered toner that hydrates, relieves, and soothes skin while supporting overall skin health for a balanced complexion.
review_description: I wouldn’t say this is a toner, it’s really more of a serum. It does soothe your skin and prep it for the rest of your routine, but if you’re looking for an actual toner, I would skip this one

skincare_concerns: Lightweight Liquid
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, oatmeal-powered toner that hydrates, relieves, and soothes skin while supporting overall skin health for a balanced complexion.
review_title: NOT REALLY A TONER / GREAT SKIN PREP PRODUCT
review_description: I've never understood the point of toners. So many of them strip your skin and obliterate your moisture barrier without really delivering anything a good exfoliant a few times a week doesn't. THAT SAID... this stuff is amazing. That's because it's not *really* a 'toner' in the sense that it's more of a hydrating, soothing essence that sinks into the skin and preps it for serums, treatments, and occlusives. It's just lovely. I would never tell someone they absolutely needed this - the same way I wouldn't see you absolutely need an eye cream or an essence - but it's the best of what it is. If you want a step after cleansing but before treatments... this is your girl. She's a good one.

skincare_concerns: Lightweight Liquid
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, oatmeal-powered toner that hydrates, relieves, and soothes skin while supporting overall skin health for a balanced complexion.
review_description:
I'm definitely a product junkie, but have generally avoided toners because, well, what's the point?

But as I'm nearing 30 I've been upping my anti-aging game and stronger actives are stressing out my skin. I was experiencing a lot more sensitivity and irritation than I used to, and it's been quite a bit of trial and error trying to balance an effective routine with protecting my skin --but switching out my hyaluronic acid serum for this toner has definitely been a helpful step. It's extremely gentle and very quickly absorbed (unlike a lot of serums). I use it after cleansing then let my face completely dry and it's a nice little buffer before I slather my face in harsher stuff. FAB products tend to work as advertised, and this is no exception. Solid hydrating toner for dry and/or sensitive skin.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: An intensely nurturing, multi-effect night cream infused with tri-peptide complex to reveal a visibly plumped, supple, more resilient look while you sleep.
review_description: I use it only for my neck and it works well. I tried it on my face and didn’t like it , felt pasty and dry. However on my neck area I feel that it helps with making it smoother . I don’t have any major issues except some lines mainly due to years of side sleeping and it has helped a lot with that. I had tried other products  and haven’t worked well so I am happy with it . I will repurchase.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: An intensely nurturing, multi-effect night cream infused with tri-peptide complex to reveal a visibly plumped, supple, more resilient look while you sleep.
review_description: I keep trying other products but this is one that I know works. I have seen the results!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: An intensely nurturing, multi-effect night cream infused with tri-peptide complex to reveal a visibly plumped, supple, more resilient look while you sleep.
review_description: I got this since the other night cream,  the Revitalizing supreme,  was out of stock. it has a smell that's too overpowering for a night use. I also broke down on my chin area. will not buy again and will stick to the Revitalizing one.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: An intensely nurturing, multi-effect night cream infused with tri-peptide complex to reveal a visibly plumped, supple, more resilient look while you sleep.
review_description: love it, help the skin having the fine wrinkle, smell so good.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Acne and Blemishes

review_description: I received this as a sample.  It is a really nice moisturizer, really nice & soft & made my skin feel wonderful the next morning.  BUT.  And it is a HUGE BUT....this smells SO AWFUL.  Ug.  Made me gag for real every single night.  I had to stop using it.   It is a shame too because it really is nice!!!  I love love the eye cream of this line, which does not have a scent.  Why must they add scents to moisturizers, ugh :(

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: An intensely nurturing, multi-effect night cream infused with tri-peptide complex to reveal a visibly plumped, supple, more resilient look while you sleep.
review_description: Not hydrating. Not recommended for winter use. No other effects seen after two weeks use. Not worth the money.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: An intensely nurturing, multi-effect night cream infused with tri-peptide complex to reveal a visibly plumped, supple, more resilient look while you sleep.
review_description: Love this cream.  It works without making my skin feel sticky.  It has a fragrance that I enjoy, not "overbearing" as one person said.  Well worth the price.

skincare_concerns: Lightweight Liquid
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, oatmeal-powered toner that hydrates, relieves, and soothes skin while supporting overall skin health for a balanced complexion.
review_description: Buy this toner if you are looking for something gentle yet effective! Has little to no smell, no sticky residue and is very calming and moisturizing. I’m on my 3rd bottle and will continue to buy many more! This brand is all around a decent skin care line for sensitive skin and great for the price!

skincare_concerns: Lightweight Liquid
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, oatmeal-powered toner that hydrates, relieves, and soothes skin while supporting overall skin health for a balanced complexion.
review_description: Best Toner I’ve ever used! It has fantastic ingredients and you don’t even need cotton pads. Just pour some in your hand and pat it in. I’m on tiny second bottle and will continue to buy it. Each bottle last a good while too.

skincare_concerns: Lightweight Liquid
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, oatmeal-powered toner that hydrates, relieves, and soothes skin while supporting overall skin health for a balanced complexion.
review_description: Skin Saver. I actually stumbled upon this product thanks to a recommendation from an influencer that I follow on Instagram who had struggled with their skin. To lay out some background - I have had trouble with my skin in my 20s through now my late 20s and it is finally just under control. I have combination sensitive skin with prior history of cystic acne. I never would have thought this product would have worked for me. This has helped to calm down my sensitive skin, lightly moisturize any dryness and actually help balance any oiliness. I have less breakouts. This is the first thing I reach for right out of the shower or after washing my face. Just a little into clean hands (like an essence) and then press into skin. It is so good, I will continue to re-purchase!!

skincare_concerns: Redness and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A pack of the original acne treatment dots that combine healing hydrocolloid polymer technology with salicylic acid to minimize breakouts overnight.
review_description: These work really well. They of course dont make the pimple go away immediately, but they definitely help the blemish go away quicker than usual. I recommend these for sure !!!

skincare_concerns: Redness and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A pack of the original acne treatment dots that combine healing hydrocolloid polymer technology with salicylic acid to minimize breakouts overnight.
review_description: I really like these good to have on hand if I have a white pimple and pot it then leave this on it dries it out and is almost gone doesn’t do anything for the deep ones though

skincare_concerns: Redness and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A pack of the original acne treatment dots that combine healing hydrocolloid polymer technology with salicylic acid to minimize breakouts overnight.
review_description:
This is amazing if you want your acne to swell down and reduce the redness. It does take 6 hours for it to work, and you’ll see the sticker foam up so you know the product is working and the ingredients is penetrating into your skin. 

Best tip to savor these a little longer would be to cut them in half. And another tip is that you can wear these underneath your mask for those annoying maskne! It’ll be like a shield between your mask and acne so it can help prevent your acne from being more congested.

skincare_concerns: Redness and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A pack of the original acne treatment dots that combine healing hydrocolloid polymer technology with salicylic acid to minimize breakouts overnight.
review_description: I’ve tried others zit patches and these are the best so far. I love that they stay on but are easy to peel off.

skincare_concerns: Redness and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A pack of the original acne treatment dots that combine healing hydrocolloid polymer technology with salicylic acid to minimize breakouts overnight.
review_description: reduces pimple size and healing time significantly. my go-to. one of my fav products ever.

skincare_concerns: Redness and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A pack of the original acne treatment dots that combine healing hydrocolloid polymer technology with salicylic acid to minimize breakouts overnight.
review_description: These are honest to god AMAZING. My skin isn’t that bad, but I have a terrible habit of picking at and touching my face which just exasperates everything. Got a pretty bad pimple yesterday and decided to use one of these overnight. OMG GUYS! It is gone. Completely gone. After only wearing for 6.5 hours. I was unsure of the price but after seeing the results 100% worth it. Going to run out and grab the pore strips too I think.

skincare_concerns: Redness and Acne and Blemishes
what_it_is: A pack of the original acne treatment dots that combine healing hydrocolloid polymer technology with salicylic acid to minimize breakouts overnight.
review_description: Was very unsure of this product because reviews vary of opinion, but I decided to take a chance. Not even kidding, got rid of my pimple over night. Hated the price but am willing to spend my hard earned money on this!! First time trying and I am a believer.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Blemishes

review_description: me encantaaa, hace maravillas en la piel, vez la diferencia desde la primera vez que lo pruebas la piel queda limpia, fresca y suave

what_it_is: An award-winning face wash with cold-pressed antioxidants to remove makeup, prevent buildup in pores, and support skin’s pH balance.

review_description: Love this cleanser, leaves my face feeling smooth & ready for the rest of my skincare routine!

what_it_is: An award-winning face wash with cold-pressed antioxidants to remove makeup, prevent buildup in pores, and support skin’s pH balance.
review_description: I have tried this, loved it, finished it, bought something cheaper, didn’t have the same results, came back, did it again, then came back for the third time and realized my skin needed this in my minimal routine for the rest of my life. I use only one cleanser, and this is it. It’s scent is pleasant, it doesn’t over dry, my skin is glowy and healthy, and absolutely doesn’t break me out. I look forward to washing my face every night with it.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Blemishes
what_it_is: An award-winning face wash with cold-pressed antioxidants to remove makeup, prevent buildup in pores, and support skin’s pH balance.
review_description: I love this cleanser. My skin is oily, but it loses moisture very easily. A lot of cleansers leave my face feeling tight and dry, but not this one. It cleanses very well, and it doesn't dry my skin out. I will continue to repurchase.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Blemishes
what_it_is: An award-winning face wash with cold-pressed antioxidants to remove makeup, prevent buildup in pores, and support skin’s pH balance.
review_description: Excellent. Really recommend for a refreshing non-stripping clean feeling with healthful skin nourishing benefits.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Blemishes
what_it_is: An award-winning face wash with cold-pressed antioxidants to remove makeup, prevent buildup in pores, and support skin’s pH balance.
review_description: Love this product! It smells amazing and doesn’t strip your skin.
