what_it_is: A three-in-one night serum that resurfaces, hydrates, and clarifies dull skin while you sleep, formulated with a 14 percent AHA/BHA/gentle flower acid blend.
review_description: This is an amazing skin treatment! When used with the right serum and moisturizer it creates such a balanced glow that you don't even need foundation etc. Can be used daily. I love it!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A three-in-one night serum that resurfaces, hydrates, and clarifies dull skin while you sleep, formulated with a 14 percent AHA/BHA/gentle flower acid blend.
review_description: Really goes make my skin glow! I use this every other day (sometimes daily if I feel my skin needs a longer break from my tretinoin) and it helps keep my skin clear and refreshed. Smells a hint of honey and can tingle just a tiny bit.. but I like it, let’s me know it’s working! Definitely going to be a new staple in my skincare routine

skincare_concerns: Pores, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A three-in-one night serum that resurfaces, hydrates, and clarifies dull skin while you sleep, formulated with a 14 percent AHA/BHA/gentle flower acid blend.
review_description: I really like this product and use once weekly and can definitely feel the results the next morning. However, I did not find in it the holy grail product I was looking for. I might need to use more often.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A three-in-one night serum that resurfaces, hydrates, and clarifies dull skin while you sleep, formulated with a 14 percent AHA/BHA/gentle flower acid blend.
review_description: This stuff is amazing. It’s one of the only products ever where I saw a noticeable difference after only one use. I ordered the full size and have begun using it twice a week and it’s made my face so dewy & glowy and is helping to fade my dark spots. I think it’s helping to even skin tone as well.

what_it_is: A pore-refining toner with salicylic, glycolic, and lactic acids to remove excess oil, clarify, and freshen the complexion without stripping skin.
review_description: I think it worked great for my pores and acne and it’s amazing what it gets off BUT it got rid of my freckles which absolutely breaks my heart

what_it_is: A pore-refining toner with salicylic, glycolic, and lactic acids to remove excess oil, clarify, and freshen the complexion without stripping skin.
review_description: strong scent, essential oils it, did not do much for my skin it feels really cool when on and then my face felt hot. after that I didn't see any improvement in the pores, acne or anything.

what_it_is: A pore-refining toner with salicylic, glycolic, and lactic acids to remove excess oil, clarify, and freshen the complexion without stripping skin.
review_description: This toner has been a godsend! I have spent countless amounts on high end toners and drugstore toners. This is the only toner than has helped my oily/combination skin! I highly recommend this to help clarify & tone acne prone skin. I will forever use this toner and I’m so happy I gave it a try and have seen such amazing results over the past month! Give it a try you won’t regret it!

what_it_is: A pore-refining toner with salicylic, glycolic, and lactic acids to remove excess oil, clarify, and freshen the complexion without stripping skin.
review_description: Love this toner! Leaves my face feeling refreshed and clean. Highly recommend!

what_it_is: A pore-refining toner with salicylic, glycolic, and lactic acids to remove excess oil, clarify, and freshen the complexion without stripping skin.
review_description: Absolutely love this toner!! Works well with my sensitive/acne prone skin without over drying or causing breakouts. Wish it was a little more affordable as I find I go through it in 2 months when using 1-2 times/day&night

what_it_is: A pore-refining toner with salicylic, glycolic, and lactic acids to remove excess oil, clarify, and freshen the complexion without stripping skin.
review_description: This AHA/BHA toner made me purge a lot, which is to be expected when starting to use chemical exfoliants. What was disappointing to me was the fact that the formula wasn't good enough to treat the post inflammatory hyperpigmentation from the breakouts it induced. I stopped using this product for another in k beauty that has a much better formula for exfoliation, reducing inflammation, and addressing PIH & PIE. Pass on this one.

what_it_is: A pore-refining toner with salicylic, glycolic, and lactic acids to remove excess oil, clarify, and freshen the complexion without stripping skin.
review_description: I love how it controls my oily face, the only problem is that my pimples will show the next day. So I’ll just give a 3 star.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A skin-smoothing, cult-favorite nightly sleeping mask with watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and AHAs that gently exfoliate and refine the look of pores.
review_title: Make sure you stir it well!
review_description:
I’ve used this mask for a while and love it but ran out recently and went to my local
Sephora to buy more. They were out of the full sized so I bought one of the smaller jars. It must have been on their shelves for a long time because the ingredients had apparently separated and when I unknowingly applied it it was a super oily. I had to wash my face twice to get it off. I was able to reconstitute it by stirring it and it seems fine now but I’m sure it would have caused a reaction in my skin if I hadn’t known something was wrong.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A skin-smoothing, cult-favorite nightly sleeping mask with watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and AHAs that gently exfoliate and refine the look of pores.
review_description: This is a great mask, balances and perks up my dry-sensitive skin. Good value. Smells good too! :)

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A skin-smoothing, cult-favorite nightly sleeping mask with watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and AHAs that gently exfoliate and refine the look of pores.
review_description: Pricey, but a great overnight mask. I wake up with soft glowey skin.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A skin-smoothing, cult-favorite nightly sleeping mask with watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and AHAs that gently exfoliate and refine the look of pores.
review_description: This mask smells soooo good. It leaves my skin soft & glowy. It’s not drying but it’s not super hydrating. I think it’s better for the summer/fall than the wintertime when my skin needs a thicker moisturizer at night. I only use a thin layer because I find that it tends to pill up on my face and pillow if I use too much of it. My face is always glowy in the morning and it’s very gentle. I don’t feel any tingling or irritation from the acids. I like the experience of using this mask with the cute packaging, jelly texture, and light scent. It’s not a staple in my routine but overall it’s a fun mask to use and it does what it claims.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A skin-smoothing, cult-favorite nightly sleeping mask with watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and AHAs that gently exfoliate and refine the look of pores.
review_description: I was super excited to try this mask. Unfortunately it made me break out. Smells great though! And leaves tour skin feeling refreshed.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A skin-smoothing, cult-favorite nightly sleeping mask with watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and AHAs that gently exfoliate and refine the look of pores.
review_description: One of the best sleeping masks!! Smells so refreshing and such a fun facial to do at home. Definitely smoothens my skin and I love the formula!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A three-in-one night serum that resurfaces, hydrates, and clarifies dull skin while you sleep, formulated with a 14 percent AHA/BHA/gentle flower acid blend.
review_description: this is my 5th bottle of this and i will NEVER BE WITHOUT. truly such an incredible product and give you the most beautiful skin. i use the dr dennis gross alpha beta pads 4 times a week and use this mixed with sunday riley luna oil 3-4 times a week (expensive routine, i know - but SO WORTH IT)

skincare_concerns: Pores, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A three-in-one night serum that resurfaces, hydrates, and clarifies dull skin while you sleep, formulated with a 14 percent AHA/BHA/gentle flower acid blend.
review_title: Need this in my life FOREVER
review_description: Need. Bigger. Bottle. This stuff is LEGEN wait for it.... DARY. I’ve been using this product for about a month now and have noticed a drastic difference in my skin. It’s smooth, soft AND I am noticing my pores less and less. I use a pump on my face and a pump on my neck and sometimes I use a pump for my hands. Took off a star because it’s expensive.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A three-in-one night serum that resurfaces, hydrates, and clarifies dull skin while you sleep, formulated with a 14 percent AHA/BHA/gentle flower acid blend.
review_description: I am 31 years old, live in Calgary AB where the winters are long and dry. I have dry patches on my skin that basically flake off, and so far out of MANY creams and serums this one seems to be the only one that works. I got this in a boxycharm about a year ago, so it wasnt something that I would have picked out for myself. It is worth the price in my opinion it lasts for quite a while.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A skin-smoothing, cult-favorite nightly sleeping mask with watermelon, hyaluronic acid, and AHAs that gently exfoliate and refine the look of pores.
review_description: This product left my skin with a lovely, smooth finish. I like the scent; it smells like real, not artificial, watermelon. My only issue is that if you live in a cold climate like I do, and have dry skin, it doesn't moisturize quite enough. I would save it for the warmer months.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A lightweight moisturizer for combination and oily skin with antioxidant-rich superfoods, cross-linked hyaluronic acid, and essential phytonutrients.
review_description: I recently bought this item. I struggle with acne, and I have sensitive skin, and my skin dries from using retinol. This moisturizer had helped keep my skin moisturized after using my retinol at night and during the day after cleansing . It hasn’t had any negative results for my sensitive skin. Worth the price.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A lightweight moisturizer for combination and oily skin with antioxidant-rich superfoods, cross-linked hyaluronic acid, and essential phytonutrients.
review_description: I got this as a sample and really enjoyed it so I bought the full size! It’s a light moisturizer perfect for summer although I do not recommend it for winter months as it is just not heavy enough for my skin. Didn’t break me out (I usually break out the most in the summer) and made my skin look glowing and healthy! The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it’s just a little too pricey in my opinion but still a good product. I love everything I have ever tried by this brand! It does have a light smell but nothing overwhelming and I find it to smell very natural and fresh. Definitely a great summer moisturizer!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A lightweight moisturizer for combination and oily skin with antioxidant-rich superfoods, cross-linked hyaluronic acid, and essential phytonutrients.
review_title: Nothing special with a weird smell.
review_description: This isn't very moisturizing, and it has an 'oily' smell - like old generic lotion.  Wouldn't recommend.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A lightweight moisturizer for combination and oily skin with antioxidant-rich superfoods, cross-linked hyaluronic acid, and essential phytonutrients.
review_title: Refreshing and pleasant on the skin
review_description: I honestly love how light weight and easily it absorbs into my skin. Very refreshing, probably my favorite part of my skincare routine and my skin doesn't look oily. The only downside and I'm unsure why but I get itchy tiny bumps rash when I use it with an aloe vera toner I got from Body shop. I tested it twice to rule out other factors. I guess they don't work well together. Instead now I use the oat toner from FAB which go great together.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A lightweight moisturizer for combination and oily skin with antioxidant-rich superfoods, cross-linked hyaluronic acid, and essential phytonutrients.
review_description: I had high hopes for this product as I’ve heard really good reviews- but this didn’t work for my skin at all. I have dry skin and live in a dry climate. My face would feel so dry after the product absorbed in, I would be forced to put another product on top to get rid of the stiffness. Not worth the money but I do love other products of theirs.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Dullness
what_it_is: A noncomedogenic, benefit-packed, luxe, gel-cream moisturizer that Rihanna created specifically for her bedtime routine.
review_title: Sensitive to caffeine? STAY AWAY, OR STAY AWAKE
review_description:
I wanted to love it as I love the other products in the line but after using it once and being awake all night, I reread the ingredients and realized it contains camellia sinesis, aka caffeine. As someone who is EXTREMELY sensitive to caffeine, this is a definite NO. This is the second time in a matter of days that I have been unable to sleep. I purchased another night cream a few days ago and it kept me up but after reading the ingredients I saw caffeine and decided to try this, not knowing camellia sinesis was the same thing.  Apparently caffeine can be absorbed through your skin and have a more lasting effect than if you drink it. I’m still awake and haven’t had any additional caffeine

I loved how the product made my skin feel but I can’t have another sleepless night because of it.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Dullness
what_it_is: A noncomedogenic, benefit-packed, luxe, gel-cream moisturizer that Rihanna created specifically for her bedtime routine.
review_description: Leaves your sling glowing before bed. It smells absolutely gorgeous, clicks really well with oily skin, and doesn’t stain pillows.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Dullness
what_it_is: A noncomedogenic, benefit-packed, luxe, gel-cream moisturizer that Rihanna created specifically for her bedtime routine.
review_description: This is the first overnight cream that does not break me out or break me out.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Dullness
what_it_is: A noncomedogenic, benefit-packed, luxe, gel-cream moisturizer that Rihanna created specifically for her bedtime routine.
review_description: This cream is amazing! It layers well over my serums and leaves my skin feeling so silky and hydrated in the morning.  Highly recommend!

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Dullness
what_it_is: A noncomedogenic, benefit-packed, luxe, gel-cream moisturizer that Rihanna created specifically for her bedtime routine.
review_description: Okay so let me first start by saying that I am deeply impressed with Fenty Skin. I have the Fat Water and the Hydravizor moisturizer and I have now added the overnight gel-cream to my routine. I have been using the night cream for almost 2 weeks now and I am absolutely in love. First, I absolutely love the smell and the secure packaging the product comes in. I think now more than ever, we need to be mindful of how we are treating our planet so I thought Riri made such a conscientious effort here. Now, the product itself is unlike anything I have ever had before. I've been using the Origins Ginzing moisturizer for a long time and while it did serve its function I didn't like the fact that it would feel really greasy on the skin but because I would only use it as a night cream I didn't really care. The Fenty overnight cream smells amazing, the cream itself feels really lightweight when you are applying it and it spreads very easily. What I really liked about this cream is that the product actually absorbs into your skin. After like 20 minutes I could touch my face and the product had locked into my skin. My skin felt hydrated but not greasy, soft, and supple. I highly recommend this product and will definitely re-purchase in the future. I think Fenty Skin is it for me.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Dullness
what_it_is: A noncomedogenic, benefit-packed, luxe, gel-cream moisturizer that Rihanna created specifically for her bedtime routine.
review_title: Very nice cream but not for me
review_description: Good consistency for someone who doesn't like heavy feeling products and it kept my skin feeling nicely moisturized at night. The scent is pleasant but somewhat strong...if you have sensitivities it might be a bit of an issue. I will probably discontinue use as it seems to be giving me blemishes.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, Dullness
what_it_is: A noncomedogenic, benefit-packed, luxe, gel-cream moisturizer that Rihanna created specifically for her bedtime routine.
review_description: Packaging was cute. Love it. Unfortunately, the gel-cream didn't work well on me - I started breaking out on my cheeks and it made my skin very oily.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A lightweight moisturizer for combination and oily skin with antioxidant-rich superfoods, cross-linked hyaluronic acid, and essential phytonutrients.
review_title: good but patch test because Fragrance
review_description: It’s really great for anyone who has inflamed acne spots good for calming down and Nourishing but do note the Fragrant components in it the do not bother my skin but if you have reactive and sensitive skin and you wanna try get sample and do a patch test other then that great for combo and oily skin

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A lightweight moisturizer for combination and oily skin with antioxidant-rich superfoods, cross-linked hyaluronic acid, and essential phytonutrients.
review_title: Deep moisture, works well with face oils.
review_description: I haver very dry skin so I used this as a moisturizer/serum under an oil. It sits really well under oils, makes my skin feel deeply hydrated. Four stars because I wish the deep hydration lasted all day/night, I usually have to re-moisturize in the middle of the day.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that is powered by advanced hyaluronic acids and time-release hydro-patches that deliver up to 24 hours of hydration for dewy-, plumped-looking skin.
review_description: I got this product for myself but it did not sit well with my oily skin. It left a layer of oil that would not soak in. I ended up giving it to my friend who has dry skin and she says she absolutely loves it and her bf noticed a difference in her complexion. So 5 stars for that, bc it worked for someone just not me. If you have dry skin this is the moisturizer for you! If you have oily skin like me however, try the lotus line.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that is powered by advanced hyaluronic acids and time-release hydro-patches that deliver up to 24 hours of hydration for dewy-, plumped-looking skin.
review_title: Has done wonders for my combo skin!
review_description: This lotion was exactly what I was looking for! I have oily skin that goes more combo during these colder months! I was looking for something that would hydrate my skin, get rid of the dry patches, not be too thick that it breaks me out, and not make me more oily....this has been everything I have wanted and more! I have sensitive skin, however, I know my skin likes skincare with rose in it so I have not had a problem out of this lotion with the scent or anything breaking me out! I highly recommend!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that is powered by advanced hyaluronic acids and time-release hydro-patches that deliver up to 24 hours of hydration for dewy-, plumped-looking skin.
review_description: This moisturizer didn’t do much for my skin at all. I have yet to find the perfect moisturizer but this was top 5 the most useless.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that is powered by advanced hyaluronic acids and time-release hydro-patches that deliver up to 24 hours of hydration for dewy-, plumped-looking skin.
review_title: Acne gone, but with side effects..
review_description: Within a few days, it removed a lot of my acne. Though the second I put it on, my face gets really red and stings. I thought maybe my skin had to get used to it or something. But I have been using it for at least 2 weeks every morning and night, and the effect is the same. And mind you, I don’t have sensitive skin..

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that is powered by advanced hyaluronic acids and time-release hydro-patches that deliver up to 24 hours of hydration for dewy-, plumped-looking skin.
review_description: this would peel off.  its not for me. I like the packaging though.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that is powered by advanced hyaluronic acids and time-release hydro-patches that deliver up to 24 hours of hydration for dewy-, plumped-looking skin.
review_description:
I love this face cream, like looovve.  I haven’t tried any face creams in years, because I have roseaca.  I used cerve morning and night, because I was scared to venture.  But I’ve been reading about HA, and because I am aging (late 40s) I wanted to tap into it (need it too).   I took a chance with this cream, based on reviews.  I use it in the morning.  It makes my skin look healthier.  It has a glow or sheen, which I love the most!  It does not irritate my skin.  It smells great.  It’s thick, and it feels like it stays on all day, it a good 
way.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A lightweight gel-cream that is powered by advanced hyaluronic acids and time-release hydro-patches that deliver up to 24 hours of hydration for dewy-, plumped-looking skin.
review_description: I really love this cream! I received it as a gift, and because of the price, it is not something that I would have spent my own money on. After using it, I would purchase it with my own money! It is nice and thick and offers good hydration. I wouldn't say it is a 24-hour moisturizing cream, but it is good for the dry, winter months. I am not a huge fan of the rose scent, but it is not too strong and does not seem to linger. I did not find it to be irritating at all. Good cream!

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, and dullness
what_it_is: A rich moisturizer formulated with JLo Beauty™ Olive Complex, potent peptides and hyaluronic acid, that provides long-lasting hydration and a dewy glow.
review_description:
I received this sample on the influenster Jlo beauty Voxbox. 
I used this product for over 2 weeks and I really like how it leave my skin soft, not tight. Keeps my skin hydrated.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, and dullness
what_it_is: A rich moisturizer formulated with JLo Beauty™ Olive Complex, potent peptides and hyaluronic acid, that provides long-lasting hydration and a dewy glow.
review_description: I received this product complementary via influenster. The cream is nice and thick, which i love in a product because i have dry skin. However, it has fragrance, which i try to stay away from because i also have sensitive skin. I noticed after applying and waking up the next day, i had broken out around my cheeks due to this product. Honestly, if you can handle the fragrance, i think you will enjoy this product because of its hydrating benefits. But it’s just not for me

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, and dullness
what_it_is: A rich moisturizer formulated with JLo Beauty™ Olive Complex, potent peptides and hyaluronic acid, that provides long-lasting hydration and a dewy glow.
review_description:
I received this product complimentary from influenster in exchange for my honest review. The packaging is stunning, I was blown away when I opened the box. The cream is strongly floral scented, which can be really bad for people with sensitive skin, especially those sensitive to fragrances. I have extremely dry, moderately sensitive skin, but don’t usually have trouble with fragrance in products. 
This cream is incredibly thick and doesn’t spread very easily, which means it applies quite thick on the skin. For my super dry skin, this thick layer was perfect for me. I used this and the J Lo Glow serum for a week, replacing all other serums, moisturizer and oils that I typically use every night. The first night I wasn’t sure, my skin felt like it could still use more moisture, but the next day I woke up and my face was truly GLOWING. Every night since, my skin feels hydrated, and it looks dewy all day.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, and dullness
what_it_is: A rich moisturizer formulated with JLo Beauty™ Olive Complex, potent peptides and hyaluronic acid, that provides long-lasting hydration and a dewy glow.
review_description: I have combination skin and it is also very sensitive. This product has not given me any issues. Its very gentle. The cream itself is thick and non greasy. It absorbs well leaving my skin glowing and feeling balanced. My skin feels very moisturized after only two uses. Also, can we just appreciate how beautiful the packaging is for this line?! This cream is definitely worth it!

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, and dullness
what_it_is: A rich moisturizer formulated with JLo Beauty™ Olive Complex, potent peptides and hyaluronic acid, that provides long-lasting hydration and a dewy glow.
review_description: Anything but a “wonder” , this is as basic as it gets. Nothing special or amazing about this product it’s comparable to a drugstore cream. For the price point and it being “JLO ‘s secret to her skin “ it’s very disappointing. I expected better from her. Don’t waste your money

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, and dullness
what_it_is: A rich moisturizer formulated with JLo Beauty™ Olive Complex, potent peptides and hyaluronic acid, that provides long-lasting hydration and a dewy glow.
review_description: Love! I use this and felt a difference in one day it was very nourishing on my skin and my skin felt so hydrated, without feel greasy. I’m excited to keep using it.

skincare_concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, Dryness, and dullness
what_it_is: A rich moisturizer formulated with JLo Beauty™ Olive Complex, potent peptides and hyaluronic acid, that provides long-lasting hydration and a dewy glow.
review_description: I received this product free from Influensters and Jlobeauty in exchange for honest reviews. Already my skin feels a lot tighter as I’m aging more. I’ve only been using a few day and it seems to work. I am sold on this product. It also feels smooth and I know it will only continue to look better.

what_it_is: A line of multipurpose oils enriched with super ingredients to pamper your face, body, and hair.
review_description: This oil is amazing. It’s the only thing that’s worked on my dry skin. It isn’t oily and doesn’t rub off on your clothes.

what_it_is: A line of multipurpose oils enriched with super ingredients to pamper your face, body, and hair.
review_description: Fell in love with this product. Works well and smells amazing!

what_it_is: A line of multipurpose oils enriched with super ingredients to pamper your face, body, and hair.
review_title: So Nice I Bought It Twice
review_description: I love this oil. The scent is amazing! It smells like the desert. I have super dry skin, I use this oil after showering. It’s my base layer that I use before putting a heavier moisturizer on top. What I love about it most is that it soaks into my skin nicely. And the smell is divine. As a hair treatment, for me it was “eh”. My hair is super thick and this does nothing for my hair. But I still love it. I’m on my second bottle. You can’t beat the price.

what_it_is: A line of multipurpose oils enriched with super ingredients to pamper your face, body, and hair.
review_title: Not worth it.  Not even for $7 (on sale).
review_description: I bought the hempseed-purifying oil because it was on sale for  only $7!  I used it for a few weeks as a hair oil and it made my hair so greasy.  I'm sure it would be fine as a body oil but I didn't want it for that.  Unfortunately, I returned it.  Returning a $7 product isn't normal for me, but it was that bad.

what_it_is: A line of multipurpose oils enriched with super ingredients to pamper your face, body, and hair.
review_title: Please. More, sir! Can I have some more?
review_description: This is my go-to body moisturizer. It is incredible and nothing compares. It has been out of stock for a really long time. Please bring these back. I beg you.

what_it_is: A line of multipurpose oils enriched with super ingredients to pamper your face, body, and hair.
review_description: I use this on my hair to help with frizz. It smells great n I love it. It's a great price for the size bottle you receive as well. Well worth it, I'm glad I bought this!!

what_it_is: A line of multipurpose oils enriched with super ingredients to pamper your face, body, and hair.
review_description: Everything I need to take off my makeup plus keep my face supple. Love it! ❤️❤️❤️

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A multitasking face oil that floods skin with hydration, improve skin firmness, and help soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
review_description: Honestly I wasn't sure if I would like this oil but I absolutely LOVE it. It's amazing, and keeps your skin so hydrated especially it being dry and cold out during winter.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A multitasking face oil that floods skin with hydration, improve skin firmness, and help soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
review_description: Worth the money. The best face oil I have ever used. Doesn’t cause breakouts, locks in moisture, and skin feels amazing from it

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A multitasking face oil that floods skin with hydration, improve skin firmness, and help soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
review_description: This is so expensive and has Dimethicone so high on the ingredient list. Non-water soluable silicones in general are just not the greatest for your hair, especially longterm, I don't know why they would make this so expensive and use that in the ingredients.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A multitasking face oil that floods skin with hydration, improve skin firmness, and help soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
review_title: The best thing to ever happen to me
review_description: This is always one of my empties.  I literally love it so much.  I’m a product junkie and literally this might be my favorite thing I’ve ever used (which is a lot).  LOVE.  LOVE.  LOVE.  Formula is great, consistency is awesome, and I love the smell.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A multitasking face oil that floods skin with hydration, improve skin firmness, and help soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
review_title: Love but wish it was cheaper
review_description: Would give this oil 5 stars but the price is pretty outrageous. I used this oil for two years leading up to my wedding and got endless compliments on how amazing and glowy my skin looked. I love how it absorbs and feels I just wish it was cheaper.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A multitasking face oil that floods skin with hydration, improve skin firmness, and help soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
review_description: I splurged for my birthday because I was genuinely curious about this oil. For reference, I have combination skin that gets dry in the winter and slightly oily in the summer. I have been using this oil for almost a year now and seriously guys - SAVE. YOUR. MONEY. There is nothing special, anti-aging, healing, or "renewing" about this oil. I even read the ingredients before purchasing and told myself it had be some sort of magical elixir - LOL NOPE. It doesn't even feel lux when applying. There are much better oils out there for half of the price that actually produce results and benefit your skin.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A multitasking face oil that floods skin with hydration, improve skin firmness, and help soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
review_title: Life-changing! Best La Mer product by far
review_description:
I just ordered my 3rd bottle, and I can 100% vouch for this product. I noticed within 30 days (or less) a big difference (overall my face complexion and smoothness improved significantly). I got olive skin (combination of oily on T zone and dry elsewhere), and have tried many products but this was my first face oil ever and I have no desire to try anything else.  
Note that I alternate between this and La Mer's moisturizing cream (light version) but only use either one once a day after washing my face with a bar soap by Sisley (not available at Sephora unfortunately). This has been my "face" routine for the last +2 years and it works perfectly for me (especially cause I only need to wash my face once a day, and then would proceed to apply either this La Mer oil or the cream (and that's all you need). 

For best results put 3-4 drops at night and then go to bed or let your face absorb everything (for at least 1 hour before you take off or apply any makeup).

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Dryness
what_it_is: An instantly absorbing face oil infused with advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate), turmeric, and evening primrose oil, to brighten, hydrate, and leave skin glowing.
review_description: I wasn’t wowed by this product. i didn’t notice any improvement for the month i used it as far as brightening or glowing skin besides when i would apply the product simply because it’s an oil. it was moisturizing and it did soak into the skin nicely but it just wasn’t something i was reaching for.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Dryness
what_it_is: An instantly absorbing face oil infused with advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate), turmeric, and evening primrose oil, to brighten, hydrate, and leave skin glowing.
review_description: Sunday Riley is LIFE!!! My skin is better than my 20's,30's and now later 40's. Please try it!

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Dryness
what_it_is: An instantly absorbing face oil infused with advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate), turmeric, and evening primrose oil, to brighten, hydrate, and leave skin glowing.
review_description:
I initially got this as a sample and I immediately fell in love with it. This is the holy grail facial oil for dry skin! A little goes a long way and leaves my skin dewy without being shiny when I apply it.

After using this for about 2 months the results are really stunning, not only do I have hydrated and soft skin but the texture and color are looking better too! I’d always been iffy on facial oils initially because I worried that they would make me break out, but Sunday Riley’s have such incredible formulas

Even though other reviewers mentioned the smell I didn’t find it to be that strong. Frankly when it comes to fragrance free skincare, I have come to expect them to smell a little funky. It doesn’t smell like flowers but it’s also definitely not the nastiest smelling fragrance free vitamin c product on the market (looking at you drunk elephant’s C Firma serum) 

I will say, I don’t know that I’d recommend it for super oily skin or anyone who doesn’t like the dewy glow type of look, but for anyone who likes using facial oils this is hands down my favorite. Anyone else would probably prefer their CEO serum instead but this oil is perfect for dry or combination skin

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Dryness
what_it_is: An instantly absorbing face oil infused with advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate), turmeric, and evening primrose oil, to brighten, hydrate, and leave skin glowing.
review_description: I got this oil in the wake up with me kit and it has been my favorite. I look forward to waking up and starting my day off with a beautiful glowing complexion. I honestly don't feel like I need to wear any makeup that's how great my skin looks after i apply ceo glow

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Dryness
what_it_is: An instantly absorbing face oil infused with advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate), turmeric, and evening primrose oil, to brighten, hydrate, and leave skin glowing.
review_description: For two weeks I've been using a sample of this that a friend gave me and WOW.  I'm 38 with sensitive, dehydration-prone skin.  Most face oils sort of just sit on top of my skin, but this actually absorbs all the way and literally does make my skin glow.  My skin feels incredibly smooth and soft after use.  I'll definitely be purchasing a full size.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Dryness
what_it_is: An instantly absorbing face oil infused with advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate), turmeric, and evening primrose oil, to brighten, hydrate, and leave skin glowing.
review_description: I've been using Good Genes & Luna for a few years, so decided to try a sample of this.  I tried the CEO Serum over the summer & it was ok.  This works much better for me than the serum.  I use it at night & after one use noticed my skin was brighter & more even toned in the morning.  I've been alternating with Luna in the evenings & ever morning after I use this I notice a difference.  I've tried many brightening & vitamin C products, this one is the best so far.  The smell doesn't bother me.  I appreciate that they don't add perfumey fragrances to their products.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Dryness
what_it_is: An instantly absorbing face oil infused with advanced vitamin C (THD ascorbate), turmeric, and evening primrose oil, to brighten, hydrate, and leave skin glowing.
review_description: I wanted a 5 star product but this is definitely a 4.  As the season changed I found the product didn’t work well with my skin the way it had in the summer months.  Oil absorbs quickly.  The smell takes a little getting used to. Overall it delivers on its promise.  Just be careful if you have combination skin and seasonal skin changes.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing facial oil packed with rare superberry antioxidants for rapid hydration and velvety-soft skin with a healthy-looking glow.
review_description: I got the .13 oz trial size which goes a long way as an oil, and have been using it nightly for a week and a half. I don’t notice a huge impact yet. It certainly isn’t doing any harm. One thing is, it’s too oily for me to use during the day, it does not absorb into my skin, even after waiting like 10-15 minutes before putting on my cream, it’s still quite oily on my skin. I can say I won’t purchase this product, not that it’s not good but it’s not worth it to me personally and maybe that’s attributed to not struggling with redness which seems to be something it helps people with.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing facial oil packed with rare superberry antioxidants for rapid hydration and velvety-soft skin with a healthy-looking glow.
review_description: This product is amazing, super light and hydrating. I love most Youth to the People products but this along with the superberry dream mask have to be my favorites! I could not recommend enough!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing facial oil packed with rare superberry antioxidants for rapid hydration and velvety-soft skin with a healthy-looking glow.
review_description: This is a lovely, cosmetically elegant oil that layers beautifully. It's not a heavy, ultra moisturizing face oil, instead it is a light and quickly absorbing one that gives your face a kiss of moisture. I have normal skin, and use this morning and night. It absorbs quickly and never leaves a greasy finish. It has a slightly citrusy smell. I use 4-5 drops all over my face and neck. I've had no breakout problems, and enjoy the hydration this gives me!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing facial oil packed with rare superberry antioxidants for rapid hydration and velvety-soft skin with a healthy-looking glow.
review_description: I never write reviews for products, but I had to with this. I got the sample for some Sephora points with another order and omfg. My skin is GLOWING. Multiple people compliment me on my skin whenever I wear this. 10/10.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing facial oil packed with rare superberry antioxidants for rapid hydration and velvety-soft skin with a healthy-looking glow.
review_description: Got a sample as a gift, and I love it already! It makes my skin look and feel vibrant. I apply it before my mist spray for my nighttime routine, I’ve only used this in the day time once, but since it’s an oil, I’ll most likely use it more at night and just wash it off in the morning.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing facial oil packed with rare superberry antioxidants for rapid hydration and velvety-soft skin with a healthy-looking glow.
review_title: Relieved Redness and Makes My Skin Glow. WOW!!!
review_description: An amazing oil that brightens my red, sensitive skin. I can’t believe how effective it is eliminating my redness, I’ve never experienced it with any other product. It is not as hydrating for my extremely dry skin. BUT- I’ve noticed that when I apply it BEFORE my moisturizer (and after my serum),this works so much better for long lasting hydration. The moisturizer locks the hydration and antioxidants of the oil. But when I apply the oil as the last step, my skin is left dry within a few hours. So far, this is the best facial oil I’ve ever used that not only does not irritate my skin, but also takes away the redness. Please don’t ever stop making this.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A fast-absorbing facial oil packed with rare superberry antioxidants for rapid hydration and velvety-soft skin with a healthy-looking glow.
review_description: Fell in love with this when I bought the Protect the Planet kit. It’s lightning fast absorbing and after a week of using it, my skin just feels super soft but never shiny. It looks brighter and healthier. I just love that it’s never looks oily just refreshed and super soft to the touch!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A facial oil rich in critical antioxidants and omega 6 and 9, Virgin Marula Antioxidant Oil Face Oil moisturizes, nurtures, and balances while restoring a youthful glow.
review_description: I love this, it’s so easy to apply and not greasy at all!!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A facial oil rich in critical antioxidants and omega 6 and 9, Virgin Marula Antioxidant Oil Face Oil moisturizes, nurtures, and balances while restoring a youthful glow.
review_description: This oil is amazing!! Easily absorbs onto my skin. Light and non greasy. Best thing I’ve purchased in a long time. I use it everyday on my face. I have a really dry patch of skin on my the front of my leg the developed when I was pregnant verity my son. It’s been most five years nothing was would soothe it nothing I got from the store or the doctor. I’ve been treating that part of my leg with the oil as well and I could see and feel the difference almost immediately. The skin is softer and the darker color began to fade after just two days. Truly amazing. Worthy every penny.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A facial oil rich in critical antioxidants and omega 6 and 9, Virgin Marula Antioxidant Oil Face Oil moisturizes, nurtures, and balances while restoring a youthful glow.
review_description: Haven’t noticed much yet. Makes my face look oily even with one drop

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A facial oil rich in critical antioxidants and omega 6 and 9, Virgin Marula Antioxidant Oil Face Oil moisturizes, nurtures, and balances while restoring a youthful glow.
review_description:
I’ll start by saying that I have dry and sensitive skin. This oil helped with hydration, made my skin feel soft and dewey, but after the first and second use, I started a minor breakout with some milia formed. Seeing that my face was reacting to the oil, I stopped using it on my face and used it on other areas (décolleté, hands, knees) so as not to waste the product. It is very hydrating..

I would recommend this oil for those who don’t tend to have sensitive/reactive facial skin, or for those who have tested marula oil product(s) on their faces before, without issue.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture

what_it_is: A quick-absorbing, medicated dry oil to clear congested pores, treat and prevent acne, and smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for clearer, smoother skin.
review_description: This face oil is.. sultry. I love the texture, the consistency, the ingredients! After falling down the rabbit hole of skincare research, I submerged ready to invest in Sunday Riley products. My skin is.... attached to it's problems. I've never found, in my entire life anything that will clear my skin. Even now, after slowly introducing many products into my routine including Tretinoin, I am still not clear of blemished. Each and everyday I have them on my face, my chest, and my back. I've been consistently using U.F.O. for three weeks now and I see improvements and just feel good putting this non-oily product onto my body knowing that I'm getting the salicylic acid treatment that it needs. The other ingredients in this formula really make it nourishing, which you wouldn't expect from a 1.5% salicylic acid treatment usually. I'll continue to use this product faithfully and believe that I will benefit long-term from amazing results.

what_it_is: A quick-absorbing, medicated dry oil to clear congested pores, treat and prevent acne, and smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for clearer, smoother skin.

I woke up the next morning with a beautiful glow. My pores looked smaller, and overall my skin just looked better. I've bought this oil a couple times, and I recommended it to my friend who also has oily skin, and she absolutely LOVES IT!! It's a little on the pricey side so I can't buy it as often as I'd like, but it's definitely worth every penny!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Redness
what_it_is: A next-generation retinol oil that boosts the look and feel of skin plumpness, while improving the appearance of wrinkles, redness, and pores for visibly younger-looking skin.
review_description: YOU NEED THIS IN YOUR ROUTINE. this products is a game changer. i put it on at night paired with the sunday riley lactic acid treatment and when i wake up the next morning all my problem areas are significantly less angry looking. i also noticed very quickly that it instantly smooths and softens your face. great addition to your nighttime routine if you’re looking to blur the skin.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Spots, and Redness
what_it_is: A next-generation retinol oil that boosts the look and feel of skin plumpness, while improving the appearance of wrinkles, redness, and pores for visibly younger-looking skin.
review_description:
This retinol oil is my new favorite retinol product so far. It’s formula is gentle enough to work up to use nightly and is mostly hydrating enough for most skin types.
I will say, it can be a tad drying for super dry skin like mine, but if you just combine it with their Juno superfood oil or a similar hydrating oil, it’s perfect. 

Unlike other reviewers I have not had any issues with the color transferring onto clothing or pillowcases. Even when I accidentally spilled a drop or two onto a shirt it didn’t stain.

A little goes a long way with this oil, as with most facial oils, they recommend just a few drops for the whole face and I tend to do closer to 8 or 10 to cover my neck as well. Those with oilier skin types would probably be fine with 4 of 5 drops but my skin sucks up product so quickly I tend to use a bit more. 

I also love that it absorbs quickly and while my skin usually looks dewy (which i love) after I apply all my skincare, it doesn’t last more than 15 minutes so for anyone worried it’ll leave them feeling too shiny, I didn’t see that problem at all

Cannot recommend this one enough!

skincare_concerns: Dryness and Redness
what_it_is: A mushroom-infused, hydrating, watery lotion that reduces the look of redness and preps cleansed skin for serum and moisturizer.
review_title: maybe if you really like toners and fragrance?
review_description:
I just don't really understand the purpose of this product, and it truly is a classic example of marketing manipulation. 
Firstly, I gave it 2 stars because it didn't do anything for me (I explain below why its formulation doesn't even really make it possible to substantiate its claims) but it also didn't harm my skin. I have pretty resilient skin however, and am not bothered by fragrance. 
Upon inspection of the ingredients list it becomes clear why it didn't do anything: the formula is basically water and essential oils. Essential oils can be very irritating so I'm perplexed as to why they would be recruited for a product aimed at soothing sensitive skin. "Mushroom elixir" is a misnomer because Chaga and reishi are some of the last ingredients on the list, meaning the ingredients in the lowest concentration. 
Anyone who says this absorbed well into your skin- well yeah, it's water... 
I suspect when the marketing claims this lotion/toner "preps" your skin for serums etc. it basically means that it gets your face wet, which a wet/damp face does allow ingredients to penetrate more successfully. This is why many products (and dermatologists, estheticians) are applied to a damp face, with the exception of vitamin A.
So in summary- if you like the step of a toner to wet your face before applying other serums/treatments/moisturizers, you aren't sensitive to fragrance, and you have the extra cash to fork over $50 for essential oils and water, then do you. But the reality is that your money is going more toward a sensorial experience with this one, which I completely understand. Skincare is a form of self-care and it should be enjoyed.

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A simple but effective three-ingredient daily treatment spray that soothes stressed skin and reduces the look of redness and irritation.
review_description:
After using this as recommended for one week, I've already seen and felt huge improvements to my combination complexion. Winter is the worst because my forehead and cheeks get very dry and flaky while the sides of my face and my nose become oily. This spray, when used after cleansing (I do the K beauty double cleanse) and before moisturizing, maintains my skin's natural defense barrier.
I'm blackhead prone, and I've noticed my pores giving them up more readily since using this spray. I also have patchy redness on the sides of my face and those are considerably less noticeable now. With my sensitive skin, I was worried about taking the risk. I'm still dealing with violent acne from a Yes to Coconut scrub I tried out on my forehead, but the Tower 28 spray has calmed it down too.
It's a fantastic toner, and I highly recommend it.

what_it_is: A simple but effective three-ingredient daily treatment spray that soothes stressed skin and reduces the look of redness and irritation.
review_description: I cannot recommend this product enough! During the pandemic, stress and mask wearing had gotten the better of my skin. It was constantly irritated and breaking out. I've been using this product for a week and my skin has completely turned around. It is now glowing and my breakouts are greatly reduced. My only issue is with the spray applicator. I feel like it wastes some of the product so I tend to open it up and use it on a cotton round instead.

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A simple but effective three-ingredient daily treatment spray that soothes stressed skin and reduces the look of redness and irritation.
review_description: I needed rescue from mask face. This worked. Bought it for all my girlfriends

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A simple but effective three-ingredient daily treatment spray that soothes stressed skin and reduces the look of redness and irritation.
review_description: This saved my skin. I was breaking out very badly around the chin area where I normally wear my mask and this literally balance the ph on my skin. I spray it after every cleanse my skin. Best part it literally only has 3 ingredients!! It does have a scent but after using it so much and seeing results you won’t mind it, Tower Beauty you saved everyone from this “mask-acne” highly highly recommend!

skincare_concerns: Blemishes, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A simple but effective three-ingredient daily treatment spray that soothes stressed skin and reduces the look of redness and irritation.
review_description: This really helps reduce any inflammation or redness from a brake out!
