what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_description: Love this product! I credit this as well as Murad recovery serum for helping significantly to reduce redness and even out my complexion. I deducted a star for the ridiculous price; however, for me a little bit goes a very long way.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_description:
Like it but not sure what it actually does. 

Not sure if I would purchase again.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_description:
I’ve been using Tatcha’s The Essence for the past three years and it’s kept my face hydrated. I have heard a lot of good things about SK-II’s essence and decided to get the small bottle to try out. I have to say I am not impressed with SK-II. It’s caused my rosacea to flare up and little bumps on my jaw line. The essence doesn’t smell like anything until it hits your skin then it takes on a sour fermented fishy smell. I don’t see any improvements to my pores and wasn’t very hydrating. It’s only hydrating if you use a big palmful. 
I’m going back to Tatcha’s essence.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_description: I'm all for luxe products but I really didn't notice a difference using this. It also has a fermented smell to me that I find odd and I usually can tolerate fragrances. It's refreshing and gentle and evens your skin tone but nothing worth $99 for a MINI size.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_title: Not gonna lie, didn't see a different
review_description: I didn't see a difference for better or worse, so I'm rating 3 stars. I felt like I was just patting expensive water on my face for as long as I had the bottle. Again, no negative effects, but nothing positive either. No difference in my skin when I started using it, and no difference when I used up the bottle and didn't use it anymore.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_description: Such a waste of money. Didn’t do anything to my skin.

skincare_concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture, Dark Spots, and Pores
what_it_is: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.
review_title: When I’m rich I’ll order this in bulk
review_description: This makes my face feel brand new again. Only downfall is the price but I’ve managed to get a bigger free sample for my birthday and a smaller free sample when checking out. It’s amazing.

what_it_is: A silky, fine mist moisturizer that can be used under or over makeup for dewy glowing skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: Half way through the bottle and just 1 week after it was too late to return, the pump broke. It’s a $50 spray so a broken pump doesn't cut it. And I can’t get a refund or a new pump. Won’t purchase again and don’t recommend.

what_it_is: A silky, fine mist moisturizer that can be used under or over makeup for dewy glowing skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: I really wanted to like this product but I just can’t stand the smell. It has a weird, herbal curry-like smell. It also feel nice but leaves my skin feeling oily. Not a fan and will not be repurchasing.

what_it_is: A silky, fine mist moisturizer that can be used under or over makeup for dewy glowing skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: I really enjoyed this product. It gave my skin a nice, dewy look, which has been a struggle to get during this dry winter. I had set this product aside for some time because I didn’t really notice a difference in the summer while using it (skin gets oily quickly), but I’m glad I picked it up again. It did smudge my eye makeup some, and the price is a bit high for me, but it enjoyed using it when I wanted to add something extra to my look.

what_it_is: A silky, fine mist moisturizer that can be used under or over makeup for dewy glowing skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: I have dry/combination skin and I do find that using this mist before or after my moisturizer gives me that extra natural, dewy glow. However, the scent is horrible to me. It isn’t strong fragrance but it just has a terrible stench to it... Almost reminds me of public bathroom cheap soap scents. With that being said It is nice to have, just not for that price. Beautiful packaging also

what_it_is: A silky, fine mist moisturizer that can be used under or over makeup for dewy glowing skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: I have sensitive, dry skin, and this mist didn’t irritate my skin - but it made me look oily, not dewy.  The mister is good though.

what_it_is: A silky, fine mist moisturizer that can be used under or over makeup for dewy glowing skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: One of my favourite tatcha products. Given the fact that it’s a skin mist it has no real skin benefits other than surface hydration, but that’s exactly what I’m looking for. For example if my makeup is looking powdery/ cakey I finish with 3-4 spritz of this and it gives my makeup a dewy skin like finish. I also like to use this when I apply my moisturizer a while before I go to bed and need a little bit of rehydration. My dry skin loves this. If you’re oily I’d opt for the satin skin mist (blue bottle)

what_it_is: A silky, fine mist moisturizer that can be used under or over makeup for dewy glowing skin anytime, anywhere.
review_description: The spray is perfect light mist to your face. It’s not a lot spray compared to other sprays that feel like you sprayed a lot of water.

what_it_is: A bestselling brightening serum that unveils your skin's natural aura with within.
review_description: The combination of this and a glycolic exfoliator made my skin glow, lifted the dullness, and freshened my aging look.  I haven’t been maintaining my routine since having kids a few years ago. Within a week of aggressive exfoliation and nurturing serum I am plainly surprised at the visible results.

what_it_is: A bestselling brightening serum that unveils your skin's natural aura with within.
review_title: my mother enjoyed stealing some from me tho
review_description:
I can’t bring myself to give this product one star, even though that’s what I feel the serum deserves based on how it “changed” my skin over the 2-3 months I rationed it (didn’t do much of anything). If I give it one star, that means I spent almost $250 for a One Star Product. 

That said, if I’m being honest, I bought this product more for the brand name & the novelty of splurging than the product quality. So in that sense, it served it’s purpose perfectly. I just. Wish it had done more for my skin.

Also, the packaging is pretty, what with the opalesque bottle, but it was impossible to get product out towards the end. & with the price pt, that flaw was more painful than usual.

what_it_is: A bestselling brightening serum that unveils your skin's natural aura with within.
review_description: My skin is bright and soft after using it for one week

what_it_is: A bestselling brightening serum that unveils your skin's natural aura with within.
review_description: Had high hopes for this but felt a bit heavy and ended up causing me to breakout. Didn't see much difference in lightening any spots for me.

what_it_is: A bestselling brightening serum that unveils your skin's natural aura with within.
review_description: I've been using this product for a few months now and it works like magic!!! My skin looks plump and dewy and hydrated upon application. It does brighten acne scars and makes my face a little brighter. My skin looks healthier with this product! I also have sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate my skin at all.

what_it_is: A bestselling brightening serum that unveils your skin's natural aura with within.
review_description: This serum is the best. Whatever they put in there works! my skin is a whole shade or two lighter when I use this consistently. I know because my foundation was way too dark for me after using this for a few months. I stopped and my tan came back slowly. I think this just helps keeps your skin at the brightest shade it can be. I love it!

what_it_is: A bestselling brightening serum that unveils your skin's natural aura with within.
review_title: A gentle, lush serum that could be more effective
review_description:
After using this consistently over the course of 2-3 months, I do notice that my face is marginally smoother, however, at $245, this does not pack the punch that I hoped it would. This serum is incredibly gentle and enjoyable to use, making it a luxurious (self care) addition to your skincare routine. However, if you are truly looking to fight hyper-pigmentation/texture concerns or even out and brighten your skin tone, I would recommend a different serum with more potent active ingredients. 

Pitera and niacinamide are the first few ingredients listed for this product, which is reassuring -- I do not doubt that over years and years of consistent use, your skin will very slowly and subtly transform with this serum. However, I personally do not have that patience (or wallet capacity), especially when there are significantly more potent and effective niacinamide products out there at a tiny fraction of this price.

what_it_is: A quick-absorbing, collagen-enriched emulsion that helps firm and fortify the appearance of skin under the chin and jawline.
review_description: This is incredible. Truly works! Works better when you use it as directed, on label.

what_it_is: A quick-absorbing, collagen-enriched emulsion that helps firm and fortify the appearance of skin under the chin and jawline.
review_description: This product is amazing - I'm about to order my 3rd bottle. I haven't noticed the smell mentioned by some but it has made a real difference to my neck and chest. Have tried many products but this is the only one that delivered!

what_it_is: A quick-absorbing, collagen-enriched emulsion that helps firm and fortify the appearance of skin under the chin and jawline.
review_description: I love this product! I think it’s a great preventative care measure, and I notice reduction in fine lines on my neck. It’s definitely not a need but a want... but I love it!

what_it_is: A quick-absorbing, collagen-enriched emulsion that helps firm and fortify the appearance of skin under the chin and jawline.
review_description: I used the entire bottle to give it a chance but saw no improvement. Wrinkles, texture, laxity all the same as before.

what_it_is: A quick-absorbing, collagen-enriched emulsion that helps firm and fortify the appearance of skin under the chin and jawline.
review_description: At first application I didn’t like the smell but it quickly dissipated. Now I don’t even notice it. Im using it for future aging prevention so only time will tell but it certainly has all the right ingredients. And I like how quickly it absorbs into the skin leaving a soft not greasy feel.

what_it_is: A quick-absorbing, collagen-enriched emulsion that helps firm and fortify the appearance of skin under the chin and jawline.
review_description: The first bottle I bought had a broken pump. It was replaced and I have been using it for a few weeks.  I feel like it does work somewhat in tightening loose skin but the smell is off putting.  I will not purchase again.

what_it_is: A quick-absorbing, collagen-enriched emulsion that helps firm and fortify the appearance of skin under the chin and jawline.
review_description: I have been using this for a couple of weeks and I can definitely see the results. I usually use Strivectin but hated how it would pill under my jaw. I have not had that problem at all! My neck is smoother and the wrinkles from tech-neck are starting to lessen. I will definitely be buying this again.

what_it_is: A resurfacing softener of 98.7 percent pure antiaging Japanese superfoods that makes all skin care work better.
review_description: I did not have any negative effects from this. I didn’t break out or anything, which is always a good sign. This essence looks and feels like water, and moistens the skin before applying — I believe there are micronutrients in there but I just don’t think I *need* this product. Based on reviews I’ve read elsewhere, there is not a very high concentration of micronutrients in this essence compared to others on the market. I do find that my moisturizer absorbs well after using it, and my skin looks generally clear and soft. However, I have found that I get better effects from a hydrating toner that is waaaaaay less expensive. I have enjoyed using this while I have it but I don’t think I would buy it again. There are similar products out there with better value. After a few months I stopped using it for a couple of weeks, and then started again, and didn’t notice any difference in my skin with or without it.

what_it_is: A resurfacing softener of 98.7 percent pure antiaging Japanese superfoods that makes all skin care work better.
review_description: I love this product. Has helped with readiness and dryness.

what_it_is: A resurfacing softener of 98.7 percent pure antiaging Japanese superfoods that makes all skin care work better.
review_description: I cannot rave loudly enough about Tatcha. The Essence is worth the investment, in my book. The travel size has lasted me months, and I happily picked up the product when I ran out.

what_it_is: A resurfacing softener of 98.7 percent pure antiaging Japanese superfoods that makes all skin care work better.
review_title: Plumping this way... Bonus: this lasted me forever
review_description: I initially tried Tatcha The Essence and tried to take it back because I didn’t see immediate results. It’s a very unassuming product but when the lady at Sephora Union Street recommended I try it again and use it every day, I saw at least the plumping effects. I give this a 4 star because of the price. I don’t know if I would buy it again or not due to the price, but I do prefer this over other essences I’ve tried. It’s really lightweight and can go over anything. Always put it on a clean face in the morning, I typically use after a mild toner and take a few minutes in between. But I would say try it for plumping, moisture if that’s what you’re looking for. Bonus: It has lasted me FOREVER.

what_it_is: A resurfacing softener of 98.7 percent pure antiaging Japanese superfoods that makes all skin care work better.
review_description: No noticeable difference with use. Somewhat disappointing because typically enjoy Tatcha products.

what_it_is: A resurfacing softener of 98.7 percent pure antiaging Japanese superfoods that makes all skin care work better.
review_description:
Just started using this 3 days ago. It’s absolutely wonderful!! My skin looks so much better already. Redness gone, pores smaller and a dewy look to my skin. The only thing I can think of is that some who don’t love it may be younger and already have nice skin. I’m 57 and it’s changed my whole complexion!!

This is the first review I’ve ever took the time to comment on that’s how much I love this product!!

what_it_is: A resurfacing softener of 98.7 percent pure antiaging Japanese superfoods that makes all skin care work better.
review_title: this is the only softener I will ever use
review_description: I am not been a huge softener fan, nor have I understood its effects. However... since I started using this product 3 DAYS ago, I have seen a noticeable difference in my skin. I struggle with redness and uneven skin tone. My skin type is oily/combo, so I can also struggle with balancing hydrating and shine. In combo with the dewy cream, my skin has looked even more clear (even when I didn't struggle with blemishes before so I didn't know this was possible), bright, and most importantly - even skin tone. I definitely think this product and the dewy cream have helped reduce my redness. My skin has been looking soooo good lately, and it has only been 3 days. I am a total fan of THIS softener now, and I understand the impact of using a softener. Applying this product with a cotton pad felt sooooo good too. It feels like a clean, hydrating, fresh swipe on my face. I have tried a lot of toners/liquid exfoliators and my skin often feels bone dry and uncomfortable after. My skin feels refreshed after using this softener. I highly highly highly recommend.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rejuvenating cream and massage tool that leaves the look of your neck and jawline more lifted, sculpted, and smoother while increasing the feeling of firmness.
review_description: I started to become self conscious of the lines in my neck, so have been on a quest to find a neck cream. The first couple I tried seemed great at first and then lost their effectiveness. This was the opposite: no noticeable changes at first but after about 2 weeks, I definitely noticed. I just finished my first jar and I couldn’t be happier with the results!! Must try!!!

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rejuvenating cream and massage tool that leaves the look of your neck and jawline more lifted, sculpted, and smoother while increasing the feeling of firmness.
review_description: I gat this neck cream thinking. That because the price it was going to work. But NO.  Already half way to be finish and. Nothing significant happens

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rejuvenating cream and massage tool that leaves the look of your neck and jawline more lifted, sculpted, and smoother while increasing the feeling of firmness.
review_description: This product is terrific! It beats having to go get a nonsurgical lift, which is way more expensive than this product.  Neck area felt tighter after a few applications. The key here is to be consistent with the application and I loved the fact that it came with a rose quartz tool to apply.  It does have a light scent which I found pleasant.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rejuvenating cream and massage tool that leaves the look of your neck and jawline more lifted, sculpted, and smoother while increasing the feeling of firmness.
review_description: This does hydrate your neck area which helps everything look better. But word to the sensitive ladies - the cream is rich, thick and slightly fragranced. It did not soak in well and caused some irritation and itchiness on my neck and chest. That’s not the look I’m going for so will not be using this moving forward.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rejuvenating cream and massage tool that leaves the look of your neck and jawline more lifted, sculpted, and smoother while increasing the feeling of firmness.
review_description: Although the product has a lovely lavendar scent and a thick texture, it didn't do what it says it's supposed to do.  No improvement at all - and defiinitely no "sculpting" - on my neck after several months of use. I will say it works well as a nice hand cream, but that's about it.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rejuvenating cream and massage tool that leaves the look of your neck and jawline more lifted, sculpted, and smoother while increasing the feeling of firmness.
review_description: This is worth every penny. I can already see a difference after a few uses.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A rejuvenating cream and massage tool that leaves the look of your neck and jawline more lifted, sculpted, and smoother while increasing the feeling of firmness.
review_description: I was amazed at how well and how quickly this product worked!  I’m half tempted to buy enough to fill a tub so I can bathe in the stuff.  Think that would work? I guess since that might be a bit pricey I’ll just be checking out the other products in this brand.  Either way, take my money!!!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A moisturizer that visibly improves skin’s elasticity, smoothness, and hydration, and supports a more youthful appearance.
review_title: Great results after a 52 lb weight loss!
review_description: Just finished my first jar of this cream. Worked extreamly well for my skin. Noticed a big difference after the first few days. No "crapeiness" in my neck or décolleté now at all. I use product at least 5 days a week. I have not had an issue with staining or dry skin. I do put the cream on before dressing and make sure it has a bit of time to sink in before putting cloths on though.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A moisturizer that visibly improves skin’s elasticity, smoothness, and hydration, and supports a more youthful appearance.
review_description: fantastic neck and chin cream.  Priced right and does as well if not better than pricey high end.  A keeper

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A moisturizer that visibly improves skin’s elasticity, smoothness, and hydration, and supports a more youthful appearance.
review_description: Orange! This stained my shirt orange. Not impressed and it leaves a grimy texture on my neck. Hoping to return

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A moisturizer that visibly improves skin’s elasticity, smoothness, and hydration, and supports a more youthful appearance.
review_description: Hoping to return, this cream turned my neck red and itchy for a few days after using.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A moisturizer that visibly improves skin’s elasticity, smoothness, and hydration, and supports a more youthful appearance.
review_description: This cream is very rich and feels good going on. However, it turned my neck orange and was crusty the neck morning. My neck actually felt drier.  Not a fan.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A moisturizer that visibly improves skin’s elasticity, smoothness, and hydration, and supports a more youthful appearance.
review_description: I love this cream. Everything about it is amazing. The smell is terrific, it is silky smooth, and absorbs on me like a dream. There is also a lot in the jar, more than I usually expect from this type of cream. This will definitely have a spot in my routine for a while.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A moisturizer that visibly improves skin’s elasticity, smoothness, and hydration, and supports a more youthful appearance.
review_description: I stopped using it after a little more than a week, because my skin was looking overall drier.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A hydrating facial spray that supports and replenishes a healthy microbiome, mimicking components that keep the acid mantle feeling strong, soothed, and balanced.
review_title: it’s refreshing, but Idk if it’s actually worth it
review_description:
As far as facial hydrating sprays go, this D.E is one of the better ones I’ve tried. The spray is a bit intense, be careful with how close you spritz it towards your face. I honestly think that this did not give me an intense amount of hydration. It felt refreshing, but I haven’t seen any noticeable changes in my combo skin. My favorite use of this spray, went into my makeup routine, because I like to spritz my brush when blending out my concealer, to avoid the dreaded “cake face” look. All in all, very doubtful I’ll purchase this product. 
I received this from Influenster to try and my give my honest opinion.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A hydrating facial spray that supports and replenishes a healthy microbiome, mimicking components that keep the acid mantle feeling strong, soothed, and balanced.
review_description: I usually really enjoy Drunk Elephant products, but this one doesn't do it for me. It does feel light on the skin,  which is nice, but I don't notice a difference using it. I use it twice a day (at least). I have extremely dry skin so anytime I want to freshen my skin I spritz it and I always spray morning and evening. I received this product from Influenster and I am glad. I would be disappointed if I purchased. It left my skin tacky feeling, but it was still tight and dry. I did not notice any change in hydration using this spray. Not a bad product and I still love DE, but this is a pass for me.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A hydrating facial spray that supports and replenishes a healthy microbiome, mimicking components that keep the acid mantle feeling strong, soothed, and balanced.
review_description: Ok so I like that this product is very hydrating and is a great mid refresher as well! The mist is super mega gentle. But I do not like the smell at all. I don't know  what it is , is just bad.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A hydrating facial spray that supports and replenishes a healthy microbiome, mimicking components that keep the acid mantle feeling strong, soothed, and balanced.
review_description:
This product feels refreshing and light on my skin. I’ve been using it in the morning as well as during the day if I need a refresh. I’m not into the scent as it does smell strongly fermented, but then again it is fermented so it is what is is! It’s harder to get an even application, but overall it does what it’s supposed to do! 

I received this product free for testing purposes.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A hydrating facial spray that supports and replenishes a healthy microbiome, mimicking components that keep the acid mantle feeling strong, soothed, and balanced.
review_description: I wanted to love this but it made my skin burn and so itchy. My skin was extremely red after use so I won’t keep using it. I love the packaging though!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A hydrating facial spray that supports and replenishes a healthy microbiome, mimicking components that keep the acid mantle feeling strong, soothed, and balanced.
review_description: Although I did find this spray to be hydrating and I thoroughly enjoyed the sprayer, I did not like the smell and I felt a little itchy around my chin after use. I was using this product at work and letting it fully dry before placing my mask back on so maybe those in conjunction made it itchy. But either way, it's the world we live in so I need to be able to use a spray that doesn't make me itch. I received this product free for my honest review.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness
what_it_is: A hydrating facial spray that supports and replenishes a healthy microbiome, mimicking components that keep the acid mantle feeling strong, soothed, and balanced.
review_description: I’ve been using this product as both a re-fresher mid day as well as a preparatory step before applying a mask or moisturizer. The smell is fine- not too offensive. It feels like an added step that is provided added moisture-

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness
what_it_is: A bestselling anti-pollution treatment essence powered by antioxidant-rich kombucha for visibly smooth, luminous skin.
review_description: I got a wee sample of this, and like some other reviewers said I assumed it was just expensive water. Calling it essence doesn't help convince me. :)  I'm in my late 40s and have had terrible maskne the last few months.  I was shocked to see how clear my face was the next morning.  A lot of the redness was gone and it really seemed to heal those little pimples quickly.  Once the sample was gone the maskne returned so I decided to splurge on a bottle.  I'm really happy with this product as nothing seemed to help me other than CV Skinlabs spray, which Sephora doesn't carry.  I got the soy cleanser too as part of a set, and they seem to work well together.  Nice soft scent.  The price is high for my budget but like I said this is one of the few things that works for me so I will continue to purchase it.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness
what_it_is: A bestselling anti-pollution treatment essence powered by antioxidant-rich kombucha for visibly smooth, luminous skin.
review_description: I like this product and the idea of it is really great and convenient (I took it on vacation with me and it was so easy when we were on the go to clean our face from pollutions). Unfortunately it did make me break out a bit, so I would say not good for acne prone skin.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness
what_it_is: A bestselling anti-pollution treatment essence powered by antioxidant-rich kombucha for visibly smooth, luminous skin.
review_description: This essence smells lovely and, after using for a few months, it hasn’t caused any breakouts or irritation. That said, it hasn’t provided any perceivable benefit to my skin’s tone, firmness, clarity, or overall wellness. It is basically a nice smelling water. It’s really a useless step in my skincare routine, so I won’t be repurchasing.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness
what_it_is: A bestselling anti-pollution treatment essence powered by antioxidant-rich kombucha for visibly smooth, luminous skin.
review_description: Gave this a shot after I ran out of my SK-II facial essence, hoping it would be a great affordable replacement. I am almost done with the bottle and I didn’t really see any significant changes to my skin. I’m not a big fan of the application it feels slimy...like it never truly absorbs into the skin. I’ll stick to SK-II

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness
what_it_is: A bestselling anti-pollution treatment essence powered by antioxidant-rich kombucha for visibly smooth, luminous skin.
review_description: makes my skin feel glowy - a lil expensive for toner / essence but its worth it :)

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness
what_it_is: A bestselling anti-pollution treatment essence powered by antioxidant-rich kombucha for visibly smooth, luminous skin.
review_description: This is my first time ever trying an essence. I'm surprised because I've reviewed a lot of beauty products. I always thought that essences were an expensive gimmick. How wrong I have assumed. I have oily skin and this felt like it was 100% oil that I was patting onto my face. I was extremely nervous, but I wanted to give this a fair chance and I'm glad I did. I used my Patrick Ta fan to quicken the drying time and it soaked into my face within 2 minutes! My face instantly felt plush, hydrated, and not greasy AT ALL. I guess it just applied that way, but it soaked in very well. I concluded that it's the concentration of high quality ingredients. The cherry on top is that this CLEAN certified, so I feel totally comfortable using this on my delicate face. This is something that I would buy and recommend, *for sure*. This has sparked my interest in essences. ✧(=✪ ﻌ ✪=)✧

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness
what_it_is: A bestselling anti-pollution treatment essence powered by antioxidant-rich kombucha for visibly smooth, luminous skin.
review_description: This smells fresh, feels fresh, and is feels nice after washing my face.

review_description: Purchased it with high hope. Very creamy yet non-greasy. Easy to absorb. Although I have oil/sensitivity skin, this cream works wonders for my skin. The texture is moist and smells lightly fragrant.

This cream make my neck lines a lot smoother and some I cant even noticed,the skin in that area is firmer as well. It is worth the price, you wont regret it!

review_description: Ive been using this since before it came to sephora it is sooo good. It is thick and moisturizing, but not greasy or heavy. It absorbs into skin leaving it so hydrated and soft. A little goes a long way and it lasts forever!

what_it_is: An ultra-revolutionary, breast-firming mask that gives breasts a naturally "plumper" look thanks to its clinically tested ingredients.
review_description:
I bought this to help with some perkiness post breastfeeding. I don’t think I’ve been consistent enough to see improvements for that. I do believe it makes my breast softer. After reading other reviews, I now plan on putting it all over my chest to help with some fine lines developing from my cleavage. I love that a little goes a long way with this product. I mix tanning drops in all of Maelys products,
Too.

what_it_is: An ultra-revolutionary, breast-firming mask that gives breasts a naturally "plumper" look thanks to its clinically tested ingredients.
review_description: I wanted to use this all out before writing this review. After using for about 2 months I would say this is okay. My breast felt moisturized and softer. I did not see anything lifting happening which was the main reason why I bought this. I had some stress marks on my breast and this made it fade, which I'm glad for. Overall I feel like this is just to hydrate your chest area, there is nothing revolutionary about this

review_description: My skin feels absolutely amazing after having used this product a few times. I wouldn't say my breasts are lifted, it might take longer for that, but my skin absolutely feels much tighter and super soft.

what_it_is: An ultra-revolutionary, breast-firming mask that gives breasts a naturally "plumper" look thanks to its clinically tested ingredients.
review_description: I have been getting a lot of chest wrinkles and my normal face care stuff just wasn’t cutting it. Finally found something dedicated to my chest. Plus is my boobs are looking perkier too!

what_it_is: An ultra-firming, moisturizing neck cream that targets the specific needs of the delicate skin around the neck and chest.
review_description: Bought this for $17 at TJMaxx, just in case anyone loves this product and wants to find cheaper alternatives

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dryness
what_it_is: An ultra-firming, moisturizing neck cream that targets the specific needs of the delicate skin around the neck and chest.
review_description: I don’t have a loose neck, primarily because I’m only in my early 30’s but I use this religiously as a preventative measure. It’s a thick cream that absorbs in to the skin so nicely. I have sensitive skin, everything makes me itch- this doesn’t. I’m on my second bottle.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dryness

review_description: Fabulous. Best I have ever found. Works really well as last step in neck & chest routine. Bought 2nd bottle after a week as I don't want to be without it.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dryness
what_it_is: An ultra-firming, moisturizing neck cream that targets the specific needs of the delicate skin around the neck and chest.
review_description: I've been using this product about once per week. I haven't noticed much of a difference on my neck lines yet. It has a moderate scent which dissipates. It is fairly thick in texture.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dryness
what_it_is: An ultra-firming, moisturizing neck cream that targets the specific needs of the delicate skin around the neck and chest.
review_description: I've noticed definite improvement in skin elasticity with this product. It's  not greasy, smells great, and absorbs almost instantly. Doesnt stain clothes either, which happens alot in the am when I'm running late and forget to apply it before getting dressed.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dryness
what_it_is: An ultra-firming, moisturizing neck cream that targets the specific needs of the delicate skin around the neck and chest.
review_description: Great neck cream and I love that it is in a tube not a jar.  Will definitely repurchase.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dryness
what_it_is: An ultra-firming, moisturizing neck cream that targets the specific needs of the delicate skin around the neck and chest.
review_description: Great product! Will definitely repurchase! By far the bedt neck cream that I have ever used.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A supercharged face and neck cream clinically shown to visibly reduce wrinkles, even skin tone, and smooth skin‘s texture.
review_description: I love this moisturizer! I got it as a sample and when that ran out I had to get a full size. I have sensitive skin and it doesn’t irritate it. It actually makes my skin look smooth!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A supercharged face and neck cream clinically shown to visibly reduce wrinkles, even skin tone, and smooth skin‘s texture.
review_description: Just purchased and will definitely give an honest review after a substantial time of use. So far, i like it.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A supercharged face and neck cream clinically shown to visibly reduce wrinkles, even skin tone, and smooth skin‘s texture.
review_description: I got two samples and each one is 7ml. I really like the formula and the product itself is cheaper than other products on the market which contain Pro-Eylane. Pro-Eylane is an ingredient improves skin wrinkles by stimulating the synthesis of Glycosaminoglycans (GAGs), and it’s called HYDROXYPROPYL TETRAHYDROPYRANTRIOL in the ingredient list.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A supercharged face and neck cream clinically shown to visibly reduce wrinkles, even skin tone, and smooth skin‘s texture.
review_description: So disappointed that the formula changed. Initially, I thought I got a bad batch: different color, different smell, thicker cream yet not as moisturizing. But after reading lots of negative reviews (which incidentally have been removed over night) I realized I wasn’t the only one let down. The original formula was a delightful experience: I always sighed with rapture after applying it—the lavender smell and gliding effect on my skin—was a daily ritual I looked forward to. Now not so much. I find the new formula substandard, it dries my skin and no longer justifies the price point. I might as well use any old anti-aging drugstore brand. I don’t understand the rationale behind changing the formula of beloved product by so many? I can only get on the bandwagon and ask that you please return to the original formula, and then have a shout-out about it. Until then, I will abstain from buying this product. Thank you!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A supercharged face and neck cream clinically shown to visibly reduce wrinkles, even skin tone, and smooth skin‘s texture.
review_description: Awesome! I used to use the old formula and was upset when they changed it. I decided to just go for it and thank goodness I did. I like this one better. It's more lightweight and absorbs quicker but with all the benefits of the older formula. Moisturizes well, calms skin, and has lots of anti-aging benefits. Most importantly, it does not make me breakout! Would definitely recommend.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A supercharged face and neck cream clinically shown to visibly reduce wrinkles, even skin tone, and smooth skin‘s texture.
review_description: Absolutely love this! It feels luxurious upon application. My skin stays hydrated even into the next day. I have terribly dry skin and even in the middle of winter this keeps my skin soft and smooth.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A supercharged face and neck cream clinically shown to visibly reduce wrinkles, even skin tone, and smooth skin‘s texture.
review_description: I love the new version, don’t pay attention the the people giving this product 1 or 2 starts, they don’t know what they’re talking about!

what_it_is: A whipped, lightweight moisturizing neck and chest treatment that visibly smooths, firms and evens the appearance of damaged skin along the neck and chest.
review_description: I was very skeptical to buy this because all the great reviews seem to be from people that got it for free. I bought it anyways. Here is what i thought: like a lot of people say, it doesnt come full which is ridiculous because the container is already so tiny. I used it a few times and honestly saw no difference what so ever (im looking for something to tighten up my neck/chin area). I couldn’t justify keeping it at this point so i returned it.

what_it_is: A whipped, lightweight moisturizing neck and chest treatment that visibly smooths, firms and evens the appearance of damaged skin along the neck and chest.
review_description: First, the positive:  This cream has a nice feel; not greasy or too heavy.  I also love that it has SPF 25.   The downside is that the packaging is deceptive;  it is concentrated near the surface, with lots of airspace beneath.  For the rather hefty price, I was disappointed.  Also, I have not noticed any change in the appearance of my neck.  I think there are better creams for less money.

what_it_is: A whipped, lightweight moisturizing neck and chest treatment that visibly smooths, firms and evens the appearance of damaged skin along the neck and chest.
review_description: I am seeing a slight decrease in my side-sleeping lines and increase in moisture in that area. Also love the extra sun protection as I’ve been getting more freckled there after years of exposure. Texture is light and not greasy. I am glad I purchased on sale as I don’t think I would repurchase at full price.

what_it_is: A whipped, lightweight moisturizing neck and chest treatment that visibly smooths, firms and evens the appearance of damaged skin along the neck and chest.
review_description: I was super excited about this product and was looking for something for my neck/chest (and bonus that this has SPF in it). I am so disappointed that this product made me breakout with small red bumps all over my chest after only a week of use. I have never broken out on my chest and have used many different products on it so it was upsetting to see this result from a product that is certainly not cheap.

what_it_is: A whipped, lightweight moisturizing neck and chest treatment that visibly smooths, firms and evens the appearance of damaged skin along the neck and chest.
review_description: I read reviews all the time.  I have been using this cream for just a few days.  I have read all of the reviews about how people do not like it for various reasons.  I honestly do not know why I decided to try it, I think it is the SPF that would help eliminate a step.  I am 50 years old, dry skin with warm undertones.  My skin is really well taken care of.  In the past year or so I have noticed my neck sagging right in the middle and appears dry.  I have used neck cream but it hasn't really helped.  I have gotten botox in my neck several times to help.  I used this once and saw a huge improvement, like better than the photos above.  I started using it twice a day and I honestly cannot believe my eyes.  It seems too good to be true.  For the sale price, worth a try???  If it works anything like it has for me it's worth it.  I already ordered another in fear that it will be discontinued.

what_it_is: A whipped, lightweight moisturizing neck and chest treatment that visibly smooths, firms and evens the appearance of damaged skin along the neck and chest.
review_description: Not do what it said it does. Maybe does why is on sale know.

what_it_is: A whipped, lightweight moisturizing neck and chest treatment that visibly smooths, firms and evens the appearance of damaged skin along the neck and chest.
review_description: Like the product but the pot I received from Sephora looked half used - it definitely was not full! Suspect Sephora sent me a product that was returned. This should not happen and I would also hope that the packaging would prevent it!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A refreshing, exfoliating scrub that quickly and visibly retexturizes, polishes, and reduces the size of pores with AHAs, lemon peel, and sugar.
review_description: Recieved this from Influenster and will definitely buy it. The scent is amazing. The exfoliation is great. Does not lather up too much just pure exfoliation.  Did not dry out my sensitive skin either.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A refreshing, exfoliating scrub that quickly and visibly retexturizes, polishes, and reduces the size of pores with AHAs, lemon peel, and sugar.
review_description: I love this face scrub! It’s the perfect amount of exfoliant and leaves your skin feeling smooth and fresh. It also smells amazing! This product is 100% worth it’s price and I would definitely buy it again!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A refreshing, exfoliating scrub that quickly and visibly retexturizes, polishes, and reduces the size of pores with AHAs, lemon peel, and sugar.
review_description: This is a nice quality product the scrub is thorough but not rough. I did expect my skin to feel softer after use as it does leave a bit of a drying feel once rinsed but I do notice brighter looking skin

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A refreshing, exfoliating scrub that quickly and visibly retexturizes, polishes, and reduces the size of pores with AHAs, lemon peel, and sugar.
review_description: I love this lemon scrub! My skin feels and looks refreshed after one use. It cleans, tones, and improves the look of your skin. Not to mention, it smells amazing. I like using this twice a week to keep my skin looking renewed and radiant. It's a little on the pricy side, but you shouldn't use it more than a couple times a week and a little goes a long way. It's a good investment for those with discoloration or acne scars.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A refreshing, exfoliating scrub that quickly and visibly retexturizes, polishes, and reduces the size of pores with AHAs, lemon peel, and sugar.
review_description: This stuff is great! Its not to ruff on the skin and I feel like it really exfoliates and leaves me with clean skin. It also leaves my face so smooth and soft. I just wish the lemon smell was stronger! I received this product through influenster to review and I'm so glad I did because I will probably buy again!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A refreshing, exfoliating scrub that quickly and visibly retexturizes, polishes, and reduces the size of pores with AHAs, lemon peel, and sugar.
review_description: This product is really great! The texture is great for exfoliation and feels like it really cleans my skin! The only think preventing it from having 5 stars is the fact the smell is pretty strong, but I’m just someone who prefers lighter smelling face products, if you don’t mind this is a great product!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A refreshing, exfoliating scrub that quickly and visibly retexturizes, polishes, and reduces the size of pores with AHAs, lemon peel, and sugar.
review_description: First I'd like to say I received this product through Influenster for review with that being said all my thoughts on this product are honest. I've been using this product for a little bit now and I've seen a big difference in the texture of my skin thanks to the AHA's. I also really love the scent it's really refreshing and clean smelling. Though I do think this product wouldn't be suitable for someone who has sensitive skin and 2 to 3 times a week would be too much.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A firming cream for the face and neck that hydrates and hugs skin for a defined look.
review_description: This is the BEST product that I have ever used at Sephora. As a former employee, I have had the opportunity to try it all and this wow'd me beyond expectations! Firmed and smoothed my neck without any negative effects-the results are incredible! I am now a lifetime user! Thanks Fresh!❤️

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A firming cream for the face and neck that hydrates and hugs skin for a defined look.
review_description: Instant, noticeable results without feeling heavy or greasy.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A firming cream for the face and neck that hydrates and hugs skin for a defined look.
review_title: love it! effective and worth the price IMHO
review_description:
I love this! I have used it for a couple of years now and loved it so much that I slowly added all of this entire line of products. Truly amazing stuff! 
It is noticeably effective and moisturizes wonderfully. It never leaves my skin feeling weird or greasy. I would recommend this entire line to anyone.
I tried another even more expensive brand and it covered my face in a fine swath of blisters that took almost a month to fully heal. No such bad reaction from this line, ever. 
 It's pricey, but the jars last a long time. I consider it worth the investment and have repurchased a few times and expanded my products to include this cream, the serum, over night mask, eye mask/cream, kombucha toner and the strawberry scrub. That's how much I adore this product and brand.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A firming cream for the face and neck that hydrates and hugs skin for a defined look.
review_description: Love it! I'm honestly not sure if it really does any firming, but it is hydrating and I love the smell!

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A firming cream for the face and neck that hydrates and hugs skin for a defined look.
review_description: Love the scent and feel. But this falls flat when it comes to being effective. Compared to Kiehl’s and Clinique which also fell flat, I’m not impressed.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A firming cream for the face and neck that hydrates and hugs skin for a defined look.
review_description: This is my second jar. I really appreciate this in the summer when I’m spending time in my pool. This firms my neck and chest right up and improves my texture as well. I use it at night only and I highly recommend.

skincare_concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity
what_it_is: A firming cream for the face and neck that hydrates and hugs skin for a defined look.
review_description: I received a sample and then immediately bought full sized. I saw firming results in a week. I am typically highly skeptical and more than anything look for a moisturizer that will simply hydrate and not cause me to break out. I'm 35 and in 1 week my skin was TIGHT. It had noticeable elasticity and bounce; I could tell when I looked at my skin and when I touched it. I'm a tea lover so the scent for me is absolutely divine but admittedly it runs a little on the strong side if you are sensitive. I use this as both my day cream and night cream. It soaks in completely and doesn't make me greasy by 10 am. (I have combination skin that runs insanely oily half way through the day).

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A lightweight gel that promotes a youthful-looking neck and a firm, sculpted jawline.
review_title: It seems to be working though
review_description: As someone else said, star off for price and smell. My gods the smell is awful.  I saw the reviews and thought, it couldn't be that bad... right?  No it is that bad. Like a gross condiment smell.  At first it just smells like chemicals but after it is on it is a horrible lingering smell that makes me feel like I spilled mayonnaise on my clothing and didn't clean it up.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A lightweight gel that promotes a youthful-looking neck and a firm, sculpted jawline.
review_title: Star off for price and smell, but it works
review_description: I’ve been using this cream for about 6 weeks. I have a couple of very prominent deep wrinkles in my neck and a little crepiness on my décolletage, and this cream plumps and hydrates those problem areas so they are much less noticeable. Some days they almost disappear. That said, the smell is not lovely, but I forgive that when a product works. The price is very high. But I may end up spending as much if I look for a lower priced option that works as well, so I may repurchase anyway. It doesn’t take much, so one 2 oz jar may last me up to 6 months.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A lightweight gel that promotes a youthful-looking neck and a firm, sculpted jawline.
review_description: I got a sample but quickly bought a jar.  I was only using the sample once per day but after only a couple days, I noticed my small dark spots and skin tags on my neck start to disappear.  I read the other reviewers about the smell.  Yes, the smell isn't lovely but it isn't that strong and not even noticeable after a few minutes.  This stuff works wonders.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A lightweight gel that promotes a youthful-looking neck and a firm, sculpted jawline.
review_description: I wanted to love this product, but don’t even care if it works or not....the smell is not pleasant and the texture in combination with the smell made me think I was smearing mayo on my neck.  Will not purchase again.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A lightweight gel that promotes a youthful-looking neck and a firm, sculpted jawline.
review_description: I received this as a deluxe sample. The first thing I noticed was the smell. It smells like a mixture of ketchup and mayonnaise. The only reason I gave it three stars is because I haven’t used it long enough to see any results. The other reviews are good so I will continue to use it up.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A lightweight gel that promotes a youthful-looking neck and a firm, sculpted jawline.
review_description: Seems to be firming up my chin & neck area. The smell is interesting. Not sure it's worth the price though.

skincare_concerns: Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, Fine Lines, and Wrinkles
what_it_is: A lightweight gel that promotes a youthful-looking neck and a firm, sculpted jawline.
review_description: I really wanted like this as I have noticed lines on my neck that I do not like.  However, I took before pictures and after months of using this, I did not notice any difference.  It is not cheap, so I do not recommend it.

what_it_is: An ultra-soft cloth that will erase all makeup with just water.
review_description: Best make up remover ever! It cleaned it off with one wipe and my skin feels amazingggg!

what_it_is: An ultra-soft cloth that will erase all makeup with just water.
review_description: best face cloth ever.   i researched a face cleaning cloth that was easy on face.    it litterly is an eraser.    keeps skin smooth. cleans makeup off.  love love

what_it_is: An ultra-soft cloth that will erase all makeup with just water.
review_title: Get a couple because you’ll never go back!
review_description: Does exactly what it says. I will never use makeup remover again! All this takes is warm water, so you NEVER have to worry about running out, you never have to worry about how your skin will react, and you don’t waste countless cotton rounds! The cloth works as well as any product. Bye bye forever, makeup remover!!!

what_it_is: An ultra-soft cloth that will erase all makeup with just water.
review_description:
I received a sample and was excited to try it...
I find I have to press a tad hard to remove black eyeliner and some eyeshadow... also my face felt like it had some sort of residue on it after use. I think this is better for mornings when you wash your face...
It could just be me but I didn’t care for it

what_it_is: An ultra-soft cloth that will erase all makeup with just water.
review_title: This works—if it doesn’t that’s on your products
review_description: Not to be THAT person, but people who don’t like this product, maybe you’re just not careful about what you put on your skin. Look to your product before you look to the form of removal. I used makeup for years that was full of harmful ingredients and not natural. I would attempt to remove it with white wash cloths, and even upon bleaching the wash cloths, they would still remain stained the color of my foundation and eye makeup. Upon switching to makeup products with less harmful ingredients, I noticed this happened less, but still a little. I would still use soap with my washcloth to remove makeup off my skin, and even with bleach every so often, there would always be a light stain. With the makeup eraser, I don’t even need soap, I just need water and the makeup eraser cloth. AND the makeup eraser loses all stains when washed—not something that happened with any regular wash cloths I used. I’m sure if I used harmful products, my makeup eraser wouldn’t perform as well. However, if you use quality products, the makeup eraser is perfect. It removes all and any makeup with soap. If you use crap products that harm your skin, yeah this may not be perfect, nothing ever will be. Not to be a Kardashian, but visit the EWG website and learn about the stuff you’re letting seep through your pores everyday before you complain about a makeup removing product not working.

what_it_is: An ultra-soft cloth that will erase all makeup with just water.
review_description:
I cannot believe how well this product works! I tried a lot of makeup removers and I always woke up with black undereyes. With the makeup eraser I don't have to work a lot to get my eye makeup off, 3 swipes and it's gone! And when I wake up, my eyes are super clean, all the makeup is really gone! 
I got the pink sample from the reward bazaar and I bought the black right away after waking up!
I also love the ecological side of this product, less product, less waste.

what_it_is: An ultra-soft cloth that will erase all makeup with just water.
review_title: Gentle but super affective! Love it
review_description: I was sceptical at first but it really works like magic! I tried it for the first time with a Smokey eye look and it took off ALL my eye brow pomade, eyeshadow, liner and mascara without irritating my eyes like regular wipes do. I will never go back to regular wipes!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An antioxidant-rich cleansing oil that gently removes impurities and long-wear makeup to leave skin looking and feeling beautifully healthy.
review_description: This is AMAZING! Breaks products down in an instant. Gentle but effective and full of great clean ingredients.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An antioxidant-rich cleansing oil that gently removes impurities and long-wear makeup to leave skin looking and feeling beautifully healthy.
review_description: I don’t wear makeup so I can’t say much for it stinging my eyes but I LOVE this product. It’s great as a first cleanse and emulsifies beautifully. It’s great for a relaxing face massage at the end of the day. I will DEFINITELY buy this again and prefer it to balms I’ve used in the past.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An antioxidant-rich cleansing oil that gently removes impurities and long-wear makeup to leave skin looking and feeling beautifully healthy.
review_description: Enjoying this, especially this winter with weather and the heater! It gets everything off, it's gentle since I use Tretinoin, and it doesn't strip my skin.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An antioxidant-rich cleansing oil that gently removes impurities and long-wear makeup to leave skin looking and feeling beautifully healthy.
review_description: This is the second bottle and I really do enjoy washing my face at night with this product. I look forward to it actually. It does a really good job of getting rid of makeup. It does not irritate my dry-sensitive skin. There is really no scent. I will probably purchase this again.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An antioxidant-rich cleansing oil that gently removes impurities and long-wear makeup to leave skin looking and feeling beautifully healthy.
review_description: This thing melts makeup instantly!!! I feel really clean and refreshed after using ( I cleanse again after using it with my everyday cleanser) it does burn your eyes if it gets in them like any other liquid makeup remover would've, so my advice it´s to just be as careful as you can!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An antioxidant-rich cleansing oil that gently removes impurities and long-wear makeup to leave skin looking and feeling beautifully healthy.
review_description: It smells funny, but it works efficiently in removing my makeup. Requires very little effort to break it down and washes off fairly easily.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An antioxidant-rich cleansing oil that gently removes impurities and long-wear makeup to leave skin looking and feeling beautifully healthy.
review_description: Nearly instant results! This is great for taking off makeup. Thank you!

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A milky, ceramide-rich micellar water that thoroughly and gently removes makeup, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from the face and eye area—no rinsing needed.
review_description: Best makeup remover. Don’t need much to remove ALL my eye makeup.

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A milky, ceramide-rich micellar water that thoroughly and gently removes makeup, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from the face and eye area—no rinsing needed.
review_title: Best Micellar Water I’ve Ever Used!!
review_description: I love this product! To be fair it is the only high end micellar water I have purchased, however it is not even comparable to the drug store products I had been using previously. It makes my skin and lips feel so soft and takes off my makeup perfectly. I can’t wait to try more products from drunk elephant!

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A milky, ceramide-rich micellar water that thoroughly and gently removes makeup, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from the face and eye area—no rinsing needed.
review_description: For me, it didn’t work. I didn’t like the smell and didn’t find that it removes your make up well... I love the ingredients and can see it is good for the skin, but for me, it didn’t deliver. Had to return it.

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A milky, ceramide-rich micellar water that thoroughly and gently removes makeup, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from the face and eye area—no rinsing needed.
review_title: Perfect for sensitive and acne prone skin
review_description:
Love it.
Very gentle on the skin and removed makeup very nicely. 
It removes my waterproof mascara without any problems and leaves my eye lashes feeling soft. 
I have bought this product 3 times plus the traveling size option. 
Perfect to refresh your skin during and after a workout.

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A milky, ceramide-rich micellar water that thoroughly and gently removes makeup, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from the face and eye area—no rinsing needed.
review_description: Never thought I would have strong feelings about a micellar water lol. I love this! It melts my makeup and SPF off so fast and it’s not stripping, drying, or extra oily. I haven’t had any issues with it causing acne. I definitely prefer this over makeup balms or oil cleansers. I honestly think it’s worth the money and I will continue to repurchase.

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A milky, ceramide-rich micellar water that thoroughly and gently removes makeup, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from the face and eye area—no rinsing needed.
review_description: It doesn't complete remove all the makeup. I use it for makeup remover then I use my regular makeup remover to see if my makeup were complete remove. Which is unfortunately there's leftover makeups. However using this product does make my skin feel hydrated and fresh. But I don't see the purpose of using this product

skincare_concerns: Dryness
what_it_is: A milky, ceramide-rich micellar water that thoroughly and gently removes makeup, dirt, pollution, and bacteria from the face and eye area—no rinsing needed.
review_description: It’s a good for when you’re feeling lazy with getting your makeup off, don’t feel like a double cleanse and just want to go to bed. It smells kind of weird and it’s thick so i felt like I had to put a lot onto a cotton pad to get it onto my face. However I liked that it feels soothing and hydrating when your skin is tired and needs quick boost. Not sure I would buy again because there’s a lot of other products that remove makeup better, are better toners and cheaper.

what_it_is: A waterproof eye makeup remover suitable for contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes.
review_description: I've been using this for four months and the results are still the same: it does not work. It doesn't take out all my eye makeup, even when I only use a simple eyeliner and mascara. it really sucks.

what_it_is: A waterproof eye makeup remover suitable for contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes.
review_description:
I’m not sure I remember the last time I purchased a product so disappointing from Sephora. Let alone one by Sephora. It just didn’t work. And so much so I actually felt the need to leave a review. It may work for regular makeup, but not waterproof. I wear Bobbi Brown’s No Smudge Mascara which is known to be tough on the elements to begin with, but I thought at least something substantial would come off. Zilch. But I wasn’t ready to give up on it just yet (The great price! The available sizes!), so determined to make it work I tried a variety of ways of applying it. Directly with my hands. With a soaked tissue. With a classic cotton round. Putting it in a spray bottle and spraying it on for deeper penetration.  I tried different time variants too, waiting up to 1 minute 30 seconds. I even tried it in combination with Bioderma’s Sensibio Micellar Water (which is also recommended for its tough makeup removal), and I swear it removed less than the micellar water on its own.  Each time nothing removed my mascara fully, and most times I somehow managed to get the product in my eyes. Which btw- it DOES burn if you get it IN your eye. The only other make up I typically wear is tinted lip balm/gloss and The Creme Shop’s Macro brow, and this removes SOME of the Macro brow, so I think it MIGHT adequately remove most non-waterproof makeup. All in all I’m just pretty disappointed with this let down, and I don’t want you to be too…. Back to the drawing board. 


The picture below is of a soaked cotton round after I tried to remove my mascara on one eye. This is after 45 seconds of gently soaking and rubbing my lashes. As you can see it removed crumbs.
