what_it_is: A waterproof eye makeup remover suitable for contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes.
review_description: Best makeup remover I have been using, easy to go.

what_it_is: A waterproof eye makeup remover suitable for contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes.
review_description: My eyes are super sensitive when it comes to makeup remover and not only does it get the job done, it doesn’t irritate my eyes!

what_it_is: A waterproof eye makeup remover suitable for contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes.
review_title: could be better but gets the job done
review_description:
Pros: does not irritate my sensitive eyes
Cons: have to almost fully saturate a cotton pad in order for it to remove all makeup.
There are cheaper products out there, this one is a good average okay.

what_it_is: A waterproof eye makeup remover suitable for contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes.
review_description: Not great....it leaves some makeup behind. I have to rub over the same place a few times whereas with other brands, one swipe does it all. Won’t be purchasing again.

what_it_is: An extremely soft, gentle way to apply liquid skin care products.
review_title: YOU'VE NEVER FELT COTTON LIKE THIS.
review_description:
Game changer. No more makeup wipes. No more drugstore cotton pads. This should be the new standard for any kind of 'fabric' that touches your face. It feels like cotton candy on your face... A kitten's tail taking your makeup off. It does the job though. Just soak your a pad with micellar water and hold it over your eye for a few seconds. It will literally break down the makeup. Then ever so gently, brush it across the eye. Voila! I always follow with a balm or oil cleanser, then a water-based cleanser. But this cuts down on all the harmful tugging that makeup removal usually entails.

GREAT BUY.

what_it_is: An extremely soft, gentle way to apply liquid skin care products.
review_description: Soft,fine, removes makeup greatly! Been using this for years! Definitely the best facial cotton pad at Sephora

what_it_is: An extremely soft, gentle way to apply liquid skin care products.
review_description: This is really the best stuff out there. Super smooth and feels so soft against your face. I use this to apply toner daily. Love love love.

what_it_is: An extremely soft, gentle way to apply liquid skin care products.
review_description: Love how soft these pads are. I can't ever go back to using regular pads.

what_it_is: An extremely soft, gentle way to apply liquid skin care products.
review_description: I love them, they’re soft and thick but they don’t absorb a ton of product which is nice. I’ve repurchased twice and will continue to do so.

what_it_is: An extremely soft, gentle way to apply liquid skin care products.
review_description:
Pros: These pieces of cotton were incredibly soft and were able to sustain any serums that I placed on top of it. Compared to other cotton pads I've used, it is much more gentle.

Cons: I do think that it can become rather thin after placing product on it and wish that it was created to be a bit thicker. In addition, I do think the product is a little pricey for what it does as there are similar products that are organic that are cheaper. With only forty sheets of cotton, I've found that it didn't last me very long and I had to reorder more cotton pads pretty soon.

what_it_is: An extremely soft, gentle way to apply liquid skin care products.
review_description: These are amazing and a low cost way to treat your skin. I purchase these twice a year for almost daily use with skin care before makeup application.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A PEG-free cleansing balm that smooths the look of skin with natural papaya enzymes, while melting away stubborn makeup, dirt, oil, and SPF.
review_description: I was sold on this product when I read a review and the girl said that [my boyfriend saw me and said that I looked beautiful and glowing.] In my head I just "awwww-ed" because I found that to be just so adorable. This product really does supply a glow and effectively removes ALL of my makeup. The container feels luxurious and I love the sound that is made when I screw the top on and off the glass base.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A PEG-free cleansing balm that smooths the look of skin with natural papaya enzymes, while melting away stubborn makeup, dirt, oil, and SPF.
review_description: Looking at the reviews on line I thought I would give it a try. The first time I used it, I couldn’t wash it off. There was a film on my face that just wouldn’t wash off. I thought I had used too much and used it again the next day using a smaller amount. Same thing happened I couldn’t wash off the film. I then went to the Sephora website to see how to use the product. I wasn’t doing anything wrong. I would not buy this product again. I’ll go back to my other products

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A PEG-free cleansing balm that smooths the look of skin with natural papaya enzymes, while melting away stubborn makeup, dirt, oil, and SPF.
review_description:
This is just an ok product. 
It smells great and i like how it came with a scoop. 
But once applied to the face, its really a nuisance to wash off, i feel like it leaves a film. 
It does an ok job at getting my makeup off

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A PEG-free cleansing balm that smooths the look of skin with natural papaya enzymes, while melting away stubborn makeup, dirt, oil, and SPF.
review_description: This product made me break out. It did remove my makeup but I would not recommend.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A PEG-free cleansing balm that smooths the look of skin with natural papaya enzymes, while melting away stubborn makeup, dirt, oil, and SPF.
review_description: This is a nice balm but compared to my other favs (green clean) it just doesn’t seem to remove my waterproof mascara as well, and leaves a bit of a film. This is my first cleanse and I just feel like others work better...

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A PEG-free cleansing balm that smooths the look of skin with natural papaya enzymes, while melting away stubborn makeup, dirt, oil, and SPF.
review_description: The smell alone makes me give this 5 stars. The product itself is a godsend. I’ve been looking high and low for a great makeup remover + cleanser because I hate dragging cotton pads across my eyes and this is it!! It takes literally everything off while making your skin feel smooth and supple. The smell is addicting and helps that papaya is my favorite fruit. I’ve had layers of waterproof mascara on and in just a matter of seconds, this cleansing balm breaks it down, much better than any micellar water. I use this as a pre cleanser to my liquid cleanser, works perfect!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A PEG-free cleansing balm that smooths the look of skin with natural papaya enzymes, while melting away stubborn makeup, dirt, oil, and SPF.
review_description:
This stuff is great- I was hesitant to try a cleansing balm, because I was so used to the sudsy cleansers and wasn't sure if I could make the change. I don't wear a lot of makeup, but those mineral sunscreens are hard to get off, and I didn't want to keep scrubbing at my face, so I had to finally try one.

This stuff is fantastic- it smells so good, and does have a texture like a smooth sorbet.  It goes on greasy, but melts my mineral sunscreen easily, and then it rinses clean.  Like most of the Glow Recipe products I've tried, it's a winner.  And best of all, it uses clean ingredients.

I love trying new products, so you know a product is good if I'm willing to get it again.

what_it_is: A go-to makeup remover that gently erases long-wearing eye and lip makeup without tugging skin.
review_description: I’ve tried many drugstore eye makeup removers, but they didn’t measure up. Would either dry out my lids, or leave odd white residue, or irritate/tug, or not remove every trace of makeup. This is truly a gem: gentle AND effective. A bit oily, but I can live with that. Also cleanly (and quickly) removes fake lashes at the end of the day. Recommend!

what_it_is: A go-to makeup remover that gently erases long-wearing eye and lip makeup without tugging skin.
review_description: My go to for waterproof and tube mascara. Never irritating and one drop takes off my whole face makeup.

what_it_is: A go-to makeup remover that gently erases long-wearing eye and lip makeup without tugging skin.
review_description: It's more than I want to spend, but I always end up coming back to this make-up remover because it's the most efficient at removing waterproof mascara. I've tried other make-up removers and they just don't get my make-up off as quickly.

what_it_is: A go-to makeup remover that gently erases long-wearing eye and lip makeup without tugging skin.
review_description: I really enjoyed this to remove my makeup. Took off waterproof eyeliner and mascara easily. Pretty gentle on my skin. Would repurchase but there’s better more affordable options in my opinion. Still I would recommend this if you wear a lot of eye makeup.

what_it_is: A go-to makeup remover that gently erases long-wearing eye and lip makeup without tugging skin.
review_description: This is the worst smelling beauty product I’ve come across, which really surprised me. It is a strong chemical smell that reminds me of the solvents used to clean motor oil off concrete floors. Maybe I am more sensitive to smell than most, but it rendered the product unusable to me.

what_it_is: A go-to makeup remover that gently erases long-wearing eye and lip makeup without tugging skin.
review_description: I keep repurchasing this because it’s super gentle but effective on all makeup including waterproof. It’s been my go-to for a few years now and it’s cheaper than the Lancôme one that I used to use. Very happy with it !

what_it_is: A go-to makeup remover that gently erases long-wearing eye and lip makeup without tugging skin.
review_description: Takes off even the most waterproof of makeup. I use a lot of pressed pigments for my eyes and this remover makes sure my eyes aren't left stained. Even helps loosed my concealer. Also doesn't irritate my skin.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A deep-cleansing vegan oil that helps remove makeup and impurities from skin.
review_description: Really great! Perfect consistency (spreads easily but doesn’t run out of your hands before you can get it on your face), smells sweet and citrusy, never burns eyes, washes off well

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A deep-cleansing vegan oil that helps remove makeup and impurities from skin.
review_description: Feels amazing and I love that it removes all my makeup! No separate eye makeup remover needed!  I remove  the day away and go right into my cleanser! Love! Love! Love!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A deep-cleansing vegan oil that helps remove makeup and impurities from skin.
review_description: One pump of this oil is all it takes to watch my make-up literally melt off of my face. Gently massage onto a dry face then rinse with warm water. I no longer have to use a harsh cleanser, as this allows me to follow with a gentle cleanser and toner. The condition of my sensitive skin has improved ten-fold since using this product.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A deep-cleansing vegan oil that helps remove makeup and impurities from skin.
review_description: I was a huge fan of the product while working as an esthetician. I recently got a sample with their new grey packaging and the smell was much stronger, did not lather on the skin and left me feeling dry. Not impressed with the extensive use of essential ois.. Definitely not the same formula. Not worth the price.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A deep-cleansing vegan oil that helps remove makeup and impurities from skin.
review_description: It’s so good. I love how it deeply cleans my skin, removes make up and makes my skin so soft !! Combining it with the microfoliant is just magic !!!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A deep-cleansing vegan oil that helps remove makeup and impurities from skin.
review_description: I’m obsessed with this. I decided to try double cleansing and I started to use this first followed by Kiehl’s cucumber face wash and it has really helped the texture from my KP that I have on my cheeks. My skin feels super clean and soft after I use this. I have sensitive and dry skin so it’s tough for me to find a cleanser that doesn’t strip my skin too much while still giving me a deep clean. Definitely 5/5 would recommend!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A deep-cleansing vegan oil that helps remove makeup and impurities from skin.
review_title: Works for Maskne and Makeuo Removal
review_description: Love using this. Smells nice and take all your makeup off. It also helped in clearing my persistent maskne. Didn’t break out my sensitive combo skin. I followed it up with a gentle cleanser.

what_it_is: An award-winning makeup remover that effectively cleanses away eye makeup while being gentle enough for sensitive skin and contact-lens wearers.
review_description: The best! Removes eye makeup perfectly and leaves zero residue. The best remover for eye makeup that I’ve tried — even better than Clinique which is one of my favorites. Works best with a cotton pad.

what_it_is: An award-winning makeup remover that effectively cleanses away eye makeup while being gentle enough for sensitive skin and contact-lens wearers.
review_description: I really like how soothing and gentle this product is. There’s no tugging at all no matter how much makeup you wear. There’s also no harsh smell or drying alcohol feel. I would definitely buy a full-size of this product after getting a sample of it.

what_it_is: An award-winning makeup remover that effectively cleanses away eye makeup while being gentle enough for sensitive skin and contact-lens wearers.
review_description: This makeup remover is excellent. I use it for both my eyes and my face makeup as well. I did not have any issues with it burning my eyes or skin and it did not irritate my skin in any other way. I feel like my face and eyes end up much cleaner than with other makeup remover brands, this stuff can remove even the most waterproof and long lasting makeup! The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because it is very expensive for the amount you receive.

what_it_is: An award-winning makeup remover that effectively cleanses away eye makeup while being gentle enough for sensitive skin and contact-lens wearers.
review_description: I usually try to use a product at least a few times before writing a review, but I used this for the first time this evening and I’m SOLD. I love this product. It got off the majority of my eye makeup easily and without rubbing vigorously like I have to with most wipes. I used it before washing my face, but it still didn’t leave that intense of an oil like other brands do. Will definitely be repurchasing.

what_it_is: An award-winning makeup remover that effectively cleanses away eye makeup while being gentle enough for sensitive skin and contact-lens wearers.
review_description: It easily gets rid of eye makeup (even waterproof). This is the only eye makeup remover I can use that doesn’t give me a reaction. I’ve been using it for years and have tried other products but always end up with puffy eyes. I will never stop buying this product.

what_it_is: An award-winning makeup remover that effectively cleanses away eye makeup while being gentle enough for sensitive skin and contact-lens wearers.
review_description: Removes eye makeup without tugging. I use this daily and have used it over eye shadows, gel liners, ink liners and long lasting mascara and it seems to take care of all of them.

what_it_is: An award-winning makeup remover that effectively cleanses away eye makeup while being gentle enough for sensitive skin and contact-lens wearers.
review_description:
I have been using this product for YEARS. Takes off eye makeup quickly and doesn't feel greasy (make sure to shake it gently before using). I wear waterproof mascara and it is the best product I have found.
The 6.7 value paired with small travel size was a great value. Always nice to have a mini for gym or travel. 
Lancôme PLEASE don't change formula! This is a tried & true classic!

what_it_is: A natural cult-favorite toning mist that tightens pores, sets makeup, and provides an instant shot of radiance to the skin.
review_description: I love this and this is the only thing I use to set my makeup with. I do not know how many bottles I have purchased but I keep a mini one in my makeup bag and a large one in my makeup drawer. I have sensitive skin and am sensitive to fragrance and I do not have any issues using this nor does it have a fragrance. I like how it makes my makeup look and living in a hot state it just keeps my makeup looking fresh! I use matte foundations and this gives the proper amount of hydration without taking away my matte look. I can also go a full day without needing to blot and still look good. I have tons of products and I consistently try to find new things to replace others but this is one thing I do not have a desire to change.

what_it_is: A natural cult-favorite toning mist that tightens pores, sets makeup, and provides an instant shot of radiance to the skin.
review_description: Loveeeee this stuff! Typically not something I would add in my skin care routine, however with the pandemic and being a nurse wearing masks for 12-14 hours a day my chin has gotten some mask-ne I spray this on every morning before applying my mask and I have my chin is clear after two weeks. It has tea tree oil in it which is an anti bacterial. I also was getting a few bumps on my chest and it cleared it up. Smells amazing and works perfect, definitely a must!

what_it_is: A natural cult-favorite toning mist that tightens pores, sets makeup, and provides an instant shot of radiance to the skin.
review_title: Helps with my "mask-ne" and dehydrated skin!
review_description:
I knew about this products for years and never really had a use for it until the pandemic and use of masks. I could've sworn years ago, a brand rep pitched this to me as "anti-bacterial" for bacteria causing breakouts. 

I started getting really bad acne from wearing a mask all day at work (even after changing them 2x a day) Remembering what the brand rep told me I decided to give it a go finally, and I started spraying this on the inside of my mask and on my face during my lunch breaks in my car and it has made a big difference, as in not having a new breakout on my face by the end of the day!

I spray it on the inside of my mask to "kill" (allegedly) any bacteria accumulating from mouth germs and then on my face since the masks make my skin dry after a few hours. It really has helped in both aspects so I will be repurchasing the travel size to always have in my bag.

I put one less star because it's primarily made up of essential oils which can be bad for my sensitive skin in the long run, so I will be solely using this for wearing masks. As far as the smell, I personally love it and it's almost like aromatherapy for me in the middle of a long work shift. I can see however how some people might absolutely hate the aroma.

what_it_is: A natural cult-favorite toning mist that tightens pores, sets makeup, and provides an instant shot of radiance to the skin.
review_description: I recently purchased the beauty exilir from Sephora, this is about my 4th bottle I am purchasing now. When I received the bottle I noticed a thin green yellow film surfacing the top of the bottle. I’ve never seen this in my previous purchases. I’ve shaken the bottle a 1000x times but the oil like substance keeps returning. I am emailing to enquire if the product might be old because it is currently unappealing to use on my face. The product is amazing but this last bottle makes me think I may not repurchase.

what_it_is: A natural cult-favorite toning mist that tightens pores, sets makeup, and provides an instant shot of radiance to the skin.
review_description: Makyaj sabitlemek ve gözeneklerin küçülmesi için dermokozmetik ürün ve gayet başarılı

what_it_is: A natural cult-favorite toning mist that tightens pores, sets makeup, and provides an instant shot of radiance to the skin.
review_description: I use this as a toner and it's so refreshing and moisturizing - great spritz bottle too.

what_it_is: A natural cult-favorite toning mist that tightens pores, sets makeup, and provides an instant shot of radiance to the skin.
review_description:
Refreshing spa like smell with subtle notes of a grandmas handbag or hope chest. I definitely see what some reviewers are talking about that it stinks, but it’s like the whole cilantro tastes like soap moment. I don’t think cilantro tastes like soap but some people do! This product smells nice but I can totally smell that weird retirement home like something has almost been rotting? Maybe it’s been slightly fermented? 

This mist has little to no effect on my super sensitive skin yet I adore it. Refreshing to use but hardly necessary by any means. 

If you’re curious about this product then go for it. I’ll continue to use but wouldn’t consider this a holy grail. Would make a nice gift!

review_description: Instantly dissolved makeup, no longer will I have to scrub away at stuck on mascara.

what_it_is: An innovative cleansing balm that melts all traces of dirt, makeup, and sunscreen from skin, removing even water-resistant formulations.
review_description: Doesn’t cleanse the skin of makeup and sunscreen well. Can’t recommend to buy that product to anyone

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An innovative cleansing balm that melts all traces of dirt, makeup, and sunscreen from skin, removing even water-resistant formulations.
review_description: i've bought this twice and it takes off my makeup really well

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An innovative cleansing balm that melts all traces of dirt, makeup, and sunscreen from skin, removing even water-resistant formulations.
review_description: I love this! It removes all of my makeup and doesn’t strip my skin of all of its moisture.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An innovative cleansing balm that melts all traces of dirt, makeup, and sunscreen from skin, removing even water-resistant formulations.
review_title: DE missed a mark for cleansing balm
review_description: The texture and the ingredients are great but this cleansing balm does not emulsify. Like many other cleansing balms I have tried, I first massage the product onto my dry skin and then wet my hands a bit to massage the balm to slowly emulsify it to remove makeup. This product, no matter how much I massage with some water on my hands, the formula refuses to emulsify. It's a true "oil and water does not mix" type of situation. For the actual removal process, I feel like I tend to rely on the second part of my cleanse with either my foreo or a konjac sponge. It's a 1 star product for its purpose but gave 2 stars because the rich oils does leave my skin feeling smooth and soft afterwards. Bottom line, I wouldn't recommend this cleansing balm. Besides, there are so many great ones out there for a fraction of a price.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An innovative cleansing balm that melts all traces of dirt, makeup, and sunscreen from skin, removing even water-resistant formulations.
review_description: I love this product. Takes off all of my makeup and leaves my skin so dewy and smooth.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Redness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: An innovative cleansing balm that melts all traces of dirt, makeup, and sunscreen from skin, removing even water-resistant formulations.
review_title: Skin is soft, but not effective on mascara
review_description: I like the way my skin feels after using this, and the bamboo booster is a gentle exfoliant. But it doesn't remove eye makeup, so I wouldn't buy it again.

what_it_is: A gentle, effective makeup remover that transforms from a balm to a silky oil, melting away face and eye makeup and sunscreen.
review_description: I have tried the cleansing balm from Drunk Elephant, Glow Recipe & Dermalogica and the cleansing oil from Kiehls BUT Clinique has been the best one yet. No scent, with minimal ingredients. The other balms get messy to take off once mixed with water. It was recommended to store balm in a cool area so I kept mine near a window during fall/winter but kinda inconvenient.

what_it_is: A gentle, effective makeup remover that transforms from a balm to a silky oil, melting away face and eye makeup and sunscreen.
review_description: love this! only takes a little bit, just make sure to rub it in well. a great alternative to wipes if you are looking for a formula that is not drying or a bit aggressive.

what_it_is: A gentle, effective makeup remover that transforms from a balm to a silky oil, melting away face and eye makeup and sunscreen.
review_description: I collected this balm, the Drunk Elephant balm, the Pharmacy Balm and the Elemis balm because I wanted to test them all before deciding which one I liked the most. At first I wasn’t going to include Clinique but then it popped up in a sample size offer so I grabbed it. I thought the Pharmacy was going to be my favorite but what I realized is the Clinique Balm had no affect on my eyes while all the other Balms seemed to irritate them (some less than others). I think all of the Balms removed my make up fairly well and I wouldn’t be able to say one worked better but what does come up ahead of the others is the fact that because Clinique doesn’t bother my eyes at all. I am able to open my eyes without that stingy or goopy feeling. The formula Clinique uses is so gentle on the eyes it definitely is going to become my choice of Balm

what_it_is: A gentle, effective makeup remover that transforms from a balm to a silky oil, melting away face and eye makeup and sunscreen.
review_description: I got this with my points but oh my gosh is it the best thing I've received in the mail recently. It really is the best and easiest makeup remover in my arsenal and it has really has encouraged me to wear more makeup even during the pandemic because I don't dread taking my makeup off anymore. Taking off my makeup used to be a multi-step process but now I just use this product. It melts off even my waterproof eyeliner and mascara although you need be a little bit more liberal with the product for mascara. Highly considering getting more.

what_it_is: A gentle, effective makeup remover that transforms from a balm to a silky oil, melting away face and eye makeup and sunscreen.
review_description: I love that it melts and really breaks the makeup, also it's super easy to take it of (just with water), however I consider it's a little harder to take mascara off, however it's great with eyeshadow and foundation

what_it_is: A gentle, effective makeup remover that transforms from a balm to a silky oil, melting away face and eye makeup and sunscreen.
review_description: Removes ALL of my makeup. A little bit of product goes a long way, I bought this 4 months ago and there’s still so much left! It hasn’t broke me out or changed the texture of my skin negatively. Whenever I do end up running out I will be re-purchasing (:

what_it_is: A gentle, effective makeup remover that transforms from a balm to a silky oil, melting away face and eye makeup and sunscreen.
review_description: This product does an amazing job of taking off makeup! Not a trace is left on my face once I’m finished with it (liquid lip included). I have found that it can be harsh on the skin around eyes where my face is more sensitive.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Blemishes
what_it_is: A toner that exfoliates, visibly brightens and tightens, and hydrates for a smooth, even-, and energized-looking complexion that‘s all glow.
review_description: excelente toner vi resultados en días, uno de mis favoritos

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Blemishes
what_it_is: A toner that exfoliates, visibly brightens and tightens, and hydrates for a smooth, even-, and energized-looking complexion that‘s all glow.
review_description: Amazing, being Blonde and fair skin, sometimes we need little brightness, well once you apply Glow by Ren you will see instant glow. Apply little make up and you are ready to go. I absolutely love this product.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Blemishes
what_it_is: A toner that exfoliates, visibly brightens and tightens, and hydrates for a smooth, even-, and energized-looking complexion that‘s all glow.
review_description: I’ve been using this for a few months and while it does the job of exfoliating the skin, anyone with sensitive/sensitized skin like me should NOT use this daily. The first night I tried it my skin glowed, but the next night when I applied it my entire face went red. I waited a week before trying again - it tingled but no redness. I now use this regularly 2x times a week without issues.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Blemishes
what_it_is: A toner that exfoliates, visibly brightens and tightens, and hydrates for a smooth, even-, and energized-looking complexion that‘s all glow.
review_description: I wanted to love this as it deff made my skin glow but after a week of using I can confidently say it made me break out all over my face and also left a sticky feeling :( maybe just my skin but fyi

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Blemishes
what_it_is: A toner that exfoliates, visibly brightens and tightens, and hydrates for a smooth, even-, and energized-looking complexion that‘s all glow.
review_description: My skin really likes this toner. I use it only in the PM (sometimes AM too if I fell like my skin needs it) and I can tell that my skin is softer, more glowy and my hyperpigmentation is less visible!

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Blemishes
what_it_is: A toner that exfoliates, visibly brightens and tightens, and hydrates for a smooth, even-, and energized-looking complexion that‘s all glow.
review_description: I got a sample and it has lasted a really long time. I use it every morning and it seems to be a little drying even though I use quite a bit or moisturizer. I like the smell that is slightly citrusy. First thing in the morning is nice. I don't know that I would buy the full size of the product even though it would probably last forever. My skin is just a little too dry for it.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Blemishes
what_it_is: A toner that exfoliates, visibly brightens and tightens, and hydrates for a smooth, even-, and energized-looking complexion that‘s all glow.
review_description: When i first started using this, i felt like it really cleaned my skin of anything that my face wash didn't get, and i thought it really worked. I only used it at night after washing my face. it stung a LOT but i figured it was getting all the gunk out of my pores. after about 2.5 weeks of using, i started to get break outs like i haven't gotten in YEARS. my skin was overly oil and dry at the same time. this was the only thing i changed in my skin care so i'm 99% sure this is the culprit. i stopped using it, went back to my regular night time toner, and a week later my skin cleared up like crazy. My boyfriend started using it and it seems to work for him (he has more oily skin than me), so i think it was just way too intense for my skin.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A potent toner, supercharged with high-potency AHAs (glycolic and lactic acids), to reduce the look of dark spots in as little as seven days.
review_description: I purchased the 65ml to test it out and have gone ahead and purchased the 295ml before finishing the original bottle. I’m hesitant with toners as I often find they don’t deliver on promises and I have been shopping around for a while, trying different ones without settling yet. I struggle with dark marks from basically every spot/blemish I get and my routine is very focused on acid based exfoliation, hydration and targeting dark marks. This toner really compliments my routine and I’m certainly seeing a noticeable impact. It also smells really good.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A potent toner, supercharged with high-potency AHAs (glycolic and lactic acids), to reduce the look of dark spots in as little as seven days.
review_description: I never write reviews but I must for this one! I am now on my third bottle of this toner, in 2020 i decided to switch it up and use something new and more expensive and honestly i ended up going back to this one! It has helped tremendously with my acne and my hyperpigmentation, especially when my skin is freaking out due to mask acne, this has been a life saver. I have extremely sensitive and this really helps to sooth it and gives the skin a beautiful nourished glow! I only use it at night every night. Truly amazing !

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A potent toner, supercharged with high-potency AHAs (glycolic and lactic acids), to reduce the look of dark spots in as little as seven days.
review_description:
Disclaimer: Everyone’s skin is different so what may work for me may not work for you so keep that it mind. 
I’m on my second bottle and wow this has done wonders for my skin. I took time between my first and second bottle to make sure I noticed a change. Once I stopped using it I could tell my skin was starting to break out and appear very dull. I started using it again and my skin immediately improved and now I don’t have any dark spots. I definitely recommend and hope this works for everyone else like it did for me!

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A potent toner, supercharged with high-potency AHAs (glycolic and lactic acids), to reduce the look of dark spots in as little as seven days.
review_title: Love the way it makes my face feel
review_description: I bought this because I was told it would help get rid of the dark spots on my face. I have been using it everyday for several weeks now but haven’t noticed a difference. That being said, it may be to soon to tell. I do love the way it makes my face feel and it actually smells pretty good. My only complaint would be that my face started breaking out after I started using it. It may be my skin, but I suggest keeping acne cream on hand.

skincare_concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A potent toner, supercharged with high-potency AHAs (glycolic and lactic acids), to reduce the look of dark spots in as little as seven days.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A cleansing wipe that is formulated with cannabis sativa seed oil that removes impurities and makeup from the face and eyes.
review_title: Smells like men's drug store body spray
review_description:
I gave two stars because these get the job done, but the smell is almost unbearable for me.  They have a very very strong scent similar to those men's body spray products sold at drug stores.  

They do cleans well and I like the texture of the cloth but the scent. Peee-Yew!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A cleansing wipe that is formulated with cannabis sativa seed oil that removes impurities and makeup from the face and eyes.
review_description: These are fantastic! I've used several of the other types of cleaning wipes from Sephora and liked them but when I saw the Hemp I knew I had to try them. They are by far the best. They remove every trace of dirt and make up and leave my skin feeling fresh and clean. The bonus is the sent. I normally don't like things that have fragrance but these wipes have a wonderful (and familiar) sent that I enjoy. These are now a permanent part of my routine.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A cleansing wipe that is formulated with cannabis sativa seed oil that removes impurities and makeup from the face and eyes.
review_title: Wonderful facial wipe to use and buy
review_description: first time purchasing a product with Hemp in a Beauty product and was  satisfied with this product.  I loved how thick and big each wipe was and the scent of each wipe was great. was sad though to see Cannabis sativa oil was second to last ingredient .  overall might repurchase in the future

skincare_concerns: Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness

review_title: hands down most refreshing wipes ever !
review_description: These wipes are so refreshing ! They C L E A N your skin ! & they also leave a fresh scent . I love these wipes, I literally re ordered another pair

skincare_concerns: Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness
what_it_is: A cleansing wipe that is formulated with cannabis sativa seed oil that removes impurities and makeup from the face and eyes.
review_description: they remove every trace of my makeup, even my waterproof mascara and they smell great. I use to get the rose or alone but these ones are my new favorite.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling gentle, PHA- and BHA-infused watermelon toner that hydrates skin and minimizes the appearance of pores.
review_description: Love this stuff! Super soft on the face too! It’s also really nice that it comes in a smaller size!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling gentle, PHA- and BHA-infused watermelon toner that hydrates skin and minimizes the appearance of pores.
review_description: It did make my skin brighter, but didn’t refine the surface too much. The fresh watermelon fragrance makes it WORTH IT THO

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling gentle, PHA- and BHA-infused watermelon toner that hydrates skin and minimizes the appearance of pores.
review_description: I’ve tried soooo many toners and this is a definite stand out! First off the experience of gliding this toner over my skin is just lovely. It smells and feels so fresh and gentle. Absolutely LOVE the smell! I also really appreciate this is a PHA/BHA toner, but it is not overly stripping or drying of the skin. It has the perfect balance of chemical exfoliants mixed with hydrating and nourishing ingredients. This is one of my favorite Glow Recipe products. And definitely the best out of their Watermelon line. This is the only product I would actually repurchase from their Watermelon line. Love this toner!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling gentle, PHA- and BHA-infused watermelon toner that hydrates skin and minimizes the appearance of pores.
review_description: this is by far one of my new favorite toners! it goes on lightly without the usual sting of most toners. it leaves my skin feeling tight and firm. I only wish it was a slightly larger bottle but it seems a little goes a long way

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling gentle, PHA- and BHA-infused watermelon toner that hydrates skin and minimizes the appearance of pores.
review_description: Great gentle exfoliant. I use it daily and love it.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling gentle, PHA- and BHA-infused watermelon toner that hydrates skin and minimizes the appearance of pores.
review_description: I like this product. The smell is nice and since the texture is goey, I can put it with my hand and I feel like i don't waste any. Didn't see much pores reduction but I tried so many product and none really help. I may stick with Farmacy tho.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Dryness, and Dullness and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A bestselling gentle, PHA- and BHA-infused watermelon toner that hydrates skin and minimizes the appearance of pores.
review_description: I love watermelon anything and so I was excited to try this out. At first I didn't see much of a difference but after a few weeks I did notice that my skin looks brighter. The consistency of this toner is different than other toners I've used but I don't mind it. And it smells so good! I would buy this again

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A daily, non-stripping toner with real rose petals and hyaluronic acid that minimizes the look of pores while increasing skin hydration.
review_description: I tried this a couple of months ago, it is ok I didn’t notice any dramatic change in my skin. The smell is ok, very perfume like. Overall it was ok not a product I would buy again for the price, just an average toner. I like Kiehl’s flower toner better.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A daily, non-stripping toner with real rose petals and hyaluronic acid that minimizes the look of pores while increasing skin hydration.
review_description: Fantastic toner! Best bang for your buck too. One tip is to removed the spout thingy at the top once you are are 3/4 done as the rose petals bung up that little spout.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A daily, non-stripping toner with real rose petals and hyaluronic acid that minimizes the look of pores while increasing skin hydration.
review_description: A new staple in my makeup routine! I’ve always hated wearing a moisturizer under my makeup and this toner leaves my skin very moisturizer. I’ve also noticed my pores shrinking but I did switch over to a new cleanser at the same time I started using this.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A daily, non-stripping toner with real rose petals and hyaluronic acid that minimizes the look of pores while increasing skin hydration.
review_description: I normally use HERITAGE Rosewater & Glycerin spray bottle but wanted to try this instead. I am really surprised how much I enjoy this product. Leaves a subtle natural shine when applied under my Vitamin-C. Wish it came in a spray bottle instead. So I’ve been pouring the product on my hands then press onto my face. I was using a round cotton but it’s rough on my skin. I’m in my 40’s now and don’t want to aggravate my skin not spend $20 on a softer round cotton from Shishedo (super soft & gentle). I may just strain the product into my old bottle to save me the extra work. Lol Hope this is helpful for someone like me.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A daily, non-stripping toner with real rose petals and hyaluronic acid that minimizes the look of pores while increasing skin hydration.
review_description: Skin got so much clearer! It's like I can feel and see my pores disappearing. Leaves my skin feeling cool, fresh and clean. 100% recommend!

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A daily, non-stripping toner with real rose petals and hyaluronic acid that minimizes the look of pores while increasing skin hydration.
review_description: My aunt had me try this and I ended up loving it. After only using it twice I could already see it improve my skin texture and reduce my acne

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
what_it_is: A daily, non-stripping toner with real rose petals and hyaluronic acid that minimizes the look of pores while increasing skin hydration.
review_description: It’s a nice toner, gives a light hydration when it feels like your skin feels dry. I enjoy the scent but hate when the flower petals block the tip portion on the toner.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, Uneven texture
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, 2% BHA toner that gently exfoliates, cleans pores and controls oil without over-stripping skin.
review_description: so this is my first experience with a “pricier” toner, (the only toner I’ve EVER used is Thayers which I just adore) but I was feeling extra fancy and extra bored during a September quarantine and decided to give this one a try based off excellent reviews. Woo! Glad I did. I have combo/oiler skin around my time of the month and this toner has been such a superstar addition to my routine. I had developed strange (for me) blackheads and larger pores over the last year and a half and once I started using this, I noticed those pores diminishing in size. I haven’t had any adverse reactions and my skin feels so clean and perfectly ready for my serum and moisturizer. The ingredients are clean and solid, and the packaging is lovely (added bonus). I would give this a try if your bank account allows. Why not!

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, Uneven texture
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, 2% BHA toner that gently exfoliates, cleans pores and controls oil without over-stripping skin.
review_description: It’s very nice and refreshing , but I needed something a little stronger for my pores. Had to return :(

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, Uneven texture
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, 2% BHA toner that gently exfoliates, cleans pores and controls oil without over-stripping skin.
review_description: This stuff cleans your pores like nothing else. After using it sometimes for a few weeks I looked in the mirror and thought whoa there is no way my pores used to look like that. The pores around my nose are wayyy smaller.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, Uneven texture
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, 2% BHA toner that gently exfoliates, cleans pores and controls oil without over-stripping skin.
review_description: This toner feels very refreshing and removes the last traces of makeup. I didn’t notice any exfoliation benefits, however, so I did a little research (which I suppose I should have done before buying!). Turns out, it’s actually not the right pH for the BHA to work as well as it should (should be between 3 and 4 but it’s 4.2). So, if you’re looking for a nice toner, this is a decent choice. If you’re looking for a BHA, I’d look elsewhere.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, Uneven texture
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, 2% BHA toner that gently exfoliates, cleans pores and controls oil without over-stripping skin.
review_description: Best toner ever. I have tried many toners for my skin, I have had acne in the past and now as an adult I have adult acne. But this has helped me plenty. I highly recommend it to anyone.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, Uneven texture
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, 2% BHA toner that gently exfoliates, cleans pores and controls oil without over-stripping skin.
review_description: I’ve been using this product for about three months now along with other Farmacy products and it has made such a difference! I struggle with oil prone skin, acne and clogged pores in my t zone and this has really helped to shrink them down. I’ve purchased it twice now and I’ll continue to use this product! Also a great price point.

skincare_concerns: Pores, Oiliness, Uneven texture
what_it_is: An alcohol-free, 2% BHA toner that gently exfoliates, cleans pores and controls oil without over-stripping skin.
review_title: Does the job but I still love my Paula’s Choice
review_description: One of my fave beauty youtubers recommended this over the tried and true Paula’s Choice BHA toner. After running out of my last bottle I made the switch after she recommended Farmacy over PC saying it didn’t leave behind the same film or residue. I definitely see where she was coming from. Beautiful packaging and lovely formula. Does the same job but for me I actually miss the hydrated feeling that Paula’s Choice BHA left me with. This one doesn’t tingle as much, which doesn’t matter much to me- it’s a toner and it happens, but it leaves my skin feeling a little dryer than PC. Overall though, beautiful toner! Just a personal preference I guess.

skincare_concerns: Dark spots, Pores, Oiliness
what_it_is: A two-in-one toner-serum combo that targets pores, improves the look of dark spots, visibly brightens, smooths, and fights shine—all without stripping skin.
review_title: Look no further for an all in one toner and serum!
review_description: I am so impressed by Fenty Skin. It’s been a journey to find toners and serums that are simple but effective and i’ve stumbled upon my new go to! I don’t have very sensitive skin, so the added fragrance was just a huge bonus for me. The product is light and absorbent. I love the simplicity of the packaging too. I’m so happy i no longer need to search for multiple products when the fat water toner serum does everything i was looking for!

skincare_concerns: Dark spots, Pores, Oiliness
what_it_is: A two-in-one toner-serum combo that targets pores, improves the look of dark spots, visibly brightens, smooths, and fights shine—all without stripping skin.
review_description: I am literally in love!!! I love the dispenser and the overall texture of the product. Its not too heavy but its not too liquidy  either. It reduced my pores in a matter of days and it is my new favorite!! 100% recommend.

skincare_concerns: Dark spots, Pores, Oiliness

review_description: I used it for the first time today. My skin feels smooth and doesn’t feel dry at all.

review_description: Honestly, as a person with oily skin, this is the best product I've used in awhile! It actually keeps me matte. Keeps my foundation lasting all day without being a grease ball. I love it.

review_description: For some reason, this stuff made my face feel tight and not as moisturized as I had hoped. I guess it just isn’t the toner for me. I did love the cleans’r though.

skincare_concerns: Dark spots, Pores, Oiliness
what_it_is: A two-in-one toner-serum combo that targets pores, improves the look of dark spots, visibly brightens, smooths, and fights shine—all without stripping skin.
review_description: This is a really unique product and I find worked really well for my skin. There is no greasy feeling, it helps with my pores. My only complaint would be the packaging , it doesn’t make the most sense. Would prefer a pump !

what_it_is: A natural makeup-removing wipe that gently cleanses skin and lifts makeup, dirt, and grime.
review_description: Cruelty free, and the only wipes I have ever used that don't irritate my skin, especially the eye area.  For eye makeup, I still use a separate makeup remover product and use this wipe to remove everything.  Best wipe on the market as far as I am concerned.

what_it_is: A natural makeup-removing wipe that gently cleanses skin and lifts makeup, dirt, and grime.
review_title: if you're going to use makeup wipes, use these
review_description:
I generally hate makeup wipes – I think they're irritating, ineffective, and wasteful. Why keep spending money on wipes that harm your skin and the environment when you can just use a cleanser? 

With that being said, I'm in college and sometimes I come home at 3am and truly don't have the energy or the mental acuity for my skincare routine, but I still need to take my makeup off. That's why I buy these – as a last resort to keep on your bedside table, they're fine. They're much more environmentally friendly than your typical wipe, don't irritate my very sensitive skin so long as I use them gently, and the packaging is very cute. In terms of whether or not they actually take off your makeup – I think they do a pretty good job. If you're wearing heavy makeup, you'll never get all of it off with just a wipe, but these work fine.

what_it_is: A natural makeup-removing wipe that gently cleanses skin and lifts makeup, dirt, and grime.
review_description: Use these after the gym, felt fresh and nice. Needed more than one side to remove makeup though.

what_it_is: A natural makeup-removing wipe that gently cleanses skin and lifts makeup, dirt, and grime.
review_description: Love how clean it is (the ingredients) but it doesn't do the job well on its own... I have to still use makeup remover ON the wipes. And really need to rub them in to get some makeup off.

what_it_is: A natural makeup-removing wipe that gently cleanses skin and lifts makeup, dirt, and grime.
review_description: This was on my Christmas list and I got 3 packets! yay! Okay so I am really happy with them. I use to use "Ponds" facial wipes but now it's just these all the way! Each cloth is soothing, soft

what_it_is: A natural makeup-removing wipe that gently cleanses skin and lifts makeup, dirt, and grime.
review_description: I love these wipes! I have sensitive skin with rosacea, and these make my skin feel so nice and do a good job of cleansing the skin. Never get rid of these Sephora!

what_it_is: A natural makeup-removing wipe that gently cleanses skin and lifts makeup, dirt, and grime.

what_it_is: A packette of ready-to-go towelettes that whisk away face and eye makeup without irritation—or the need for water.
review_description: I have sensitive skin, and whenever I used these makeup wipes ( usually for eyeshadow and lipstick areas) it would burn pretty badly. not recommend for people with sensitive skin

what_it_is: A packette of ready-to-go towelettes that whisk away face and eye makeup without irritation—or the need for water.
review_description: I wanted these to clean off my eye make-up and love how they work.  I can’t believe how much mascara comes off so easily.  They don’t contain anything that burns my eyes.  This is the second brand of wipes I purchased and will be sticking with them.

what_it_is: A packette of ready-to-go towelettes that whisk away face and eye makeup without irritation—or the need for water.
review_description:
On lazy days (and I have them) nothing beats these wipes to get my face as good as baseline clean. Often times I just can't muster the energy to get out my Tatcha samples -- those are what I generally use to cleanse. 

These wipes work so well. They really do take the day off. And then I can continue with my skincare regimen. I bought another during the BIGPOINTS promo because why not?

I will be buying this product as long as it is sold. That I can tell you. Great product and it makes my life easier. What could be better than 1) it works and 2) it adds some simplicity to my routine on the occasion when I need it?

Great buy and great product! I love it!

what_it_is: A packette of ready-to-go towelettes that whisk away face and eye makeup without irritation—or the need for water.
review_description: I really like these they do a good job. I will buy these again when I run out.

what_it_is: A packette of ready-to-go towelettes that whisk away face and eye makeup without irritation—or the need for water.
review_description: My girlfriend put me on these a few years ago, now I don’t use anything else. I either wear no makeup or full makeup and one of these wipes can take off your full face of makeup, including left over mascara eyelash glue and any full coverage coverup or concealer. They leave your skin feeling silky smooth, I use there take the day off face cleanser as well.

what_it_is: A packette of ready-to-go towelettes that whisk away face and eye makeup without irritation—or the need for water.
review_description: I’ve tried many brand of similar wipes (drug store and expensive brands) and these are my favorite. They seem bigger than other brands’ wipes to me but maybe it’s just because they’re definitely thicker. If you’re used to using a balm, it won’t feel the same. I think that’s why some reviews are lower. If you primarily use only wipes like I do, you’ll agree these are wonderful. The smell isn’t great but I’d rather not have scented makeup removal wipes anyway. I also find that these stay moist compared to other brands. The last wipe in the pack is as moist as the first. Gets off waterproof mascara as well. Doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin but rather soothes it.

what_it_is: A packette of ready-to-go towelettes that whisk away face and eye makeup without irritation—or the need for water.

Now I have to find a new favorite makeup wipe as these are dry, oily, the texture irritates my skin and it takes 3 cloths to take off light natural makeup instead of 1.

skincare_concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture

review_description:
These were my absolute favourite wipes BEFORE they adjusted the formula.

The wipes feel like cardboard and the exfoliating feels the same and the cleansing wipes now.

what_it_is: A package of pre-moistened, cotton wipes to deeply cleanse, nourish, and protect skin.
review_description: I purchased these and immediately threw them away when I saw there are parabens.

what_it_is: A package of pre-moistened, cotton wipes to deeply cleanse, nourish, and protect skin.
review_description:
So these are very nice makeup wipes. I like them a lot--they are easy to take out of the packaging. The wipes are super soft to the touch and ideal for sensitive skin. They are much softer than drugstore wipes, and they are better than some of the other wipes that Sephora and ULTA sell. They have not made me break out yet. The softness of them is very comforting after a long day. 

However, they are very pricey. It costs over 70 dollars for a larger, or regular size pack of these. I do like these wipes and will continue to buy them because I like them, but you can get very similar luxurious makeup wipes that are in the 17 to 25 dollar price range, with a normal amount of wipes in them. I can't figure out why these are so highly priced and I was an esthetician years ago, so I do have basic knowledge of the skin (I've seen a lot of wipes before). I also think that for these specific wipes, the company should take the term "cleansing" out of the title. I have tried pricier wipes before that are "self-cleaning", or "self-lathering", which is where you rub both sides of the wipes together and the wipe lathers on it's own for a true clean. I like these wipes a lot, but the title is very misleading--these are not self-lathering wipes...I never saw any tinsy little bit of foam or self lather coming from them and that's with me vigorously rubbing both sides of the wipe together. 

So, I will keep buying these wipes (not to use every night but for some nights.), and I will keep using them--they are really nice wipes and they are gentle when taking eye makeup off, which is harder to find in a makeup wipe. I just think that the title is a little bit misleading (keep in mind that these do not self-clean or self-lather.), and that they are priced too high for what they are (even for a luxury based, pricier wipe...they are priced too high to not "self-lather".) Just my personal opinion. I would still purchase these wipes again though and I would recommend these wipes to friends.

what_it_is: A package of pre-moistened, cotton wipes to deeply cleanse, nourish, and protect skin.
review_description: i heard good things about this so i bought this. very good and refreshing.
